story:
In Short:

About Us and Our Idea:

Everything started with a bottle of beer in our hands while watching TV and few more bottles laying around in the kitchen next to the bin… No, we are not untidy guys, we just love beer.

So who are we  - two old friends with a common vision for recycling used glass bottles and jars. While one of us is more in DIY and crafts and the other in engineering and construction we stumbled upon a solution how to give the second chance for used glass bottles without just throwing them in recycling bins.

Cutting glass is not as complex as it might seem. The nature has already done it easy for us - the glass crystal structure is organized in straight parallels and perpendiculars, the only necessary action is to give a “kick” (not an actual kick, but you know what I mean) in right direction to unleash these “natural” lines for our favor.

Once you can split the bottle in half there are more opportunities how to use it than when it was in a single piece – more cuts-> more pieces-> more opportunities. The only thing that needs to be done by you right now is to unleash your imagination to the maximum and see where your bottle cutter will lead you to.

While it was just a side project for our own good, we received more and more positive reviews from our friends and colleges who occasionally received our glass gifts. We decided to share with our product also with other people! We need your support in order to start up a large quantity manufacturing program We are really inspired by our product and we are eager to proceed with manufacturing as soon as possible to deliver the product to you – our beloved Kickstarters.

What is „cut A bottle”:

“cut A bottle” is innovative cylindrically shaped glass bottle cutter intended for DIY projects and home use. Our main getaways for the product is 1-2-3 step procedure, effortless cutting, and “cut A bottle” is fit to operate with different size both bottles and jars to fit in its movable “traps”. It does not take too much space, nor weights a ton – it is completely opposite - “cut A bottle” weights less than 500 grams or in imperial scale less than 1.1 pounds. When not in use it can be beautifully stored either horizontally just over shelf or vertically even as a book stand for your home library.

The only limitation to the possible outcomes of your own DIY project is your own creativity and imagination, but here are some tips what you can produce yourself with our product - glasses, vases, candle sticks, lamp globes, ashtrays, even aquariums, Christmas decors and flowerpots….and this is not a full list, there is much more you can create out of used bottles with it!

The Manufacturing:

As much this part might be the most boring part for non-technical people, we think it is important to describe the whole process how the actual product is made and how we can guarantee the precision!

First of all we are using high quality plywood to start with removed branches so the base material is all through consistent. As for cutting technology we are using laser cutting technology, which can perform with ultra-high precision – the error margin for the laser cutter is 0.0254 millimetres or in imperial value - 0.001 inches, thus close to nothing.

All the assembling and gluing part for the actual unit is handwork with standardized test trials for each and every unit to ensure the high quality standard before shipping it out to you – Kickstarters.

From Baby Steps to “Cut A Bottle”:

Little background on how we developed our “cut A bottle” device. First there was a problem - isn’t there a better solution for used glass bottles rather than just plain recycling? As we discovered later – yes, there is! Starting from cost nothing vases for flowers, drinking glasses, candle tarries, ashtrays, simple glasses for sopping dirty brushes, small home decors and on and on…  We have tried different bottle cutting techniques, but each and single one was not without flaws – starting from burning rope till metal wire - none of them was as precise as cutting with carbonite knifes. SO knowing what is the best for glass we had to come up with a “machine” how to do it.

First prototype as we called it ”the Beast” was not as accurate as we would have hoped for, but as far as it goes the whole device was not made entirely accurate up to task too. Thus, there were more flimsy and wavy cuts as we hoped for, but the whole concept did work– the bottles were cut! Back to the drawing board.

Second prototype as we called it “the Intellectual” displayed aristocrat design patterns and was created with the accuracy that we were aiming for, successful site testing was done with less and less variables this time. As far as the bottles could be cut in perfect straight lines now, there were some minor bugs that we wanted to address before producing the final products, that could be only discovered throughout this site testing.

Third and final prototype as we call it “the Real Deal” performed in previously set guidelines – easy to use, more possibilities for a knife to be located and operated, more support points for bottles, more rigid construction due to the extra support walls, fixed cutting position, less pressure needed for user to apply for cutting, even the kids could do it. The cuts are straight as knife, the technique for separating has been developed up to the perfection, and the most important fact is that it is as simple as possible from users’ perspective. Now we have the “ready to manufacture” final product for you.

NB! Of course due to the fact that the glass pieces before sanding can be extremely sharp, we DO NOT ADVISE TO ALLOW THE KIDS TO OPERATE THE “CUT A BOTTLE” PRODUCT WITHOUT SUPERVISION OF ADULTS AT ALL TIME.

What Is In The Kit:

What we want to deliver to our Kickstarter supporters is a ready to start “cut A bottle” Kit including all the necessary features and items to start to use the product as soon as you have opened the box.

  • One "cut A bottle” wooden base unit with its movable side walls;
  • Carbonite blade cutting tool containing turnable 6 blade set;
  • One easily adjustable strap for correctly positioning the bottle in the cutter;
  • One rubber band for ensuring the pressure diversification all around the bottle for more accurate cuts.
  • 3 different grit size sandpapers included in the kit (60, 120, 180)

How to use:

Cutting a bottle is an easy 1-2-3 step procedure.

Ok, actually it’s a 1-2-3-4 step process if you count in consuming the bottle’s contents first, but this would not be the hardest part to start with, wouldn’t it?

1.Scoring: While the product is called a bottle cutter it does not actually cut the bottle. The tool is meant to create a score line on the bottle at the location you wish to cut the bottle. You simply need to align the cutter to place where you want to cut the bottle, tighten it to create a snug fit and slowly rotate the bottle, while you should make one full circle around the bottle with evenly distributed down force while rotating. You should hear the glass cutter scratching the glass surface. The score line should be slightly seen, but continuous all around the bottle.

2.Separation: There are many videos on the internet showing different methods to separate the two sections of the bottle, but after trying them all, the method that produces the most consistent results is simply to use the hot water (doing this over a kitchen sink is recommended). Boil some water and pour it evenly over the score line, not too much. After a few seconds, use a tap to pour cold water over the same score line. This cycle of hot and cold will cause the bottle to crack along the score line. The bottle should separate after one or 2 cycles of hot and cold, thicker glass may take additional cycles though.

3.Sanding: After splitting the bottle there is a sharp edge on both halves. Finish the sharp glass edge using the recommended sandpapers. There are three different grit size sandpapers included in the kit (60, 120, 180). You should start with 60 grit sandpaper, which will remove the sharp edge fast. For smoother result use 120 and 180 grit sandpaper accordingly. After using the 180 grit sandpaper the edge is perfectly smooth for simple use. If you still want it smoother, you can buy a higher grit sandpaper at your local construction depo.

Green Mind-Set:

With our product you would be recycling the same amount of the glass as before, but this time you would be giving the second life for the glass right away without any special treatment needed before. Thus, reducing the need of industrial recycling and giving the glass the second chance right away is a real resource saver. Thinking green had never been so easy and fun just by giving a second life to empty bottles and creating your environment all around more creative and vivid at once!

Imagination Is the Limit:

What You’ll Get for Backing Us:

  • For £25 - One “cut A bottle” Early Bird Edition Kit. Be the first one receiving your own “cut A bottle” unit before everyone else for discounted price! Only 100 units! Delivered in March.
  • For £30 - One “cut A bottle” Regular Kit. Be the second one receiving your own “cut A bottle” unit before New Year for regular price. Unlimited amount. Delivered in April-May (Early delivery only applies for European Union countries, for rest of the world the product will be delivered on May)

Levels:

Our Goal

Our goal is to create T-Shirts that have modern designs and are available in men's, women's, and youth sizes. There will be 7 designs that will be available for 3 weeks, then another set of designs roll in!

The Idea

Our idea was to have a company who's designs were made by employees or the founder and also have the community send in designs through email and have a chance for their designs to be featured on the website for purchase. designs will be available for 3 weeks and then get taken down BUT 1 design will stay on the store forever.

What Makes Us Different

We are different because we have designs that the community made and designs that could be funny, serious, cool, or just straight out bizarre!

story:
Firstly (and proudly) I am a mum. I have always wanted to own my own business but I was always so busy with work that I could never give my business ideas the time they deserved. However, now that I'm a stay at home mum, I have no work to occupy my time. Instead I have my daughter to keep me occupied during the day and I love it. But, I feel like something is missing. Once she's in bed or when she's in nursery, I find myself with nothing to do, there's only so many times I can clean the house in a day! I feel that now is the time for me to start a business so I've set my sights on opening in October 2014.

Why should you fund me?

This business is so incredibly important to me. It means that I can have the best of both worlds by being at home for my daughter and still run a business to provide an income for myself and my family. I want to be able to show my daughter that you can be a great mum and a successful businesswoman at the same time. I'm sure you know a woman who has tried to achieve the same thing and how important it was to her. It could be your mother, your sister, your wife or even just a friend.

If you have any questions please feel free to drop me a note in the comments and I'll answer as soon as possible. Or just drop me a note to say hi. I'm friendly, I promise!

My aim is to eventually open a bricks and mortar shop (or more than 1!) alongside the online store. I will employ local people as I expand as I am a firm believer that you need to invest in the local economy to make the local area a better place for everyone. I have an honours degree in Business Studies with International Development and years of experience in the retail industry so I'm confident that I can make this business a success. 


I've asked for £2,000 to get my business going. I've already found a wholesale supplier and a company to put my designs on the clothes. Both are in the UK so my baby and toddler clothes will proudly be made in the UK. I will use the £2,000 to buy the first few baby and toddler clothes and get the designs printed on them. I do, however, also need to get my own garment labels made (and designed!) to put into the clothes so I have to buy a certain amount of stock in order for the wholesale manufacturer to do this.

I also need to have pictures of the products taken to go onto my website but I will need to rent a studio (in the local college) for professional looking images. My friends are all helping me with this, with one taking the pictures and the others kindly letting me use their children to model the clothing. I also need to upgrade part of my website to be able to have enough space for all of the products but I will be doing all of the work on the website myself.

You'll notice that this doesn't quite add up to £2,000. This is because with the Indiegogo and Paypal fees, when I reach the target of £2,000 I'll get £1,864 give or take a pound or two. 

If I don't reach my funding goal, all money raised will still go towards these goals but I will buy less stock to start and get fewer designs printed, find someone to sew my labels in for me, wait for a sunny day and a nice garden for the images! 


Perks

I'm offering a wide range of perks from money off vouchers to spend in the online store once we're up and running, bibs, vests, baby grows and toddler T-shirts to the opportunity to design your own vest, baby grow, bib or T-shirt with full credit given to you on the website for the life of the product. 

A couple of our designs:

Our biggest and best perk, with only 2 available, is the opportunity to have your child (or the child of a friend/relative) model our clothing online and in our catalogue. You can be based absolutely anywhere for this, you don't need to be in the UK! We'll send you 3 items (which are yours to keep) and all you need to do is send us the high quality pictures back. Our clothing will range from tiny baby to Age 3.

I'm aiming to ship all claimed perks on 1st October 2014 and will be in touch once all designs are finalised for contributors to make their selection.


Everyone's contribution is greatly appreciated no matter how big or small. If you cannot contribute financially we would love it if you could share our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Google+ or anywhere and everywhere else!

story:
Get our must-have item in time for Summer! Polarized 100% UVA/UVB Bamboo Wayfarers. Exclusively from BAMBOO CLOTHING CO.

OUR STORY: We are athletes who demand more and want to keep our competitive edge. We know we can find harmony and balance in a world that is more sustainable through the innovation of technology. Exercise and fitness are a vital part of maintaining good health, but so is a clean environment. Not only is great fitting apparel important for comfort and style, we believe there is room among the industries leading brands for an innovative and holistic (intimately connected) brand between people and the environment. We are committed to making better product and simply doing business better.

OUR VISION: BAMBOO CLOTHING CO. wants to showcase to the world that the relationship between human ingenuity (cleverness) and innovation (new ideas) built with a strong relationship to the earth and environment around us can significantly improve our quality of life while sustaining a clean, and habitable planet. BAMBOO CLOTHING CO. is committed to engaging with the successful development of individuals, teams and athletes by adapting holistic lifestyle practices as part of the fundamental building blocks in creating the truly advanced and evolved athlete, team or individual. You have unlimited potential for greatness and we want to help you get there. Combine your ambition, dreams, and Premium Bamboo Products derived from the powerful elements of our surroundings, and you will find universal strength, balance, and success in your life.


1. Premium Asian Bamboo: Plants that are carefully cultivated from dedicated and sustainable plantations.

2. Superior Craftmanship: Made by generations of textile fabrication.

3. Incredible Style: Designed with the input of leading athletic fashion industry.

4. Amazing Comfort and Durability: Bamboo is incredibly lightweight and durable.

5. Flex-Hinges: Flexible 2-way hinges for added comfort and fit.

6. The Bamboo Guarantee: We guarantee you will be happy with the way our product feels and fits or the return or exchange is on us. (Sorry, no returns on socks or underwear due to hygienic reasons but we will make sure you get the correct size and you keep the original order.)

SIZING OPTIONS

Unisex 150mm Wide Wayfarer Frames

HELP GET PRODUCTION STARTED
After 3 years of research and 3 months of designing, we are finally ready to bring our amazing Polarized Bamboo Wayfarer Sunglasses to the mainstream market. We need your KickStart Pledge to get our initial order off the ground. In return for your support we are offering you Guaranteed Product First in one of two limited packages.

OUR GUARANTEE 
We guarantee you will be amazed with the quality and comfort of our Premium Bamboo Eyewear.

Shipping cost is about $15 of total Pledge.

Bamboo can grow up to 4ft a day and over 100ft tall in a short 3-5 years. It's a highly renewable resource that doesn't require pesticides or fungicides to be grown, which is great for the environment. Bamboo actually exchanges the carbon dioxide in the air 30x more efficient than trees. With impressive facts like that, it's no wonder we're excited to showcase Bamboo to the world!

Our industry goal is to help raise awareness of the harmful effects of the modern cotton industry today which uses 100's of thousands of tons of chemicals to grow and maintain each year, where Bamboo does not need any chemicals to grow. That's right! Bamboo plants have 100% natural strength and raw power, just like you and us. We see a sustainable world made of Bamboo products instead.

Of course, the most amazing thing about this giant woody-grass is that it can be worn as clothing and is compared to the softness of cashmere or silk. Our Bamboo clothing material are just as impressive as the plant itself.

HELP SPREAD THE WORD

Don't forget to share our:

Facebook

Twitter

Instagram

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

1. We already have a pre-production run of Wayfarers being made, worn and tested, and our production team is ready to produce your orders as soon as funding is received.

2. We have been researching, developing and testing Bamboo product in the market for the past several years. People are blown away with the feel and confort of our product. We anticipate our production to go smoothly with a prompt and easy delivery once the project is funded and the first run of socks are made.

3. Delays are unforeseen and obstacles are always possible. We find the likelihood of anything serious occurring to be extremely unlikely. That said, our community of supporters will be the first to know if anything unexpected happens.

story:
To all our indiegogo supporters,

Initially, thank you for taking time to review our campaign!

My name is Ken Mohney, and I am excited about our new patented "All Around Towel" and the potential long-term benefits we hope to achieve with a successful campaign.

Having been born with one hand, I have always been sensitive to finding ways to make life just a little easier and my new "hands-free" towel does just that!

However, a successful campaign is just the beginning as our long-term goal is to use the growth from this product to help others with similar afflictions received from war, by accident, or natural causes.

Please join me as we introduce to the world one of the most simple yet highly functional products to hit the market since the "Soap on a Rope"!

Lending your hand to our campaign may literally be a hand for someone in need.

Sincerely,

Ken

Losing his towel while on the treadmill and not having one available during other activities ultimately led to developing this product and patenting the All Around Towel. His passion for life is not diminished by his own challenges but drives him even harder.

Bonnie has been involved in developing our All Around Towel from the beginning and testing it with success in many markets.  Her interest in "giving back" and helping those who are challenged either through prosthesis or school funding for those less fortunate is at the center of her drive to make this unique product successful.

Our original hands-free towel is comfortable and convenient for a variety of activities whenever you need a towel at your fingertips!

  • Soft Cotton Terry Towel
  • Approximately 12" wide by 18" long
  • Expandable Spiral Lace
  • Self ties through permanently attached grommet
  • Functional for a variety of activities including: Golfing, Fishing, Cooking, Grilling, Tailgating, Jogging, Working Out, Landscaping, Adult Bib, and more!
  • Variety of options: Solid Colors, REALTREE Camo, & Embroidered to suit your preference and need.
  • GREAT GIFT IDEA!

We have been making each All Around Towel in-house for sales this past year through craft shows and festivals and customer response has been GREAT!

Your support in our Indiegogo campaign will allow us to utilize an outside manufacturer of the following styles and options for larger volume sales.

Your choice of 16 solid colors made of colorfast, 100% Turkish cotton

Full REALTREE Camo

Banded Camo

Embroidered

"Boo" Weekley Embroidered

FEATURES AND BENEFITS

Our All Around Towel combines the usefulness of an everyday towel with an expandable spiral lace that is comfortable to use and conveniently keeps your towel at your fingertips when you need it most!

FUNCTIONAL FOR A VARIETY OF ACTIVITIES

       Grilling                           Working Out                       Gardening                  Golfing

       Fishing                               Make-Up                          Painting                       Shaving

            Cooking                      Tending Bar                      Jogging                  Adult Bib

           Tennis                         In the gym                        Front seat                 Back seat

Wherever and whenever you need it ... the "All Around" Towel!

CONVENIENT AND EASY TO USE

           Pull spiral lace from grommet                    Wrap around your waist

           Insert spiral through grommet                Pull spiral to desired tension

Simply pull the spiral lace through the existing grommet and it self ties to your desired tension.

COMFORTABLE

The lightweight, spiral lace keeps the soft cotton towel flat at your side. You won't even know it's there!

FLEXIBILITY TO MEET YOUR PERSONAL NEEDS!

Expandable lace adjusts to fit Left Side, Right Side, Back Side or ... Loin Cloth!

Our towel can be positioned wherever you need it with a spiral lace that expands to approximately 70 inches.

PROTECTS YOUR CLOTHES AND KEEPS YOU CLEAN

                      Keeps you dry                                   Protects your clothes

Our All Around Towel lies flat and is at your side when you need it!

GREAT PROMOTIONAL PRODUCT

Acts like a small billboard to promote your business or event!

PRODUCT VALIDATION

We spent the last year modifying and testing our new patented product at numerous events validating customer demand and preferences with great response and success!  Additionally, we recently signed agreements with PGA Professional, "Boo" Weekley, and REALTREE for worldwide use of their exciting camo patterns!

WITH YOUR SUPPORT

All the All Around Towels here and in our video have been produced in-house by my wife, Bonnie, and me. This Indiegogo campaign will allow us to begin introducing our new patented product to the general public making life just a little bit easier for so many more!  And, we have outside manufacturing in place to meet that need.

Your support will allow us to fund that manufacturing process, increase our inventory and offerings, and implement a more strategic marketing plan.

REWARDS

SOLID COLOR, CAMO, EMBROIDERED

Supporters can choose from a variety of towel colors and styles. We will email you after the campaign to make your selections of All Around Towel color and style including:

16 solid colors

REALTREE camo patterns

Embroidered Options

"Boo" logo or your favorite custom name (10 letter max or 5,000 stitch count)


Solid "Early Bird" All Around -$12 (100 limit)

Each pledge of $12 will receive your choice of one (1) solid color All Around Towel. With your favorite color All Around Towel, you are ready to make life a little easier for your favorite activity or use.

Camo "Early Bird" All Around -$14 (100 limit)

Each pledge of $14 will receive your choice of one (1) camo All Around Towel. With your favorite camo All Around Towel, you are ready for work or play in style.

Embroidered "Early Bird" All Around -$16 (100 limit)

Each pledge of $16 will receive your choice of one (1) embroidered  All Around Towel. For you or your best friend or family, highlight a favorite hobby, sport, or interest with an embroidered All Around Towel.

Solid All Around -$17

Each pledge of $17 will receive your choice of one (1) solid color All Around Towel. With your favorite color All Around Towel, stay dry and look better for your favorite activity or use. 

Camo All Around -$18

Each pledge of $18 will receive your choice of one (1) camo All Around Towel. For personal use, family or friends, you can't beat REALTREE camo to keep you in style!  A great gift or just for you!

Embroidered All Around -$20

Each pledge of $20 will receive your choice of one (1) embroidered  All Around Towel. Have fun, stay dry and show off your favorite hobby, sport, activity - or your monogram in your favorite color All Around Towel.

"Daily Double" All Around -$39

Each pledge of $39 will receive your choice of two (2) All Around Towels of any style or color! Why not have one for you and one for a gift.  Everyone uses towels - a fun yet practical gift for anyone! (Or, keep both for yourself we won't tell!)

"Triple Crown" All Around - $58

Each pledge of $58 will receive your choice of three (3) All Around Towels of any style or color! You'll feel like you've really won the "Triple Crown" after running the race for this reward!

"Fourrrr" All Around - $77

Each pledge of $77 will receive your choice of four (4) All Around Towels of any style or color! So, one for golf, one for fishing, one for cooking, and one for working out you ... make the call. Fourrrrr!

"Eight Ball" All Around -$150

Each pledge of $150 will receive your choice of eight (yes 8!) All Around Towels of any style or color! You'll be ready for Holiday gifts after this pledge! Ho!Ho!Ho! and Shalom!

The "Boo" Weekley Autographed All Around Towel set- $200 (25 limit)

Each pledge of $200 will receive your choice of ten (10) All Around Towels of any style or color! This set includes one (1) Boo Weekley autographed towel with "Boo" logo embroidery!  BOOOOOO!

THANK YOU

To our customers we met this past year who have helped us validate our product! 

To Bil at SPOONFIRE who designed our new logo and supported numerous design efforts!

To our talented friend, Christian Dhyne, who supported this project from the beginning and gave us invaluable business and marketing support. 

To our son and daughter, Ryan and Caitlin, and her friend, David, for their patience, product testing, and encouragement.  This campaign is a testimony to their skills and values. 

Lastly, to our families and many, many friends who have listened to our brainstorming AT LENGTH.  We thank you for always supporting us and our project!

Many, many thanks to you ALL!

Ken and Bonnie

Endorsements

Endorsement agreement with PGA Professional, Boo Weekley

Licensed with REALTREE for worldwide use of their exciting camo patterns for our product!

Guarantee

My name is Ken Mohney and I have used the All Around Towel for a variety of activities including:  golfing, fishing, working out, grilling, while shaving and more.  I guarantee you will love the All Around Towel or you can return it to me within 30 days for 100% money back.

Summary

The All Around Towel you have seen here has been market-tested this past year and we are very happy with product performance and customer response. We are very optimistic about our ability to provide a quality product that will exceed your expectations.

Our manufacturing partner has been in the textile industry for many years, successfully involved in developing and manufacturing new product ideas globally. They are quick to respond, easy to work with, excited about our product, and eager to work with us on each new stage of the project.

As I mentioned, overcoming challenges is not new to me and I firmly believe I am well prepared to meet any challenge that may come up in making this product a success! I welcome this opportunity and, again, thank you for your support!
story_txt:
To all our indiegogo supporters,Initially, thank you for taking time to review our campaign!My name is Ken Mohney, and I am excited about our new patented "All Around Towel" and the potential long-term benefits we hope to achieve with a successful campaign.Having been born with one hand, I have always been sensitive to finding ways to make life just a little easier and my new "hands-free" towel does just that!However, a successful campaign is just the beginning as our long-term goal is to use the growth from this product to help others with similar afflictions received from war, by accident, or natural causes. Please join me as we introduce to the world one of the most simple yet highly functional products to hit the market since the "Soap on a Rope"!Lending your hand to our campaign may literally be a hand for someone in need.Sincerely,Ken Losing his towel while on the treadmill and not having one available during other activities ultimately led to developing this product and patenting the All Around Towel. His passion for life is not diminished by his own challenges but drives him even harder.Bonnie has been involved in developing our All Around Towel from the beginning and testing it with success in many markets.  Her interest in "giving back" and helping those who are challenged either through prosthesis or school funding for those less fortunate is at the center of her drive to make this unique product successful.



Our original hands-free towel is comfortable and 
convenient for a variety of activities whenever you need a towel at your
 fingertips!





Soft Cotton Terry Towel
Approximately 12" wide by 18" long
Expandable Spiral Lace
Self ties through permanently attached grommet
Functional for a variety of activities including: Golfing, Fishing, 
Cooking, Grilling, Tailgating, Jogging, Working Out, Landscaping, Adult 
Bib, and more!
Variety of options: Solid Colors, REALTREE Camo, & Embroidered to suit your preference and need.
GREAT GIFT IDEA!

We have been making each All Around Towel in-house for sales this past year through craft shows and festivals and customer response has been GREAT! 
Your support in our Indiegogo campaign will allow us to utilize an outside manufacturer of the following styles and options for larger volume sales.
Your choice of 16 solid colors made of colorfast, 100% Turkish cotton

Full REALTREE CamoBanded Camo
Embroidered
"Boo" Weekley Embroidered







FEATURES AND BENEFITS
Our All Around Towel combines the 
usefulness of an everyday towel with an expandable spiral lace that is 
comfortable to use and conveniently keeps your towel at your fingertips 
when you need it most!
FUNCTIONAL FOR A VARIETY OF ACTIVITIES



       Grilling                           Working Out                       Gardening                  Golfing



       Fishing                               Make-Up                          Painting                       Shaving



            Cooking                      Tending Bar                      Jogging                  Adult Bib



           Tennis                         In the gym                        Front seat                 Back seat
Wherever and whenever you need it ... the "All Around" Towel!
CONVENIENT AND EASY TO USE



           Pull spiral lace from grommet                    Wrap around your waist



           Insert spiral through grommet                Pull spiral to desired tension
Simply pull the spiral lace through the existing grommet and it self ties to your desired tension.
COMFORTABLE 



The lightweight, spiral lace keeps the soft cotton towel flat at your side. You won't even know it's there!
FLEXIBILITY TO MEET YOUR PERSONAL NEEDS!



Expandable lace adjusts to fit Left Side, Right Side, Back Side or ... Loin Cloth!
Our towel can be positioned wherever you need it with a spiral lace that expands to approximately 70 inches.
PROTECTS YOUR CLOTHES AND KEEPS YOU CLEAN



                      Keeps you dry                                   Protects your clothes
Our All Around Towel lies flat and is at your side when you need it!
GREAT PROMOTIONAL PRODUCT

Acts like a small billboard to promote your business or event!PRODUCT VALIDATION



We spent the last year modifying and testing our new 
patented product at numerous events validating customer demand and 
preferences with great response and success!  Additionally, we recently 
signed agreements with PGA Professional, "Boo" Weekley, and REALTREE for
 worldwide use of their exciting camo patterns!
WITH YOUR SUPPORT
All the All Around Towels here and in our video have been produced in-house by my wife, Bonnie, and me. This Indiegogo campaign will allow 
us to begin introducing our new patented product to the general public 
making life just a little bit easier for so many more!  And, we have 
outside manufacturing in place to meet that need. 
Your support 
will allow us to fund that manufacturing process, increase our inventory
 and offerings, and implement a more strategic marketing plan.
REWARDS
SOLID COLOR, CAMO, EMBROIDERED
Supporters can choose from a variety of towel colors and styles. We 
will email you after the campaign to make your selections of All Around 
Towel color and style including:
16 solid colors
REALTREE camo patterns
Embroidered Options
"Boo" logo or your favorite custom name (10 letter max or 5,000 stitch count)

story:
Design for the daring

Makeshift Apparel began in 2008 when I started selling my one of a kind,handmade clothes on Etsy. Ever since then, my passion for the brand has grown and grown until finally I decided to accomplish my dream of turning my little Etsy shop into a real business. 

I've already done more work towards making my dream into a reality than I had ever imagined. I've obtained my business tax license, Fictitous Firm Name, and Seller's Permit. I did a ton of research and wrote an entire business plan including financial projections ( I can show it to you if you're interested in being a serious investor). I found a warehouse that I plan on turning into a work space with a sewing area, screen printing machine, photo studio, inventory storage,and an office. I bought a domain and had a website designed (www.ilovemakeshift.com). I bought stickers, labels for the clothes, and business cards. I've participated in trade shows, fashion shows, been a vendor at Warped Tour and other events. 

What We Need 

I need $10,000 to go towards producing full size runs of my first collection. The collection will include mens and womens t- shirts, dresses, blouses, and pants. It will be available through my online store at www.ilovemakeshift.com by the end of February.

I have already designed and made samples of the new collection:

 

 My goal is to make each customer feel special. I will accomplish this goal through the following ways:

-Making unique and quality clothing: We work with graphic designers and tattoo artists to create custom printed textiles that we use to make our clothing and T-shirts. I personally design all of the fashion pieces. I want people to feel happy and confident when they wear Makeshift Apparel.

-Interacting through social media: I always acknowledge every tweet, like, comment, etc on our Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter. I post behind the scenes photos and updates to include the customer in all aspects of the business (day to day, photo shoots, events,etc). 

- Excellent Communication: All emails will be answered within 24 hours. When a customer creates an account or makes an order, they will recieve a customized email including tracking information. We will NEVER send spam or give customer's information to anyone else. 

-Packaging and shipping: We send all orders out within 1 day and we always include free stickers and priority shipping. We package the orders carefully to ensure they arrive in good condition.

What You Get

Our campaign supporters will be the first people to get their hands on the new collection. See the right side of the page for full details on other perks.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you'd like to help out but can't do so financially, helping spread the word about our campaign and social networking sites is just as important. We really appreciate every tweet, tag, link, etc! You can also use Indiegogo's sharing tools.

THANK YOU!

story:
What is the Claremontian?

The Claremontian is an organization founded in 2008 by local, Richard Mancuso. Based out of Claremont, California, our mission is to maintain an online and community based presence focused on providing news, information, media, and more to the people and businesses of Claremont.

What are you doing?

We are raising funds to print t-shirts. The t-shirts are going to be printed on premium quality, tan, Alternative Apparel shirts, using water-based inks. The first ten people to donate $15 will get a shirt. After that, the minimum donation to receive a shirt will be $20.

story:
Join us in creating awareness for a worthy cause in the most fabulous vintage style!!! 

Entrepreneurial moms have come together to bring you the 2014 Fashion for a Cause Vintage Pinup Calendar. This collaboration combines our talents and creativity in support of the Colon Cancer Alliance while saluting 40's/50's fashion.

Colon Cancer is the second leading cause of cancer death in men and women combined in the U.S., and has affected many of our family, friends, and loved ones. Help support these beautiful, business minded women by pre-ordering your calendar with a donation. Depending on the level of your donation, each comes with a thank you gift ranging from a personal thank you note, to an autograph session with models, and even FREE entry into the calendar release party (regular entry into calendar release party will be $20, date and location TBD, and will be added to the Colon Cancer Alliance Blue Star Calendar)!!!

 

*Just for businesses, for a limited time only, we are also offering advertising space in exchange for your donation, so don't miss out on having your business mentioned in this sexy yet chic calendar for a cause.

 

Ladies featured in the 2014 FFAC Vintage Calendar are as follows:

Dolores Dee Yanez-Rilho of Halmark Realtors

Rosa Davis of Ecco Awnings

Randee Monique of Makeup by Randee

Mayra Betances of My Perfect Little Party

Debbie Abazia of Debbie Abazia-Professional Model

Jennifer Monge of Moxie Chic Boutique

Penny Drossos Karagiorgis of La Chateau Allure Salon

Randee Pilson Tucker of Bardot Lingerie

Lillie Morales-Torres of Photos by Lillie

Jennifer Villa of Cupcakes by Jenn

Cassandra Alvelo of MCS Productions

Sadie Pegues-Brody of Aww...Suga!

 

Be sure to be one of many to enjoy these gorgeous ladies 365 days of the year, and even better, meeting them at our calendar release party!!!  See below some of the behind the scenes photos  and look out for video footage from the calendar shoot!!!

 

 Jenn getting ready for her pinup debut.

 

 

Sneak peek of Debbie before shooting.

 

 

 

 Makeup artist, Camille placing the finishing touches on Jenn.

 

 

 

Behind the scenes collage of Jenn of Cupcakes by Jenn, Debbie Abazia-Professional Model, Randee of Bardot Lingerie, and our fabulous MUA's Christina and Camille.

 

Stay tuned for more behind the scenes photos of our vintage beauties!!!!

 

On behalf of all of those involved, we thank you in advance for your support, your donations, and your time.

Links to reference:

Colon Cancer Alliance : http://www.ccalliance.org/index.html

Facebook Event Page : https://www.facebook.com/events/429348333767406/

story:
WHAT MAKES FREQ A BETTER AMPLIFIER:

1.  Loud sound from a small package

2.  Two-way amplification

3.  In-dock charging

4.  Eco-friendly materials

5.  Made in the USA

6.  Cool ergonomic design


A Real Father and Son Team!

Hello, we are Nicholas and Evan - a father and son product development team. Together we have co-invented the iPhone amplifier product we call Freq (sounds like "freak"). Nicholas is an industrial designer with over 3 decades of experience developing products for the medical and consumer markets. Evan is a sophomore in high school with a keen sense of what the Gen Z crowd finds cool. Freq was the result of this father son collaboration combining marketing and tech skills that literally span generations. We have been working on this project for over a year, building multiple prototypes and experimenting with different shapes and horn flairs, working to optimize usability, sound quality, and appearance. 

Two-way Amplification

The final geometry is a hyperbolic flair wrapped on a 90 degree curve. This "patents pending" design significantly amplifies your iPhone's speaker and it also concentrates sound waves directed at the phone's tiny mic, thus facilitating two-way, hands free calls or video chat.

Better Design (the details)

We know we are not the first but there are several qualities that separate this passive amplifier from other offerings you might find. 1. Superior ergonomic design - you can actually use and navigate your phone music or communication apps while docked firmly in Freq in both vertical or horizontal viewing mode

2. You can charge your phone while docked even if you have one of the old large 30 pin connectors (even the old deep one not shown in image)3. Great sound amplification - to a certain extent, the larger the horn the louder (and better) the sound you will produce. The Freq's horn volume is larger than most competitors. There were a couple we analyzed that were much larger but; A. we did not measure any significant improvements in db level B. you could not use the phone when in position and C. They were more costly $25 - $100. Based on our extensive research we know we have hit a sweet spot in terms of size and quality sound delivery which is why we have multiple patents pending on this design. Additionally Freq has a unique combination of ergonomic, aesthetic and charging features that further set it apart.


Where we are now:

We have completed all the design refinements including how to accommodate all iPhone 4, 5 & 5C devices and refinements that allow you to charge any of these phones while docked in Freq. More recently we have started collaborating with a high end injection mold company in New Jersey on the sophisticated tool design Freq will require. This is a great tool shop that Nicholas trusts and has worked with in the past.

In Summary we have completed the following:
1. Multiple utility and design patents protecting Freq's unique geometry and appearance have been filed with the U.S. Patent Office.
2. All trademarks have been applied for with the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office.
3. Final CAD geometry is completed and files have been released for production.
4. Final design has been rapid prototyped, tested and approved for production
5. A $5000 down payment was made to NJ tool shop starting preliminary tool design

What We Need (the details)

We believe we will need $25,000 to complete the required tooling plus purchase the materials and packaging needed to fulfill our indegogo perk orders. Over 4/5ths of that total is just the tooling cost. This will be a complex (but really cool) injection mold tool capable of making over a million parts. It will consist of two halves of hardened steel and some proprietary movements to create the unique shape. Here is an image of a mold tool of similar size in case you have never seen one before.

They are even more impressive in action when they are mounted into a 300 ton press and parts are appearing every few seconds. We will keep all backers updated on the progress of the tool construction with images and perhaps video of key milestones.

Social & Environmental Impact

Environmental:

There are millions of battery powered phone speaker accessories currently flooding the market. All of these require charging or replaceable batteries and are helping to contribute to toxic landfills. This "E-waste" accounts for up to 70% of all toxic waste in landfills and it has become the fastest growing waste stream. Since Freq has no electronics it does not contribute to this problem. Many of the low cost passive amplifiers produced in Asia are made of Silicone which is costly to produce from an environmental standpoint. Our goal for Freq will be to include more earth friendly sustainable materials in it's construction. There are several just starting to emerge in industry. Here are a couple of cool new materials we are considering:
http://www.weyerhaeuser.com/pdfs/businesses/cellulosefibers/THRIVE%20brochure.pdf
http://www.greendotpure.com/

Social:

Finally we are a team comprised mainly of high school or college kids which has been a huge win for the Freq team. They are affordable (crucial for a start-up) and represent our target market so we learn from them while they earn much needed burger, gas and clothing funds. With Freq and future planned projects we hope to encourage and mentor our young team members on their own sustainable entrepreneurial product development ventures. It's a win win!

                                      
     Evan - VP Marketing                Nicole Photo/Videographer             Emma - Creative Director


If this program is a success Nicholas and Evan have several other fun, useful and sustainable projects in development that they would like to bring to market.

The Perks

The cool thing about this campaign is that for a small contribution ($12 - $15) you will be among the first in the world to have a Freq of your very own.

You will be able to specify which of our 3 initial colors you want (Red, White or Black)
Additionally we will offer Special pricing for early backers. 

For a little higher price a limited number of Freqs will be produced with a specialty coating - possibly metallic (see rendering above for an idea of what it might look like). Finally we will offer some deeper quantity discounts for shop owners who want to purchase larger amounts and have a very cool product on their store shelves.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you decide to become a backer we want to thank you very much for helping us make this little father son venture a success. Whether you back us or not please pass this campaign on to as many folks as you can using methods like social media, and good old email. Please help get the word out and thanks - now check out our Perks!
story_txt:
WHAT MAKES FREQ A BETTER AMPLIFIER:
1.  Loud sound from a small package
2.  Two-way amplification
3.  In-dock charging

4.  Eco-friendly materials5.  Made in the USA6.  Cool ergonomic design
A Real Father and Son Team!
Hello, we are Nicholas and Evan - a father and son product development team. Together we have co-invented the iPhone amplifier product we call Freq (sounds like "freak"). Nicholas is an industrial designer with over 3 decades of experience developing products for the medical and consumer markets. Evan is a sophomore in high school with a keen sense of what the Gen Z crowd finds cool. Freq was the result of this father son collaboration combining marketing and tech skills that literally span generations. We have been working on this project for over a year, building multiple prototypes and experimenting with different shapes and horn flairs, working to optimize usability, sound quality, and appearance. Two-way AmplificationThe final geometry is a hyperbolic flair wrapped on a 90 degree curve. This "patents pending" design significantly amplifies your iPhone's speaker and it also concentrates sound waves directed at the phone's tiny mic, thus facilitating two-way, hands free calls or video chat.Better Design (the details)We know we are not the first but there are several qualities that separate this passive amplifier from other offerings you might find. 1. Superior ergonomic design - you can actually use and navigate your phone music or communication apps while docked firmly in Freq in both vertical or horizontal viewing mode 2. You can charge your phone while docked even if you have one of the old large 30 pin connectors (even the old deep one not shown in image)3. Great sound amplification - to a certain extent, the larger the horn 
the louder (and better) the sound you will produce. The Freq's horn 
volume is larger than most competitors. There were a couple we analyzed
 that were much larger but; A. we did not measure any significant 
improvements in db level B. you could not use the phone when in position and C. They were
 more costly $25 - $100. Based on our extensive research we know we have
 hit a sweet spot in terms of size and quality sound delivery which is 
why we have multiple patents pending on this design. Additionally Freq has a unique combination 
of ergonomic, aesthetic and charging features that further set it apart.Where we are now:We have completed all the design refinements including how to accommodate all iPhone 4, 5 & 5C devices and refinements that allow you to charge any of these phones while docked in Freq. More recently we have started collaborating with a high end injection mold company in New Jersey on the sophisticated tool design Freq will require. This is a great tool shop that Nicholas trusts and has worked with in the past.In Summary we have completed the following:1. Multiple utility and design patents protecting Freq's unique geometry and appearance have been filed with the U.S. Patent Office.2. All trademarks have been applied for with the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office.3. Final CAD geometry is completed and files have been released for production.4. Final design has been rapid prototyped, tested and approved for production5. A $5000 down payment was made to NJ tool shop starting preliminary tool designWhat We Need (the details)
We believe we will need $25,000 to complete the required tooling plus purchase the materials and packaging needed to fulfill our indegogo perk orders. Over 4/5ths of that total is just the tooling cost. This will be a complex (but really cool) injection mold tool capable of making over a million parts. It will consist of two halves of hardened steel and some proprietary movements to create the unique shape. Here is an image of a mold tool of similar size in case you have never seen one before.They are even more impressive in action when they are mounted into a 300 ton press and parts are appearing every few seconds. We will keep all backers updated on the progress of the tool construction with images and perhaps video of key milestones.Social & Environmental ImpactEnvironmental:There are millions of battery powered phone speaker accessories currently flooding the market. All of these require charging or replaceable batteries and are helping to contribute to toxic landfills. This "E-waste" accounts for up to 70% of all toxic waste in landfills and it has become the fastest growing waste stream. Since Freq has no electronics it does not contribute to this problem. Many of the low cost passive amplifiers produced in Asia are made of Silicone which is costly to produce from an environmental standpoint. Our goal for Freq will be to include more earth friendly sustainable materials in it's construction. There are several just starting to emerge in industry. Here are a couple of cool new materials we are considering:http://www.weyerhaeuser.com/pdfs/businesses/cellulosefibers/THRIVE%20brochure.pdfhttp://www.greendotpure.com/Social:Finally we are a team comprised mainly of high school or college kids which has been a huge win for the Freq team. They are affordable (crucial for a start-up) and represent our target market so we learn from them while they earn much needed burger, gas and clothing funds. With Freq and future planned projects we hope to encourage and mentor our young team members on their own sustainable entrepreneurial product development ventures. It's a win win!                                           Evan - VP Marketing                Nicole Photo/Videographer             Emma - Creative DirectorIf this program is a success Nicholas and Evan have several other fun, useful and sustainable projects in development that they would like to bring to market.The PerksThe cool thing about this campaign is that for a 
small contribution ($12 - $15) you will be among the first in the world 
to have a Freq of your very own. You will be able to specify which of 
our 3 initial colors you want (Red, White or Black)Additionally
 we will offer Special pricing for early backers.  For a little higher 
price a limited number of Freqs will be produced with a specialty 
coating - possibly metallic (see rendering above for an idea of what it might look like). Finally we will offer some deeper quantity 
discounts for shop owners who want to purchase larger amounts and have a
 very cool product on their store shelves.Other Ways You Can HelpIf you decide to become a backer we want to thank you very much for helping us make this little father son venture a success. Whether you back us or not please pass this campaign on to as many folks as you can using methods like social media, and good old email. Please help get the word out and thanks - now check out our Perks!

story:
Hello!

We're two designers based in Lisbon, Portugal. After a night of intense video gaming we had a dream about sexy women in pixelated lingerie.

We’ve always been told to follow our dreams. So that's what we did. The next day we started designing what would become the world’s first 8-bit underwear. 

We called them Pixel Panties — Made with squares, fit for round bottoms.

They're designed for people like us, who love retro games and 8 bit visuals but couldn’t find a way to make them fashionable and sexy. These panties make that possible.


What We Need & What You Get

SIZES AVAILABLE FROM S (small) TO XL (extra large)

Now available in 8bit colours 

don't worry about choosing the size or color, we'll contact you to know which one you want after the campaign is over.


Now we pledge for your help to start a small production line and setup a proper online store, so we can market Pixel Panties around the world, and turn these 8 bit butts into a HD reality.

Other Ways You Can Help

Your monetary contribution isn't the only way you can help.

We need your help to share the idea as best as you can - on a blog post, a facebook post, a tweet, or a carrier pigeon.

It doesn’t matter, as long as you spread the message!

Chat with us, ask questions and comment any way you like, we're here for you.

story:
Paper yarn absorbs unpleasant odors and stops the growth of bacteria. The sock is knit with paper yarn and cotton-acrylic yarn embedded with chitosan, which enhances the anti-odor & bacterial functionality.

Isovaletic acid and acetic acid are commonly attributed to foot odor. Isovaleric acid has a strong pungent cheesy smell. Acetic acid, which vinegar contains, has a sour smell. 

 

Paper Yarn has much more pockets between its fibers than normal spun yarns, which allows for the moisture-wicking and quick-drying properties. These properties can help prevent athlete’s foot by keeping feet dry.

 

 

Paper yarn has a smooth flat surface with a uniquely dry touch. It is popularly used in Asian countries where the climate is humid. Modern advanced technology allows us to produce a fine yet durable paper yarn fit for wearing. 

 

Paper yarn is produced by slitting a paper made out of blended manila hemp and spruce pulp. Manila hemp is in the banana family and is particularly known for being a fast growing ecological plant. 

 

 

Construction

 

Contents & Care

Paper: 32%, Cotton:30%, Polyester: 24%, Acrylic: 12%, Elastane: 2%

Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Tumble dry low. Do not bleach.

 

Size Chart

 

Colorways

 

 

Shipping fee

In the United States : Free, Outside of USA : $15, Backers funding over $84 : Free 

 

About Us

We’re experts in textiles.

We’re a New York based brand under a Japanese textile company selling fabrics worldwide, so we deal with all kinds of fabrics. When we came across paper yarn we were impressed by its unique touch and amazing functionalities. We’ve been obsessed with paper yarn ever since. We decided to develop products made with paper yarn that support our daily activities and relieve stress through the natural benefits of it. That’s how we started PAPER PROJECT. 

We trace all the manufacturing steps of our products, including selecting raw materials, factories and packaging materials carefully. 

We try our best to minimize our environmental impact, however, we do use natural resources to some extent in our production process. In return for the benefits of natural resources, what we can do is to contribute positively to the global environment.

We donate one tree for every pair sold through the National Forest Foundation.

 

Risks and challenges

We’ve made many prototypes for the purpose of improving the quality and determining the smoothest bulk production process.  
We work closely with our manufacturers to plan for production schedules and allocate capacity appropriately. While we have a strong relationship with them and plan ahead as much as possible, unexpected problems could arise. If we encounter any delays or unforeseen circumstances, we will keep our backers updated on a regular basis. We will keep the lines of communication open at all times. We're deeply committed to delivering our product on time.  
Thank you for your support. We’re excited to have you all wear the socks!

story:
For more about our story, see the video on top of this page.

 

As Featured In

 

New Collection ‘Working Girl’

Working girls have many roles and are often required to be a wonder-woman: working full-time, hitting the gym, maintaining a social life, and being a super-mum before and after work. Working girls want to conquer the world.

Every superhero has a mortal enemy and for most of us, it’s our shoes. There is more to shoes than just looks. The right pair of shoes should be a combination of style and comfort that make us feel special, look great and boost our confidence from the ground up. Most of the time, however, we are left with no choice but to compromise: either pretty but painful shoes or comfortable yet boring shoes.

 

What Women Want: Style & Comfort

Luxury shoes that embody both a superior level of comfort and style that turn heads at any moment of the day. At ASHLEY LIM, this has been our obsession since 2014.

We believe in a women’s right to stylish shoes that make us feel powerful, confident and incredibly alive, yet so comfortable that they can actually support us throughout the day, rather than working against us.

 

Understated Chic & All-Day Comfort

Our shoes are designed with you at the forefront of our mind: we not only care about how our shoes look on you but how they fit and make you feel. By finely balancing comfort, style, with exceptional craftsmanship, we make shoes to fit your lifestyle, free from the pain and finally, seize the day.

Check out our exclusive offer on the right hand side of your desktop screen.

 

How to Order Your ASHLEY LIM Shoes

Take up our exclusive offer of your made to measure (MTM) shoes today to experience the confidence, power and comfort that so many other women have found in ASHLEY LIM shoes.

Three (3) simple steps:

1. Choose your favourite perk that suits your style and needs from the styles shown in this offer. If you’re looking at this on your desktop, they’re shown on the right hand side of the screen. Please note you can select your size and colour afterwards, when this campaign is fully funded.

  • FEATURED perk: our signature style, the Ecstasy metallic leather loafers are where it all begun. Currently sold-out, a limited run of 100 pairs with a MTM service is now available, exclusive to Indiegogo.
  • EARLY BIRD perks: select an ‘Early Bird’ perk to secure your MTM shoes with the earliest delivery date. This is limited to the first 30 backers.
  • CURATED perks: too hard picking just one pair! We’ve put together combinations of our flats, pumps and boots, so you can get the most of our exclusive MTM service and better savings.
  • If you want a special combination of perks, or more than one, please contact us so we can create something just for you.

2. Complete our TRU-FIT service.

Because each shoe is handmade, we create the perfect fit based on your individual foot measurements, up to size EU 43 and survey response.

3. Power through your day in style.

Your beautiful new shoes will be delivered, free of charge, as soon as they are ready. Forget carrying extra shoes in your tote bag and tackle your day feeling powerful, not pained.

     

    Features of your ASHLEY LIM shoes:

    • Made to measure (MTM): Each pair will be custom made to fit YOU. Don’t settle for what’s available on the shelf or a close enough size. Instead, have your shoes fitted not only for your foot length but for other crucial measurements thanks to our TRU-FIT service, up to size EU 43.
    • Sensibility and flair led by architect-turned-shoe designer: Dress up or dress down, our designs are highly versatile and compliment any outfits and occasions.
    • Handmade by craftsmen with over 30 years of experience with a great attention to detail.
    • Podiatrist endorsed design: Feet have one of the most complex structures of the human body. We’ve enlisted a leading Podiatrist to advise us on what makes the perfect pair of shoes.
    • Compliments every time​: Added bonus!

     

    Buy now in this exclusive offer on Indiegogo:

    • Exclusive price: up to 40% less than our recommended retail price
    • Complimentary MTM service, worth $129
    • FREE international shipping
    • Optional: Individual sizing for left and right foot (split size)
    • Complimentary ASHLEY LIM eco-canvas bag, worth $20

     

     

    "We can have it all - looking sexy whilst seizing the day​, everyday."

     

     

    Our Foot Specialist

    From the very first collection, we have received the mentorship and advice from Australia’s most notable podiatrist, Dr. Kylie McCulloch, president of the state branch, Podiatry Association, Australia. Dr. McCullough is as passionate as we are about women’s rights to stylish shoes that are comfortable.

     

    “Finally, my patients can have fashionable shoes that can be made to measure with a split size option. This is my version of shoe heaven!”

    - Kylie McCulloch

     

    Handmade Just For You

    A shoe size usually only refers to the length of a shoe, for most of the industry only provides one ‘standard’ width for each increment in length. Very few footwear brands also take variation in width and other important aspects of the foot into account, compromising comfort in order to save on cost. At ASHLEY LIM, we understand fitting is more complex than just an arbitrary length.

    Our TRU-FIT service guides you through how to accurately take your own measurements on our specially developed template and we also include a survey about what footwear you currently wear so we can ensure your new shoes from us fit perfectly, up to size EU 43.

    At the close of our Indiegogo campaign, we will email you our TRU-FIT template to print so you can measure and complete your order.

    Do you have any special needs or requirements?

    Thanks to our exclusive MTM service, we can also address any specific requirements you may need via our TRU-FIT service.

    Handmade to us means an obsessive attention to detail using techniques passed down over generations of shoemakers to make a product of unrivalled quality and comfort. Artisan shoemakers begin the process by selecting the right ‘last’ (the form used to make the shoe) which is then adjusted according to your TRU-FIT measurements.

     

    Team Behind ASHLEY LIM

     

     

    Why Indiegogo

    Our mission is to provide women with more power and confidence with the right pair of shoes. Indiegogo allows us to reach out to more women and offer our entire collection with an exclusive MTM service that would otherwise be only available with the luxury price tag.

     

    Where We Are Investing Our Resources

    By making this offer through Indiegogo, we’re able to invest more in the quality and design of the product, and less in other traditional retail chain costs including advertising.

     

    How to Contact Us

    Head to the top of the campaign page and look for our logo ‘ASHLEY LIM’ where you will find ‘Ask a question’. Click the ‘Ask a question’ text. Make sure you have pop ups allowed on your browser. Please remember to include in the message the name and colour of the shoes you want to purchase and the quantity.

story:
Magno is a 2mm lead mechanical pencil unlike any other. It offers lead position accuracy far beyond other pencils due to the free-moving magnet concealed within its premium grade aluminium body. Every unique detail has been considered to ensure you receive a quality product with the highest level of functionality. Other pencils may last a few weeks... ours lasts a lifetime.

 

 UNLOCKED STRETCH GOALS

Free Rubber with every Magno

Free Integrated Sharpener with every Magno

Packaging/Lifetime Carry Case with every Magno

Atom Docking Station (optional extra)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Aircraft Grade Aluminium with anodised surface finish
  •  Premium Neodymium magnet
  • Hardened Brass
  • Brass Lead Holder
  • Laser engraved Mild Steel with anodised surface treatment
  • HB Lead

 

 The 2mm replaceable lead is held by a magnetic component concealed within the body of the pencil. 

1.  Once the end tip is rotated, the brass collet releases the lead. 

 

2.  The ferrous sleeve located around the outside of the body slides by hand to determine the length of lead. The ferrous outer sleeve moves the magnet and lead within the body. 

3.  The lead is secured again by rotating the end tip which tightens the collet.

 

 

 

 

Our main goal throughout Magno’s development has always been the technology modestly hidden within it’s minimalist aesthetic. Utilising such a unique system to propel the lead has enabled us to make a significant design step in the mechanical pencil industry.

 

 

 

 

 

Dear Indiegogoers,

Firstly, thank you so much for taking the time to read through our campaign. We hope you share even half the passion we have for Magno!

We are both Design Engineers who have worked in the manufacturing industry for a number of years. As Designers, we have a strong passion to innovate products where design has become stale and unchanged latterly in their existence. What better product then a pencil?

Using pencils on a daily basis, we noticed a number of faults and strongly believed there was a better product to be designed. The following one and a half years developing Magno became our lives, but it was 100% worth it.

All design work and machining prototypes have been done by ourselves. We also have a very good relationship with our manufactures and talk on a daily basis. This is essential to ensure we can easily monitor production and ensure the very best quality.

We feel so proud to finally offer this product to the Indiegogo community and sincerely hope you are able to help make our dream a reality.

Thank you for your time.

Ashley and Matthew

 Arctic Frost Champagne Gold Slate Grey Strawberry Gold Our range of colours    Key MAGNO dimensions Cutaway MAGNO with materials
Aircraft Grade Aluminium with anodised surface finish
 Premium Neodymium magnet
Hardened Brass
Brass Lead Holder
Laser engraved Mild Steel with anodised surface treatment
HB Lead
  The 2mm replaceable lead is held by a magnetic component concealed within the body of the pencil. 1.  Once the end tip is rotated, the brass collet releases the lead.  2.  The ferrous sleeve located around the outside of the body slides by hand to determine the length of lead. The ferrous outer sleeve moves the magnet and lead within the body. 3.  The lead is secured again by rotating the end tip which tightens the collet.  Development Prototype Timeline  Our main goal throughout Magno’s development has always been the technology modestly hidden within it’s minimalist aesthetic. Utilising such a unique system to propel the lead has enabled us to make a significant design step in the mechanical pencil industry.     Dear Indiegogoers,Firstly, thank you so much for taking the time to read through our campaign. We hope you share even half the passion we have for Magno!We are both Design Engineers who have worked in the manufacturing industry for a number of years. As Designers, we have a strong passion to innovate products where design has become stale and unchanged latterly in their existence. What better product then a pencil?Using pencils on a daily basis, we noticed a number of faults and strongly believed there was a better product to be designed. The following one and a half years developing Magno became our lives, but it was 100% worth it.All design work and machining prototypes have been done by ourselves. We also have a very good relationship with our manufactures and talk on a daily basis. This is essential to ensure we can easily monitor production and ensure the very best quality.We feel so proud to finally offer this product to the Indiegogo community and sincerely hope you are able to help make our dream a reality.Thank you for your time.Ashley and Matthew

story:
Tech Meets Paper: makers of delightful analogue and digital stationery

About this project:

Welcome! This is the official debut of Tech Meets Paper and we are excited to meet you. This is a Scotland born brand of functional and elegant notebooks and an innovative app.

We want to create beautiful products that inspire you to write or draw inspirational thoughts (or your shopping list!).  

We are lovers of technology and paper and this sparked our thinking to see what we could do to bring the analogue and digital together.

This application will enable you to download further digital stationery such as planners, audio tracks and quote cards. The big super duper thing that we are excited about is the Augmented Reality part of the app. As part of the notebooks we will provide images that can trigger off videos on your smartphone or tablet.

Think of it like a "life coach in your pocket."

This is the real differentiator of the brand and we would love to involve you in the making of it.

The products:

There is an initial capsule range of (paper) stationery and triangular writing sticks  (i.e pens & pencils). We want to provide a high quality product with a difference. We have been carefully poring over paper samples, scribbling on lined, blank, and triangle printed paper and researching with focus groups, designers, printers and stationery aficionados to bring you the best quality notebooks.

Our notebooks. Both notebooks are made from the finest of paper, the covers are in deep claret (GF Smith colour plan Claret plain finish 350gsm) and all logos embossed with delightful copper foil. The inside pages are Olin smooth cream (made with 100% elemental chlorine free pulps for natural colours), 120gsm and are a combination of blank pages and faint triangular patterns. All are printed locally in Scotland by a passionate, creative, family-run business.


Signature notebook (our favourite) - this is a trifold notebook ( 210x120mm) - think of it like a corcertina. Effectively what this means is - you have three notebooks in one! Perfect for those multitaskers or those of us who like to have separate sections for the different parts of our lives. 


Executive notebook - is larger in size (180 x 255 mm) with blank pages waiting to be filled with inspirations, meetings notes or your latest heady dream. 


Triangular pens - sustainable Swiss made, black-ink, ballpoint pens. This classic triangular pen is an ergonomic dream. Oh and did we mention they are copper...to match your copper foiled notebook.


Triangular pencils - also copper in colour and are made by a family-run, UK based business that have been making pencils in all shapes and sizes for over 100 years.


The app:

This is the difference that makes the difference. Our love of technology inspired us to create an integrated application. 

This app (works on both Android & iOS platforms) will provide you with a further dimension of stationery and unlock access to creative inspirational resources. Your app gives you:

  • downloadable, digital stationery - this will consist of scribble sheets, daily/weekly/goal planners, digital backgrounds
  • quotes and top tips - we all love a motivational pick me up so we will provide you with your favourite quotes all in one app
  • audio tracks - think of this like a mini life coach in your pocket (or your phone) that will give you meditation tracks, kick-ass motivation and insights into the workings of your brain (yikes)
  • and Augmented Reality - Augmented Reality allows you to access secret trigger videos that will pop up on your phone or tablet. There will be 6 changeable videos overlaid within the notebooks.

     

  


Prints:
Our bespoke prints come in either copper foil, rose-gold or leopard print foil. With both landscape and portrait, these handmade products make the perfect gift for ridiculously cool people.




 Perks table:
These are the perks we have on offer but look at the right hand side for the fine details:


This campaign will support the building of the brand and put our signature product into production.

With your support we will begin production of the product and get the really clever technical people building the app.

Your contribution will allow us to develop the augmented reality and trigger videos for the notebooks. The augmented reality requires images to set off specific trigger videos and we want to ensure these videos are right for our community (you!) and so we shall send  a questionnaire to our contributors to poll information on what the best trigger videos will be. This connection with our community is really important and will continue in the lifecycle of your product.

Tech Meets Paper is more than something to write on or write with…it is an inspirational brand that we hope will motivate, encourage and inspire you to create brilliance.


Update: Following the close of this campaign on October 21st we shall send an update to all our contributors on delivery schedules and get your parcels on their way to you.

As soon as the app is ready we shall send to all who have contributed. 


Who are we?

Kirsty Mac - Founder of Tech Meets Paper, Executive Coach and stationery addict. A life long dream of hers has been to have her very own stationery and now it is so close to becoming a reality. 


Rachel Ferguson - The Executive sorter outerer who makes it all happen (effectively she takes the craziness out of Kirsty's head and makes it work. A genius.). 


Massive thankyous:

Jim Burns of Binary Burns - the talented film-maker and creator behind our beautifully made video that brings our product to life.
Designline Creative - the brand gurus who listened to our crazy and took our dreams from our heads onto paper. 
Intellicore - the technical app masters that will bring the digital side of this brand to life. We couldn't do it without them as quite frankly we wouldn't have a clue where to start.
