story:
Winstan-T

                                                    Our Mission:

                                   To leave footprints around the WORLD

                                                      Our Vision:

                   To provide a fun and creativity platform to improve lifestyle

                                                       Our Value:

                                  Have Fun! Be Creative! Foster Kindness!

Dreamers are people with dreams… I believe that everyone has a dream that they want to achieve. A special dream that they want to change into reality. Some dream to fly freely into the sky with no worries at all. Some dream to travel to all parts of the world. Some dreams are as simple as bringing happiness to the people around them. Likewise, I am a dreamer too. My dream combines these dreams; my dream is to be free, to travel, and to bring happiness to others. I dream to be able to be free and without restrictions, to travel to all parts of the world, and to bring happiness wherever I go. My dream is DVa 2.

 What exactly is DVa 2?

DVa 2 is a 2 in 1 shoe designed to suit males of all ages. In a blink of an eye, you can transform a classy pair of shoes into a fashionable pair of sandals. Do you find yourselves going through the hassle, visiting shop after shop to look for a good-looking pair of shoes to suit your fashion style? DVa 2 is perfect for formal to semi-formal to even causal wear! DVa 2 is what you are looking for to match every occasion.

You are free to create your very own shoe, with DVa 2. Be it dressing up for formal events or dressing down for an informal outing with friends, DVa 2 matches every occasion! Everyone can afford to own a pair of DVa 2. By purchasing a pair of DVa 2, you automatically gain 2 pairs instead of 1!

DVa 2 will not be limited by the boundaries created by countries. DVa 2 will be able to reach every part of the world and will be made available to everyone. With DVa 2, you will never have to worry if your attire matches your shoes. You can simply make your shoes match what you are wearing, every single day.

Who Am I....

I am Winston Tan, the creator of DVa 2. I aim to be a full-fledged designer that features my own brand, Winstan-T. At Winstan-T, our mission is to leave footprints around the world. Our ultimate vision is to provide a fun and creative platform to improve people’s lifestyle. I created Winstan-T with these values in mind: to have fun, to spread kindness and to trigger creativity. With Winstan-T, I will be able to design and create many more incredible products that can help change the life of people all over the world.

In the 29 years of my life, I am constantly faced with challenges and I have been constantly overcoming them. It is through these obstacles that make my dream of DVa 2 stronger.

DVa2 Come out.................

The idea of DVa first began in the year 2008. During my college days, I was tasked with a project to create an item with multi-functionality. Back then, I thought about the possibility of combining the concept of sandals and sneakers as one. However, my school closed down the class and I never did started on developing the idea of DVa. For 6 years, DVa was cast aside. It was until a time where I accidentally stumbled across a multi-purpose shoe featured online in 2014 that made me remember DVa. I realized that if you were to hesitate on the things you want to do, there would be others who will jump at the chance of acting on your ideas and dreams. This comes across as an awakening moment for me. I made a decision then that I would live out my dream to the fullest and created Winstan-T.

Over the years, one of the greatest obstacles I faced with DVa was to produce it. Majority of the manufacturers turned me down when it comes to production of DVa. The complex design of DVa makes production difficult. The remaining few manufacturers that were willing to help, either quoted a hefty price or demanded DVa to be produced at a large quantity. By holding on and not abandoning my dream, I eventually found a willing partner that helped produced DVa. DVa is finally born! However, I have to commit to a certain amount of orders so as to keep DVa alive. In 2014, my crowd funding campaign failed, but I believe in my DVa dream, which then leads me to create DVa 2 this year.                                                                      

 I know I am capable of achieving much more. I can bring DVa 2 further and create more astonishing designs under my own brand, Winstan-T. Now, with indiegogo, you will be able to play a part in helping me raise funds. These funds are like the fuel needed for a car to keep on going. As Barack Obama once mentioned, “The best way to not feel hopeless is to get up and do something. Don’t wait for good things to happen to you. If you go out and make some good things happen, you will fill the world with hope, you will fill yourself with hope.” You can do your part to make good things happen too.

                     

Lend me your helping hand to help me to fulfill my  dream today with DVa 2.

Size guide (please check your foot length to choose the correct size)

Euro size 

Foot length(cm)

39

26.1

40

26.7

41

27.4

42

28

43

28.7

44

29.4

45

30

These funds are like the fuel needed for a car to keep on going. As Barack

story:
For generations, women all over the world have endured the discomfort and medical issues associated with prolonged use of high heels in exchange for a fashionable look.

 

 

 

Finally, we have the ultimate solution to weave glamour and comfort in the world's first push-button retractable heel. Give your feet a rest whenever you want. Simply press a button, and it converts to flats in seconds. Carrying another pair of shoe or an interchangeable heel is a thing of the past. Now you can have a 2 in 1 shoe with heels that turn into flats and back with a push of a button.

 

With Runway, you can wear your favourite stilettos anytime, anywhere, and when your feet are tired or in pain, simply press a button, and it converts to flats in seconds giving your feet a rest whenever you want.

 

 

 

 

Runway Heels is the ultimate go-to for the modern women who just want something that could adapt to their changing landscape throughout the day. Flats to heels and back in seconds! Simply push a button and the heel automatically extends and easily pushes back inside.

 

PRE-ORDER the shoes before they are made and become a backer of this project. Pick a reward and you will not only get a special backer discount only available on this Indiegogo campaign here, but you will receive your shoes before anyone else in the entire world.
Want to buy more than one pair of shoes or a few pairs with different designs? Choose among all the rewards, help us spread the word, and get friends to order with you, so you can save money the more you bundle.

 

 

 

After the campaign is over, the Runway Heels Legacy Model will retail for $199, and the Runway Heels Premium Model will retail at $249. The Reward Cost is the price you will pay for the shoes.

 

To bring this to market we need your contribution. Your pre-orders and help in spreading the word on our campaign will bring relief to millions of women's tired, overworked feet.

 

 

 

Share the good news of Runway Heels with all your friends on social media!

 

We are committed to giving a portion of our profits to protect children, women, and men against human trafficking all over the world.

Human Trafficking

• There are 27 to 30 million modern-day slaves in the world today according to the United Nations.

• The U.S. State Department cites that 600,000 to 800,000 people are trafficked across borders every year.

• When women in places like Ukraine respond to ads for entertainment or waitressing jobs, they risk falling in with sham placement agencies that may confiscate their documents and force them into sex work. Or, an uncle in Vietnam may tell his niece she’s going away to work at a restaurant, when in fact, she will be shipped to a brothel.

• In other cases, poor families will send their own daughters into sex work or labor for the lucrative one-time pay-off, as well as the potential for more in the future—once a trafficked person pays off her “debt” (the travel and document fees traffickers tell their victims that they owe), she can begin to earn profit.

• While trafficking is often thought of as something that happens across international borders, it also happens in America—every single day. According to Polaris Project, there are 100,000 to 300,000 children prostituted in America and much more at risk.

You can learn how to identify a trafficking victim at the State Department website. https://www.themuse.com/advice/human-traffickin...
story_txt: For generations, women all over the world have endured the discomfort and medical issues associated with prolonged use of high heels in exchange for a fashionable look.   Finally, we have the ultimate solution to weave glamour and comfort in the world's first push-button retractable heel. Give your feet a rest whenever you want. Simply press a button, and it converts to flats in seconds. Carrying another pair of shoe or an interchangeable heel is a thing of the past. Now you can have a 2 in 1 shoe with heels that turn into flats and back with a push of a button.   With Runway, you can wear your favourite stilettos anytime, anywhere, and when your feet are tired or in pain, simply press a button, and it converts to flats in seconds giving your feet a rest whenever you want.          Runway Heels is the ultimate go-to for the modern women who just want something that could adapt to their changing landscape throughout the day. Flats to heels and back in seconds! Simply push a button and the heel automatically extends and easily pushes back inside. PRE-ORDER the shoes before they are made and become a backer of this project. Pick a reward and you will not only get a special backer discount only available on this Indiegogo campaign here, but you will receive your shoes before anyone else in the entire world.Want to buy more than one pair of shoes or a few pairs with different designs? Choose among all the rewards, help us spread the word, and get friends to order with you, so you can save money the more you bundle.    After the campaign is over, the Runway Heels Legacy Model will retail for $199, and the Runway Heels Premium Model will retail at $249. The Reward Cost is the price you will pay for the shoes. To bring this to market we need your contribution. Your pre-orders and help in spreading the word on our campaign will bring relief to millions of women's tired, overworked feet.    Share the good news of Runway Heels with all your friends on social media!    We are committed to giving a portion of our profits to protect children, women, and men against human trafficking all over the world.Human Trafficking • There are 27 to 30 million modern-day slaves in the world today according to the United Nations.• The U.S. State Department cites that 600,000 to 800,000 people are trafficked across borders every year.• When women in places like Ukraine respond to ads for entertainment or waitressing jobs, they risk falling in with sham placement agencies that may confiscate their documents and force them into sex work. Or, an uncle in Vietnam may tell his niece she’s going away to work at a restaurant, when in fact, she will be shipped to a brothel.• In other cases, poor families will send their own daughters into sex work or labor for the lucrative one-time pay-off, as well as the potential for more in the future—once a trafficked person pays off her “debt” (the travel and document fees traffickers tell their victims that they owe), she can begin to earn profit.• While trafficking is often thought of as something that happens across international borders, it also happens in America—every single day. According to Polaris Project, there are 100,000 to 300,000 children prostituted in America and much more at risk.You can learn how to identify a trafficking victim at the State Department website. https://www.themuse.com/advice/human-traffickin...

story:
Hi backers!

Mass Customization and the Experience Economy have been around since the late nineties. Now, with the advent of Industry 4.0, we really hope to be able to eventually place the Power of Design in the hands of the consumer - long live the Prosumer!

The BeyondPak is only our first step towards this. Our Massive Transformative Purpose? To create a Platform to empower consumers to create their own products and experiences.

So we really need your support to take this first small step (and the birth of the big leap). The success of this batch of BeyondPak will be the big leap towards creating versions 2.0 and beyond, when we can go deeper into Mass Customization, and empower more prosumers like yourselves.

Please allow us to offer you rewards of your generous support in the form of the first batch of BeyondPaks ever! Like the first Model Ts and the first Macs, we hope these will be valuable icons as we write our future history together with you.

"Any customer can have a car in any color he wants as long as it's black" - Henry Ford.

Not any more. Go beyond.... Please support BEYONDPAK!

story:
DIGITSOLE SMARTSHOE

Reinventing traditional footwear with connected sneakers that integrate wearable technology.

 

 

Hardware and software technologies are engineered directly into the shoe itself, creating an interactive smartshoe that is constantly evaluating and providing you with personalized feedback.

  

 

Whether you're a gadget enthusiast, sneaker collector, health enthusiast, athlete, or simply a daily user who wants a well designed pair of shoes, the Smartshoe's features fit a wide range of uses and people:

  • HEALTH ANALYTICS - Movement sensors analyze pronation, supination, propulsion levels, impact force, fatigue, posture, steps, calories, and more creating precise data that prevents injuries and improves your health.
  • SMART CONNECTIVITY - Bluetooth 4.0 connectivity enables personalized coaching recommendations, walking pattern analysis, and more in real-time via smartphone app based on activity data.
  • SNEAKER DESIGN - Next gen shoe design includes auto-lacing, temperature regulation with heating, and more. The Smartshoe is designed into an ultra-light, premium leather and Neotech EVA shoe.

   

  

By integrating cutting-edge technology with footwear, we've designed a shoe that's smarter, healthier, and convenient.

Designed with smart features for modern-day conveniences you're going to love:

Whether you're a techie who always has the latest gadget, a sneaker-head on top of trends, athlete or health tracking enthusiast, the Smartshoe has something for you.

 

Help us reach $75K and you will be able to select the black on black version at the end of the campaign!

The rechargeable battery, tightening mechanism, heating pad, sensors, and algorithms are all integrated into the Smartshoe.

 

Leveraging Bluetooth 4.0 connectivity, Digitsole collects precisely accurate activity data through integrated hardware that is sent to your iOS or Android smartphone app for analysis.  

  • THE ENGINE - Located at the back of the shoe, the engine allows the auto-tightening system to function. 
  • TRACKING SYSTEM - By using the latest generation tracking system, we can collect data more accurately than any other wearable. 
  • MOVEMENT SENSORS - To get a complete analysis of your stride, movement sensors detect impact force, fatigue, posture, step size, and more. 
  • ALGORITHMS - By working alongside podiatrists, we've created algorithms that use your data to give a full report on your walking habits. 
  • HEATING - A heat-pad transforms energy from the battery into heat and can be controlled through our app. 
  • THE APP - Simply connect your smartphone and Smartshoe using Bluetooth control all feature via the Digitsole app.

   

  

Press and media reviews of the Digitsole Smartshoe.

 

"It’s a pair of kicks that do not just look like they come from the future but boast a plethora of smart features"  - DIGITAL TRENDS

 

"5 coolest things we've seen so far at CES 2016" - USA TODAY

 

"Built-in heating system keeps your feet toasty during those cold winter days...the shoes can be heated up to 110 degrees Fahrenheit. You'll never have to wear a second pair of socks again" - MASHABLE

 

"It's taking a big stab at the whole, futuristic shoe thing" - WIRED

 

"This futuristic 'Smartshoe' unveiled at the Consumer Electronic Show in Las Vegas... it's made from Neotech, which is a specially designed lightweight material layered with 'Ortholite', with shock absorbing characteristics" - DAILY MAIL

 

"Built-in accelerometer keeps count of number of steps, distance walked, calories burned, thus turning Digitsole into a reliable pedometer" - GADGETS AND WEARABLES

  

  

The Smartshoe uses data from its sensors to interact and evaluate your walking activity through its app.

The LED light controls, electronic card with movement detection sensors, and wireless charging are all located in the heel of the shoe. 

This creates an intelligent shoe that analyzes complex sensor data through algorithms to provide simple, user-friendly 'coaching' recommendations to its connected smartphone app.

   

   

    

The Smartshoe can also analyze your stride and your posture to give you a complete report on your walking pattern with propulsion level, impact force, stability, and more.

By collecting and analyzing these metrics, the Smartshoe can understand:

  • Which part of your foot hits the ground first 
  • If you're a pronator or supinator
  • If your stride present any risk of injuries
  • If you're hindering your walking performance and efficiency

 

The Smartshoe will tell you how to reduce fatigue and risks of injuries while helping you optimize your daily activity.

   

   

   

Based on the data collected, our smart footwear will recommend ways to improve walking efficiency, decrease fatigue, and reduce injury.

Through our app, you’ll have personalized recommendations on how to reach your personal goals and get the most out of your walk. The Smartshoe will also advise on the type of shoe inserts you should use to correct any problems with your posture.

 

Whether you want the Smartshoe to make your walks more efficient, or just get alerts in cases fatigue or injury, it has the ability to help you have the best, safest walk possible.

   

 

We've incorporated the latest generation of tracking technology into the Smartshoe.

 

With activity sensors located in the shoe, you'll get far more accurate data than any wearable technology worn on your wrist.

  

 

   

Our integrated movement sensors keeps a precise count of your activity, including number of steps, distance, speed and calories burned.

   

  

 

Did you know that most joints injuries come from a bad cushioning?

 

By constantly analyzing the Smartshoe's cushions, the app alerts you as your cushioning deteriorates because of use.

 

When reaching the 35% cushion safety level, the Smartshoe will warn you and give you specific recommendations for new inserts.

   

 

Inspired by concept cars, we engineered the Smartshoe with a futuristic, sporty, and elegant look. 

Our design inspiration holds true with the shoes opening. The auto-tightening resembles butterfly doors; the leather/microfiber materials resemble a car's interior; and the shoe body itself resembles the sleek exterior lines of futuristic concept cars.

  

  

    

We invented an auto-lacing system that closes and tightens the shoe at the same time.

With a simple click on the app your Smartshoe can open by sliding forward and untightening the lace. If ever you run out of battery while wearing the Smartshoes, you can manually open or close them with a push of the exterior button.

   

   

Individually warm each foot to a suggested comfort zone of 86°F - 95°F and a maximum temperature of 113°F.

The integrated thermostat allows for smart and auto-regulating heat.

  • When the shoe reaches its desired temperature, the heating turns off, saving battery life. 
  • When the Smartshoe's temperature drops below the temperature preset, it begins heating once again to reach your desired comfort settings.

  

  

The Smartshoe incorporates a long life Lithium polymer battery in each shoe that are individually rechargeable.

Battery life varies greatly depending on heating:

  • Heat Off - expect battery life of a couple weeks.
  • Heat On - expect battery life of 5-8 hours.

 

A pair of Smartshoes comes with a dual charging Micro USB cable. The charge time ranges from 1.5 hours using the 'Quick Charge' option  to 3 hours with normal charging.

 

 

 

 Check out the details on sizing, design, hardware and more.

 

 

  

 

It started with Marty, it ended with the smartest shoe ever.

  

 

 

The Digitsole team creates innovative products with the goal of making a change in people’s everyday lives. We don’t want to gadgetize footwear, we want to make the most of it.

 

We started by developing connected insoles for heating and tracking. From there, our passion for footwear inspired us to create the craziest shoes in the world. And what’s crazier than a shoe that works by itself? And who hasn’t dreamt of having Nike’s Air Mag after watching Back to the Future 2?  

 

  

While it started as a fun experience, we soon realized this innovative sneaker could actually help people who struggle with various health issues. With this realization, we developed an auto-regulated heating system for comfort and blood circulation issues, a tracker to keep an eye on your activity, and a 3D Analyzer to give you a full report of your health.  

 

 

By analyzing your way of walking, we not only have the ability to detect injury risks, but also chronic diseases. With all of the health benefiting technology, we knew we had to make it a mission to make this technology available to all people.

story:
I have been growing my hair out for more than 3 years.

 

My luscious European hair is completely virgin. Never treated or dyed. Never used any chemicals in it. Never used a blow dryer or any heat. Never straightened either. I wash my hair ONCE A WEEK with organic, natural shampoo ONLY. I am a non smoker, I take no drugs. My ponytail is about 15″ long and am willing to CUT IT ALL OFF is the price is right, and DONATE the hair to Pantene Beautiful Lengths, a public non-profit organization that donates real-hair wigs to the national American Cancer Society Wig Bank, helping serve those in need every single day. .

 

Here are the options at your disposal to have fun with my hair, depending on the money raised:

$1,000: A short bob without bangs

 

$1,100: A short bob with very short bangs

 

$1,200: A short haircut

 
$1,300: A pixie haircut

 

 

Do you want me to go shorter still? Well, keep on reading...


$1,500: A clippered back and sides with short top

 

 
$2,000: A flattop

 

 

$2,500: A buzzcut, short guard one-length all over

 
Do you want something EXTREME? Gotcha! keep on reading…

$3,000: A buzzcut, clippers no guard

 
$3,250: A razor HEADSHAVE, smooth and shiny

 
$3,500: The ultimate makeover, SMOOTH shiny HEAD and shaved EYEBROWS

 

For your viewing pleasure, I have a gorgeous Dragon Head Tattoo which will be revealed if I shave my head…

 

 
I will get my hair cut either on a professional hair salon or at home, depending on the haircut.

Help me make it happen!!!

story:
Hello Everybody!

We are a group of designers which is trying to make people's life easier by creating simple and useful but elegant and sharp objects.

There are many different styles of wallets: thin & thick, big & small, sophisticated and minimalistic,  but just few of them helps to solve the problem of lack of space for COINS. They advice us to throw them away, they say it's not modern.. What? Why should we do that and which of them is a God of fashion? Real fashion and design DOES NOT EXCLUDE  the things it can't take care about BUT CREATES something special for them.

That's why we are happy to introduce you a truly modern yet useful 

                                            Coin Pouch

This is a tetrahedron zipper pouch - transformer. A new interesting design will definitely catch your eye. Zip it up to a  coin purse, unzip to a long ribbon. Zippers are reliable and easy to use, and the fun design will never get you bored of it.

       


Incredibly convenient Coin Pouch has a major variety of styles and can be used for

  • coins
  • keys
  • memory sticks
  • jewelry
  • etc...

What is it made from?

This 3-D triangle purse is made from

  • zipper
  • textile ribbons
  • leather           (limited edition)
  • crystal gems (limited edition)


                             It is small enough and easily fits  into your pocket.

                               


You can use Coin Pouch by yourself, or to make an original present to your parents, sisters & brothers, sweetheart and even kids & grandparents.

We use just high quality materials, so you can be sure that there's no danger for your health - nowadays it's a very important aspect.  


Limited Edition

Specially for sophisticated taste we are happy to introduce a Limited Edition of Coin Pouch. It consists of 2 styles (male and female) and is made of high quality leather and crystal beads so the whole attention will belong to you wherever you go.

        &         


Your Support:

The prototypes of Coin Pouch are created and we just  need your help to transform this idea into a reality and make your life a bit easier and colorful. Your support for the production of Tetrahedron Zipper Pouch - Transformer will help us to create for you a high quality product

If this is still not a product for you but you like our idea feel free to share it with your friends and people who might be interested in it.

Thank you for attention and... together Brick by Brick we can make this Life a Miracle!

story:
Featured on Washington post, vulcon post, the malaymail and la miranda de grand optic

 http://www.washingtonpost.com/blogs/innovations/wp/2013/12/11/this-entrepreneur-in-singapore-developed-build-your-own-sunglasses/

 Revolutionary Concept by Nuke:

A revolutionary screwless modular eyewear system that is fully cross compatible and completely interchangeable across parts that are different in shape, design, size, colours and applications. The possibilities are limitless.



Nuke Venom

It is a patent pending, completely screwless hinge that allows complete interchangeablity and cross compatibility between your lenses/frames and temples, regardless of shape, size, design, colours or applications. This is the heart of the worlds first modular system designed for eyewear. And backing us up on indiegogo will give you massive savings. Lets unite to change the way the eyewear industry has operated. Freedom Changes Everything.



venom configurations

 

Please use a PC based web browser using either google chrome or firefox mozilla. and go to www.nukeoptics.com to try our PC Browser based web configurator. Give it about 30s to load- then it should work very fast.Use this web configurator to see just how powerful a single modular system can be;) share it with your friend or family to see how cool this modular concept is. It bring customisation to a whole new level for specs and sunglasses.

 


 

For the first ever nuke venom batch, we have made designs to cater to 4 primary applications- Spectacles (V2), Lifestyle (V4, V41), Sports (V6) and Saftey Z87.1 (V8). Choose the configurations you need and start building your own eyewear using the different frames, lenses and temples. Create that perfect pair that fits your personality or needs.

You can download our pdf to know more about venom and the choices it offers below

Download the NUKE VENOM PDF Catalogue

or 

you can visit or customisation software at our website www.nukeoptics.com to see how your customised pair looks like. Please note to enjoy the huge savings you will have to purchase it via our perks on indiegogo. Our website's customisation software was designed to show you what your configuration looks like with all the different choices that you have. Any combinations goes and the great part is once you recieve your first set you can still continue to build , upgrade or replace your eyewear or sunglasses anytime you feel like it.

 v2 actual frame look


V2 Spectacles (frame choices)- you can bring the specs to the nearest optician to fix in your prescription lenses.


 v4 actual frame- RX clip for prescription lenses is available( pic above the frame). We do not make the prescription lenses, you can bring it to the nearest optical shop to make the prescription lenses.


V4 Lifestyle (frame & lens choices)


v41 actual frame- RX clip for prescription lenses is available( pic above the frame). We do not make the prescription lenses, you can bring it to the nearest optical shop to make the prescription lenses.


V41 Lifestyle  (frame & lens choices)

v6 actual frame- RX clip for prescription lenses is available( pic above the frame). We do not make the prescription lenses, you can bring it to the nearest optical shop to make the prescription lenses.


V6 Sports (frame & lens choices)


v8 actual frame- RX clip for prescription lenses is available( pic above the frame). We do not make the prescription lenses, you can bring it to the nearest optical shop to make the prescription lenses.

V8 Safety (frame & lens choices)



V- Temples (temple colour choices)


 

 


 

Lens technical specs 


we conducted a meet the backer sessions:) overwhelming response and people loved our concept


What's in the insanely cool looking box?



*The venom case is pure white in colour with the black portions as shown in pics. The picture of the case shows light grey so that it stands out against the white back ground. The Venom case fit up to 3 frame/lens/temples + 2* 2 piece lenses, 2* 1piece lenses and microfibre bag

The Lens Construction



The Pros Of a single modular system for eyewear

A)  Parts Replacement: if something breaks all you need to do is replace the specific part that is broken like the temples, frames or lenses. There will never be a need to buy a totally new pair.

B)  Configurations- Chose between 3 Nuke Venom Configurations. 1) Venom Basic, 2) Venom Advance and 3) Venom Pro. "Venom Basic" is meant for those who has a single eyewear need. "Venom Advance" is meant for those who have multiple needs of eyewear. "Venom Pro" is for couples, families, individuals or teams who have different or same eyewear needs but want it in a single product. As Nuke Venom is fully cross compatible you can switch your looks with any other nuke venom product line any time your feel like it.

C) Add Ons: All Nuke Venom products including safety, lifestyle and sports models have the ability to add an rx clip to cater to those who need prescription eyewear.

D) Upgrades: Side shields and protective inner sponges for our safety line, can be purchased as upgrades when you need them.

E) Upgrade- buy a specific part upgrade whenever you feel like it, or if we release a really cool looking design.

F)  Customise the Venom way: Customisation now comes right to your doorstep. Literally. In this concept you actually build the look you want for each day, based on your own complete freedom of choice for the parts that represent you. For the first time we are not the manufacturers of your eyewear , YOU ARE.

the pros of a single modular system is really massive and it will only get better without ever having to buy a whole new pair again. Its allows us to introduce new technologies or innovations without ever having to burn a hole in your pocket because we just need to work on improving that specific part and not create a whole new pair. We save and you save as well. Nuke Venom creates a whole new world of possibilities for you, your friends,  and even families. This is about the common man's right to freedom. "FREEDOM  CHANGES EVERYTHING'

 

Where we are at :Research, Development, design and colours


Prototypes and the last tage before mass production






It took us about 1 year to come up with the most robust modular system and a further 8 months to come up with the actual prototype designs, shapes, colours and moulds of every single item. Throughout this time consuming and expensive process it was a huge financial strain on the company. As big as the project sounds we are a team of 5, and we had to operate this project in a very controlled environment or lose everything we had worked for.  In the last 6 months of the project we stopped releasing any new models and even delayed reordering out of stock items, so that we could dedicate any available financial resources to this project. We are glad we took this step to make this project a reality, so that the world could enjoy the first eyewear sunglass modular system that actually works at so many different levels. The journey was though but it was well worth it. We are very close to completion.



Protection- Patent

The venom system is a patent pending system.


Moulds

For the first release of our nuke venom line up, it required the building of completely new moulds ground up- a whopping total of 9 of them. Because venom is unlike anything that is available on the market, everything from the frames, temples, right up to the cases had to be built from scratch with new moulds. The level of precision engineering involved in our moulds made this even tougher(took us a total of 6 months to get all the moulds in perfect condition and measurements). Anyone who has manufacturing experience knows this is the toughest, most time consuming and most expensive part of the project besides the entire research and development phase. The great news is this portion has been done. For a small company like us this was a massive undertaking.

 

Indiegogoians here is were we need your help

We want to be more of a crowd-driven eyewear company than a product driven or investor driven company. With NUKE, PEOPLE decide what they want their eyewear to be. The faster we hit our goal the faster we can begin production which would be approximately 30 days.

 

The manufacturing of each part requires a higher  than normal minimum order quantity, so that the price remains competitive and low in accordance to the more expensive  high level of imported grade materials we require to manufacture each venom part.  The current funds we have are not sufficient to produce venom at the level we require and we are looking at raising an additional 15,000 USD which will enable us to start manufacturing nuke venom immediately, with the best possible materials and start delivering it around 15 days after the campaign ends. This is a revolutionary concept and very much hope to bring this into reality. You can help make this project a reality by being an early backer of this project only on indiegogo. You can select some really awesome perks, that allows you to get Nuke Venom at a real bargain before it is officially launched. This is to thank all those who have supported us since day one.

 

Track-Record

We have been in business for about 1 yr 9 months, The manufacturer selected for  this project have worked with us from day one. . People have trusted nuke to make quality products. The only difference this time is we wanted to make not only a good product but a great product. A product that could change an industry and give freedom back to our consumers. It’s a massive undertaking for a small very young company. 


NukeSquad.


CEO and Design- Samy (Bachelors of business management, Royal Melbourne Institute of technology, SIM, Singapore)

Operations-ila (diploma in material science and engineering, republic polytechnic, Singapore)

Sales and Marketing- Yanies (Singapore)

Chuck Wright- Nuke Venom Operations, Marketing, USA , RIDER (University of Central Florida, Mechanical Engineering)

Nick Sanchez- Nuke Operations, Sales USA, RIDER (Dr.Phillips High School, Center of International Studies)

DSMEDIA- Web software, animation. These are the guys who helped us to bring the project to another level through their niche expertise. We are forever grateful to the huge favour done by these insanely cool guys from ds media.


 

Please do support us and we do hope you feel this concept and system is revolutionary. Please re-tweet, share and like this on ours or your own facebook page. Any help will be greatly appreciated and will give us the motivation to continue innovating revolutionary concepts with really cool designs. We are also excited to bring this product to retailers or distributors worldwide please contact us or purchase the retailer pak "perks" to try us out.Here are some of the unique stuff you can get free if you purchase the premium dealer pak during this campaign.

Display table and cabinets for retailers who get the premium dealer pack

CEO: samy@nukeoptics.com

Press media: samy@nukeoptics.com

Retail Sales/Marketing: yanies@nukeoptics.com

Indiegogo enquiries/information/rewards/orders: ila@nukeoptics.com

W:wwwnukeoptics.com(great for checking the various configuration for venom system)

Facebbok: www.nukeoptics.com/facebook

Instgram:@nukeoptics

Twitter:@nukeoptics

 

FAQs

How do we select our colours, shapes, designs ? Based on the above list or visitng our website www.nukeoptics.com , you can select the colours you need and email us at ila@nukeoptics.com .  At nukeoptics.com on the top right hand hand section there will be an order list. once you are fully satisfied with your selction just cut copy paste the order list  in the following format

Name: john doe

Contact: 78965431 (please ensure this hp is an easily contactable number so that the delivery guys can contact you)

Address: Please rememember to ensure details are correct including postal code, country, state and unit number.

Perk Bought: $65

Order List: this is the entire list that you would have seen at the top right hand corner of nukeoptics.com while configuring your set. We will based your order on this list. In case you have a change of mind before we ship on a different colour, please remember to send us an email togther with the orginal email order list, so that we are aware of the history of our conversation.

In any way , ila will get in touch with you about 1.5 weeks before we start shipping out to confirm any last minute changes.

Free Shipping?

By singpost it takes about 12-20 days worldwide to all countries except USA and Singapore.There is very limited tracking for this. There is a shipping upgrade at $29 usd within 5-7 days by DHL with full tracking capabilities. Customers can upgrade their shipping options if choose to do so.

For USA we will be using USPS. Both Chuck Wright and Nick Sanchez who are part of our operations and sales team for USA, will be ensuring timely delivery of all USA orders. It will take about 4-6 days for those living in USA. What will happen is we will be packing all the usa based orders from singapore and ship them over as pallets with the address already printed on the box itself to chuck and nick in USA. Once it arrives they will ship it out via USPS. this is one of the most cost efficient and safe methods of delivery.

For Singapore it will be via singpost 3-5 days or self collection at our head office.

I would like to be a retailer of nuke.  Drop us an email at yanies@nukeoptics.com . or get your hands on the retail pak "perk" . It's a huge savings before we release it worldwide. As a retailer you would be expected to sell the product at the MSRP price and not the indiegogo price.

I would like to purchase exclusive rights for distribution in my country? USA, Singapore,  and Malaysia is unavailable.The rest of the countries are available for exclusive distribution rights which will be effective only after campaign on indiegogo ends. The exclusive distributorship rights is dependant on size of country and would require a minimum purchase value of between 45,000 USD to 250,000 USD for a one year contract.

 Revolutionary Concept by Nuke:
A revolutionary screwless modular eyewear system that is fully cross compatible and completely interchangeable across parts that are different in shape, design, size, colours and applications. The possibilities are limitless.





Nuke Venom

story:
Only a few Days to Go! Thank you for your support :)

STRETCH GOALS: 

$3000: Perks & Incentives for Contributors + larger Quantity of Tees, Tanks & Scarves for Online Shop on freemaple.ca 

$5000: Perks + 2 feature pieces (for Online Shop &) to be launched in exclusive boutiques in Toronto, Vancouver & Victoria

$7000: Perks + entire micro-collection (for Online Shop &) to be launched in exclusive boutiques in Toronto, Vancouver & Victoria

Micro-collection >>> 



FREE MAPLE : CONSCIOUS FASHION INSPIRED BY CANADA

Feel the love in every thread. Free Maple is proud to be supported by YOU. 

Conscious Fashion made in Canada. All fabrics to be sourced within North America. Organic Cotton, Organic Hemp, Organic Merino Wool, looking into Organic Bamboo. I hope you align with these beliefs and practices. Donate to the campaign and help support our budding company!



Step 1: Micro Collection 

Ladies Tank, Mens Tee, Dress, and Infinity Scarf. This first Micro Collection will be available as perks for our campaign and included on our Online Shop www.freemaple.ca

 

     

                       

Step 2: 
i) Launch Upgraded Online Shop

ii) Create Samples for Spring/Summer 2015 (Designs Complete)


                Preview the S/S15 Collection!  More Fashion Flats to come!

We will create 25 prototypes of our  Spring / Summer 2015 collection. This entire collection will be presented to buyers and at Canadian Fashion Shows by Fall 2014. We will arrive in local shops (Toronto/Victoria/Vancouver) by Spring 2015 and available online.


Our Ambition is to form a collaborative community around sustainable fashion and heart-centered business. What's your master craft? Want to grow with our tribe? kimberly@freemaple.ca

We see fashion as the ancient human culture that it is. We see fashion beyond trends and waves of publicity. Fashion is part of human expression. It’s time for this industry to become a role model of sustainable practices to promote a future where conscious business practices are standard.


We're loving the earth one thread at a time.
We make clothes for people who value feeling the love in every thread.

OUR TRIBE - collaborative Canadian artists making conscious consumption part of the fashion conversation, contributing a lifestyle clothing brand made exclusively from sustainable, planet-friendly, and upcycled materials sourced in North America.

What is Free Maple Movement?

The name represents Canada - not only where our collaborative design team lives and creates - “Maple” is recognized as the symbol of Canada and has come to achieve connotations of freedom, unity and peace.
"Movement" is what happens when people come together around great ideas to make great things happen in the world!

Beyond clothing, we are proud to stand up for a new community power within which we are mindful during every consuming experience. We have the ultimate power to decide what is sold based on what we buy, and if we invest into these business practices in our respective communities, we will be part of leveraging consumption into a more balanced place. We can THRIVE together. 

Co-Create for a Healthy Green Planet

How can we "Be Local + Think Global"?
Participate in your local Being-ness: your community, your profession, your neighbourhood, your circle of friends and family. Engage with our global tribe. Where do you fit in? 

Participate in creating beauty. Let's promote a world of lasting, quality items and an abundance of green spaces, while being 100% compassionate and conscious of the communities we all live in. It only takes your commitment to a decision for a more beautiful world!

At Free Maple, we are proud to make everything “With Love and Integrity”. Our seeded paper tags which come on Free Maple garments are a small contribution to a greener earth. Simply immerse into water and bury into soil! With some love and patience, we will all wake up to a greener reality.

                                

Fabrics, Textiles and Production:

At Free Maple, we make conscious products which work in harmony with the earth. We will use sustainable fabrics like Modal, Organic Bamboo, and Tencel which is biodegradable. Using small, independent manufacturers creates less pollution, less waste, and empowers local creative genius! 

This is your planet, our planet, the mother planet. We think it is important to offer transparent production so our consumers know exactly what they are getting: facebook.com/freemaplemovement

Synergy is key to achieve sustainable practices, holistic price points, humane distribution of wealth and beautiful expression of culture. This is what we believe FASHION really stands for!

Thanks for checking out FREE MAPLE and helping us fund conscious fashion. Our success is a direct reflection of our fans and supporters and we are absolutely excited about what we are going to achieve together! Make sure you LOVE and follow us on www.facebook.com/freemaplemovement


Big thank you to local musician, NOAH EDWARDS (Victoria, BC) for contributing the musical track for our campaign video. Check him out here: noahedwardsband.com

Donate to the campaign and help support our budding company!Step 1: Micro Collection Ladies Tank, Mens Tee, Dress, and Infinity Scarf. This first Micro Collection will be available as perks for our campaign and included on our Online Shop www.freemaple.ca                             Step 2: i) Launch Upgraded Online Shopii) Create Samples for Spring/Summer 2015 (Designs Complete)                Preview the S/S15 Collection!  More Fashion Flats to come!We will create 25 prototypes of our  Spring / Summer 2015 collection. This entire collection will be presented to buyers and at Canadian Fashion Shows by Fall 2014. We will arrive in local shops (Toronto/Victoria/Vancouver) by Spring 2015 and available online.Our Ambition is to form a collaborative community around sustainable fashion and heart-centered business. What's your master craft? Want to grow with our tribe? kimberly@freemaple.caWe see fashion as the ancient human culture that it is. We see fashion beyond trends and waves of publicity. Fashion is part of human expression. It’s time for this industry to become a role model of sustainable practices to promote a future where conscious business practices are standard. We're loving the earth one thread at a time. We make clothes for people who value feeling the love in every thread.OUR TRIBE - collaborative Canadian artists making conscious consumption part of the fashion conversation, contributing a lifestyle clothing brand made exclusively from sustainable, planet-friendly, and upcycled materials sourced in North America.
What is Free Maple Movement?
The name represents Canada - not only where our collaborative design team lives and creates - “Maple” is recognized as the symbol of Canada and has come to achieve connotations of
freedom, unity and peace. "Movement" is what happens when people come together around great ideas to make great things happen in the world!
Beyond clothing, we are proud to stand up for a new community power within which we are mindful during every consuming experience. We have the ultimate power to decide what is sold based on what
we buy, and if we invest into these business practices in
our respective communities, we will be part of leveraging consumption into a more balanced place. We can THRIVE together. Co-Create for a Healthy Green Planet
How can we "Be Local + Think Global"? Participate in your local Being-ness: your community, your profession, your neighbourhood, your circle of friends and family. Engage with our global tribe. Where do you fit in? Participate in creating beauty. Let's promote a world of lasting, quality items and an abundance of green spaces, while being 100%
compassionate and conscious of the communities we all live in. It only takes your commitment to a decision for a more beautiful world!At Free Maple, we are
proud to make everything “With Love and Integrity”. Our seeded paper tags which come on Free Maple garments are a small contribution to a greener earth. Simply immerse into water and bury into soil! With some love and patience, we will all wake up to a greener reality.                                
Fabrics,
Textiles and Production:
At Free Maple, we make conscious products which work in harmony with the earth. We will use sustainable fabrics like Modal, Organic Bamboo, and Tencel which is biodegradable. Using small, independent manufacturers creates less pollution, less waste, and empowers local creative genius! This is your planet, our planet, the mother planet. We think it is important to offer transparent production so our consumers know exactly what they are getting: facebook.com/freemaplemovementSynergy is key to achieve sustainable practices, holistic price points, humane distribution of wealth and
beautiful expression of culture. This is what we believe FASHION really stands
for!Thanks for checking out FREE MAPLE and helping us fund conscious fashion. Our success is a direct reflection of our fans and supporters and we are absolutely excited about what we are going to achieve together! Make sure you LOVE and follow us on www.facebook.com/freemaplemovementBig thank you to local musician, NOAH EDWARDS (Victoria, BC) for contributing the musical track for our campaign video. Check him out here: noahedwardsband.com

story:
A Better Face Mask, Made In USA

No sewing, no elastic, no wires. The Comfort Mask is secured in place with two snaps on either side and two adjustable ear loops that are so lightweight and soft you'll barely notice they're there.

In June 2020, we started offering a face mask that was safe as well as comfortable. Over the past 7 months, we have worked to refine our design based on feedback. We have now created what we believe to be the best version of our mask to date. 

The newly (re)designed Comfort Mask is made of ultra comfortable Ponte de Roma (66% Rayon / 30% Nylon / 4% Spandex) double knit fabric.  The masks has two layers, connected at the chin. It attaches behind the ears with two adjustable-length ear loops. The Comfort Mask comes in nautical navy. This mask is soft and stretches to conform better to your face.

The design concept is a folded shape that gives ample breathing room and contours tightly to your nose to help minimize fogging with glasses. 




All day comfort

The Comfort Mask was designed to provide comfort and protection to those who are wearing masks just for a quick trip to the grocery store as well as our essential workers who are masked 8+ hours per day. The double layer fabric helps keep out pesky allergens, airborne contaminants and unwanted germs. The Comfort Mask is free of elastic straps that could pull your hair and those painful metal nose guards. This mask sits easily on the ears and spreads out tension evenly. It also is made from a material that makes talking less of a challenge.

Imagine that feeling you get when you put on a cozy pair of sweatpants? We designed this product to give you that same feeling of comfort and safety when you wear our mask. 

Why You Will Love The Comfort Mask:

  • Easy on the ears: distributed pressure eliminates any pain on the back of the ears.
  • Easy on the nose: the folded shape allows the mask to avoid squishing your nose.
  • Folded to fit your nose: no air gap means greatly reduced fogging on eyeglasses.
  • Easier to talk: minimal chin shape means the mask doesn't pull as you talk.
  • Adjustable fit: slide toggles easily change the size of the mask to fit well.

The Comfort Mask is meant to fit faces of most shapes and sizes. Avoid mask fatigue by choosing a mask that is not bothersome to wear.


 

The Final Product 

The Comfort Mask is a two-layer design cut from one piece of fabric, folded in half, connected at the chin. The Comfort Mask is pre-shrunk to prevent shrinking in the wash. The adjustable toggles allow the mask to accommodate a much larger range of head sizes and the ear loops are gentle on the ears. Finally, our disposable filter has been redesigned to be attached securely with ease and doesn’t protrude at the corners.

 

Zootility’s mission is to design, launch, and manufacture exciting, functional, everyday products. We are a team of 12 people, with 13 laser systems, and a 10,000 sf design & manufacturing studio in Portland, Maine, USA.

The question we want to answer is: why has so much of our manufacturing left the country? We think there is a better way. We believe we can reimagine everyday items so that we can be self sufficient. Using lasers, quality materials, and designs that inspire, we are committed to products that will last a lifetime and support keeping jobs and technology in our local community.

We started with a credit card sized multitool called PocketMonkey, and through eight years of hard work, now have a workshop with over a dozen lasers.

We are continuously pushing the limits of what we are capable of, to come up with minimalist designs that can be made from lasers and we can be proud of. We use quality materials and keep all of our products Made In USA.

Support our journey, back our project today. Thank you in advance!


 

Risks and challenges

Like all new projects, there are always risks and challenges. We know from experience it takes a lot of planning, hard work and perseverance to successfully launch a new product. The team is confident we have taken the right steps to mitigate risks such as shipment delays or product defects. Over the past 9 months we have been prototyping, testing and refining to make sure the final product we deliver to our backers far exceeds expectations. The team at Zootility Health will update you regularly on progress. If there are any issues, we promise to communicate with you every step of the way!

Long-lasting design

We tested many different fabric types, snaps & ear loop adjusters to come up with a mask that is long lasting and durable to multiple washes and all day everyday usage. We also preshrunk the masks to avoid the shape changing drastically after washes.

Reusability and recyclability

The mask was designed to be reusable for multiple days of use. Packaging of the product is minimal in excess packaging that would normally end up in a landfill.

Sustainable Distribution

We don't outsource to overseas manufacturers. We are able to scale our own products to be manufactured and sourced right in our Portland, Maine location.

story:
The ĀPA raincoat was born out of necessity: Coats today simply cannot compete with the ever changing weather. Traveling through an urban city, we struggle with sweaty plastic coats in humid subways and trench coats that don't adequately protect us from heavy rain. We have sports coats that don't look good in the office and fashionable coats that don't protect. We dress in heavy coats or light coats in the morning only to have the temperatures shift without warning during the day.

Rain, sun, humid, hot and cold temperatures - sometimes all in one day.

This is why in the spring of 2016 during a hot rainy day in Brussels we decided to completely reinvent the concept of the raincoat. Our team went on a journey throughout Europe. Over 18 months, we traveled to top factories, labs and suppliers in Belgium, France, Switzerland, Italy, Germany and Poland to create a coat that would protect us from the changing elements while looking our best.

Waterproof | Breathable | Adaptable | Lightweight | Functional | 100% Made in Europe

ĀPA is the Sanskrit word for the element of water and we built our coats to live up to the name: The ĀPA coat is equipped with top of the line technologies used in high-end extreme sports apparel, offering incredible protection from rain along with breathable membranes and lining that adapt to shifting temperatures. All packed into a stylish coat practically designed for the urban lifestyle - 100% made in Europe with top quality materials and manufacturers.

TECHNOLOGIES

NanoSphere®

ĀPA is using Schoeller Nanosphere® fabric - one of the most advanced waterproofing technologies in the market today.

The whole coat is made from a three layer Nano Fabric with incredible waterproofing characteristics. The fabric also repels water better than any other technology. Nanoparticles on the fiber form a fine structure similar to the natural surface of a leaf. Water, dirt and oil simply roll off the fabric - without any coating that tends to fade over time!

At the same time the fabric is super lightweight and feels soft to the touch. It's the best technology we tested and we tested them all. Including the best fabrics from Gore-Tex and others. 
 


The coat's surface is also dust and stain repellent, creating a self-cleaning effect. Nothing sticks to the surface of the coat. Better yet, the more you use it in the rain the cleaner it gets.
 

 

C-Change ®

C-Change® is a revolutionary Thermo Adaptive membrane that adapts to the changing temperatures. When it's cold the fibers tighten up to increase heat retention. When it's hot the fibers open up to breathe. It works best  between (but not limited to) 10°C - 25°C | 50°F - 77°F to always keeps you protected, comfortable and dry.
 

 

Climate Shell LayersTM 

A unique design that combines 3 specialized layers of lining and interlining: breathable, moisture absorbent and heat retention layers provide you with a wonderful balance of warmth and breathability.
 


NOSO Taped Seams®

The coat's stitchings are reinforced with the highest quality durable waterproof taping, for complete protection and increased durability.
 


Lightweight Materials

We use lightweight materials that are wonderfully comfortable and make the coat easy to pack into a bag or suitcase when traveling.
On average coats weight less than 0.8KG | 1.7 LB.
 


DESIGN


Top European Quality 

Our coats are 100% made in Europe from materials to manufacturing: Belgian design, Swiss technology and fabrics, Italian and French lining, Polish manufacturing and German and Spanish hardware. A combination of the best traditions of quality and technological innovations that Europe has to offer.
 


Customizable:

Each ĀPA coat style has unique adjustable features so you'll be ready for anything from riding a bike, walking in the rain, a day in the office, to a night out! 

The Classic has adjustable wrists and a removable hood for a wonderfully sharp look on top of a suit. 
 


The Parka has adjustable wrists, waist and hood for more sporty activities. 

 

 


5 Practical Pockets & Headphones Buckle
 

 

Green technologies and responsible manufacturing are at the heart of our core values of being innovative in a transparent and sustainable way.

We are proud to have all of our materials and 100% of the production process done in Europe, following high standards of working conditions and sustainable manufacturing.

Our manufacturers are Bluesign® approved with responsible use of resources, clean processes with controlled air and water emissions, safe environments for workers and safe products for consumers. We also use nickel free hardware (anti-allergenic) and are free from any harmful chemicals.




CLASSIC

 

PARKA

 


WHAT IS MY SIZE?

Our coats have a large fit with long sleeves. If you are usually in-between sizes, we recommend you take the smaller one. You can always exchange it if the fit isn’t perfect (see Exchange Policy). 
 

EXCHANGE POLICY:

We are happy to exchange your coat for any reason. Just return your ĀPA Raincoat plus the shipping fee both ways, and we will send you another one right away. As we are just starting up and offering our raincoats at a highly discounted price on Indiegogo, we won’t be able to accept returns.
 

WARRANTY POLICY:

All of our raincoats are covered with a Limited Warranty/Lifetime Guarantee similar to other high end apparel products. Our raincoats are fully warranted against defects in materials and workmanship for the lifetime of the product. If a product ever fails due to a manufacturing defect, even after extended use, we will repair the product, without charge, or replace it.

Damage caused by normal wear and tear, accident, improper care or the natural breakdown of materials over extended time and use are not covered by the lifetime Guarantee. Damage not covered under warranty will be repaired for a nominal fee.



ĀPA was founded by Franco-Belgian designer Léa Potache Stein in collaboration with colleagues from top European luxury brands. With a first collection over 280% funded on Kickstarter, ĀPA is proud to present its MODERN RAINCOATS, offering the opportunity to look impeccable, regardless of what the weather is.

Video & Visuals by Studio MatchBox
 

Help us by sharing APA raincoat with your friends!

Know someone who would love the ĀPA Raincoat? Help us spread the word by sharing via social media! Sharing is caring <3







 

WHY CROWDFUNDING

Our coats are made with some of the most advanced – and most expensive – materials and technologies in the market. Selling our coats through traditional retailers with the normal markup would require us to sell at a very high price. We wanted to democratize the technologies and launch our coats at an affordable price.

Crowdfunding provides an amazing platform to bring our products directly to customers at a low price that cannot be found anywhere else. All the funds we raise on Indiegogo will be injected into the manufacturing of our coats, in introducing new colors, and in the development of additional groundbreaking products. A win-win for everyone!

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

The coats you are seeing are prototypes, you can expect the final product to be even more polished.

For the past 18+ months, our team has been working night and day to refine our design, manufacturing process and the logistics. All the fabrics and elements are ready for production. We have partnered with top European manufacturers and quality control teams to ensure that we send out the highest quality coats to you.

We are aware that there are always unforeseen issues, but we have anticipated and planned for potential risks and have built a rock-solid production and delivery plan. However, if by chance anything unexpected happens, we promise to keep you informed, both during the campaign and afterwards.

story:
We’re all in this together for the foreseeable future and that means staying safe and healthy.

Dynamite is preparing comic fans for the "new normal" with neck gaiter masks designed around our most beloved characters, illustrated by some of the biggest names in comics.

Neck-gaiter masks aren’t just a typical face mask, they’re a multi-function head accessory with a variety of wearing options that make it useful long after the pandemic is history. Wear it on your face… or re-fold it as a neckerchief… a bandana… a head covering… and even a full hood.

Awesome Artists & Cool Characters!

Some of your favorite comic artists are here - Joseph Michael Linsner, Peach Momoko, Gabriel Dell' Otto, Frank Thorne, Artgerm, and more! 

Zombie Vampirella from Die!Namite by Peach Momoko

Bettie Page by Joseph Michael Linsner

Characters including - Vampirella, Red Sonja, Evil Ernie, Purgatori, and Bettie Page!  Wear your favorites around town and show off your style with these cool comic art neck gaiters!  

Masks are the new life accessory for all of us and that means finding the accessory that best represents you and your lifestyle.

  • 25cm flat tube width x 50cm length
  • UV protection
  • Multiple ways to fold and wear it!

 

BUY A $75 SET OF 4 MASKS

GET $200 WORTH OF GOODS!

Fans who want to get four masks get an INCREDIBLE DEAL!  The $75 pledge level comes with $200 worth of goods!  You can select the four styles and characters you like the most PLUS you get two random $50 variants for your comic collection!  We're giving the goods to you with a deal so sweet its like hitting the lottery!  Show your style and your savvy with this incredible deal!

Not a medical device, For fashion accessory purposes only.

MORE ACCESSORIES FOR YOU...

ADD ON THESE COOL VAMPIRELLA AND RED SONJA PINS TO YOUR ORDER!

Show off your pieces of flair with these sweet Vampirella and Red Sonja pins!  They are the perfect accessory to add to your shirt, lapel, or cap to say "I love comics!"  

MORE ACCESSORIES FOR YOUR WALL...

story:
My name is Way Zen. I am a fashion designer and the founder of JSong Way.

JSong stands for Joy and Song. My goal is for our designs to bring Joy and Song to all people.

My company is 23 year young. When we started, I designed in New York and sent sketches to China for production and my team wholesaled the merchandise to boutiques. We have been featured in fashion media outlets such as WWD.

THE PROBLEM

As we grew, we learned about climate change and how fashion is one of the biggest contributors of pollution. We experienced this first hand as a fashion wholesaler. We were sitting on mountains of inventory and concerned about competitive pricing, which was overwhelming pressure! We realized that we would not survive if we continued to do business this way, let alone bring Joy and Song to the world.

OUR SOLUTION

In 2014, we made our transition to focus on sustainable fashion and moved our production back to New York City. We changed our business model to Made on Demand with zero inventory waste. We are building a studio that has transparent practices, so our customers know who makes your clothing, how it is made, and where it is made.

Our sustainability practices:

  • Made locally in New York City.
  • Made on demand with zero inventory waste.
  • Use minimal dyes and natural fabrics when possible.
  • Use less resources to create beautiful high quality fashion by up-cycling, re-styling and making alterations.
  • Develop unique patterns to use fabric scraps for new designs.
  • Make high quality products that can be passed on to future generations.
  • Teach and share techniques to our interns, and also through workshops for designers.
  • Observe fair trade rules and UN Sustainable Development Goals.
  • Open and honest company operation policy.

Our storefront studio is currently a loving space for making our designs, for people to visit and learn about our techniques, and to share our inspirations with customers and like-minded designers.

WHAT IS OUR PROCESS?

We create our designs in-house and present our designs to customers in our studio. We also share photos on our website jsongway.com and through our own Way Magazine.  After customers select the design from our samples, we custom make each order according to customers’ measurements. That means no inventory waste.

To make our clothes with zero waste, we create unique garment structures to make fabulous designs using fabric scraps and by up-cycling.

We believe that we can change the world through our business process. We currently have an in-house team of 4 staff and we are able to deliver 22 to 30 orders monthly. We are about breakeven.

 

WHAT DO WE NEED?

We need to hire 3 more craftspeople and 2 marketing communication interns. We also need to redesign our website with capabilities to collaborate and for customers to place customized order more easily. The funding will help us build our sustainable studio successfully.

3 Craftspeople = $25,344

$16/Hour x 8 Hours/Day x 22 Days x 3 Staff = $8,448 x 3 MonthsTraining

2 Communication interns = $11,691

$15/Hour X 15 Hours per week X 4.33 Weeks (1 month) = $974.25

X 2 Interns= $1,948.50 x 6 Months = $11,691

Website Redesign = $11,865​

$11,865 with functions for customization and collaboration

Equipment = Total $1,100

1 Singer Embroidery Machine $700 

Used Juki Sewing Machine $400

WHY SHOULD YOU SUPPORT JSONG WAY?

Our success will not only impact our company. We truly believe that if JSong Way, an independent designer company can practice eco-fashion, any other designer in any corner of the world can use our model to practice sustainability, use fashion as a tool to protect our planet and bring beauty, Joy and Song to the world. Please join our joyful green revolution from JSong Way in New York City to the World.

Thank You!

HOW YOU CAN HELP

Purchase one of our perks or purchase from our website: www.jsongway.com.

If you can’t contribute financially: spread the word + share on your social channels!

Visit our website for more information: www.jsongway.com

Subscribe to our YouTube channel.

story:
Hey everybody!

I have an order in for Moon Guitars T shirts and hoodies! As soon as they come in, I will get some good pictures and have them available through my website permanently. I'll also add some different kinds of shirts and different colors over time as well.

If you would like a shirt or a hoodie, T-shirts will be $25 and hoodies will be $45. Be sure to let me know what sizes you'd like. Hoodies will all be black with my white logo, T-shirts are available in black or heather grey.

All pre-orders will be ready to ship by July 1, 2019 (hopefully sooner). I will contact you directly for a shipping address, or will hand deliver local orders.

 

Thank you!

story:
Our Story

For several years, right around spring, I’d been searching for a versatile, stylish and comfortable shoe that went with most of my warm weather wardrobe staples of sun dresses, denim, and capris.  Then, last spring, I reached a tipping point:  I realized that my casual, seasonal search was not going to be enough if I was ever going to find that shoe.  With dogged determination, I began an exhaustive search that included visiting every conceivable store and boutique in my area, not to mention an online search that, when all was said and done, included hundreds of sites.

I still came up empty-handed.

Before I knew it, spring had ended and we were days away from a family trip to Lake Como.  Disappointed at not having found what I was looking for, I made do with what I had and ended up packing way too many shoes.  Some were sandals, the stilettos of which did not survive the uneven cobblestones (and I ended up mercilessly shredding the heels).  The others were flats which were comfortable for exploring the lakeside towns on foot, but inappropriate for wearing to brunch or dinner.

At Lake Como, I was inspired by its limpid, emerald-colored water, the sherbet-colored lakeside homes, and its laid-back but glamorous vibe.   Then, one evening, as I fed vanilla ice cream to my younger son, Bryan, I struck up a conversation with a woman with whom I had been sharing the park bench.

I learned that her name was Valentina and she was born in that village nearly eighty years before.  She was the most stylish woman I had encountered in the three years that we had been living in Europe.  Our conversation was brief, but Valentina made a lasting impression on me.  It was through her that I understood that elegance is possible for every woman at every stage of her life and, when done right, a woman feels empowered, not encumbered.

When we returned home, I realized that this elusive shoe would never appear in my closet unless I did something about it.  So, I decided to design it myself.  The “Valentina,” my first design, is the result of my inspiring experiences on that fateful trip.

Donna Laria, my brand, evolved similarly.  The Ancient Romans referred to what is now Lake Como as Larius.  Donna means woman or lady, in Italian.  Hence, Donna Laria, or Lady of the Lake.  Donna Laria is my muse.  She represents an attitude; the spirit of every woman who, in her daily life and with all of its demands, seeks to express her unique beauty elegantly, confidently, and effortlessly.

 

More About the Valentina

Features:

  • 3.25" and 1.75" heel height
  • Sexy wedge style heel
  • Padded insole
  • Secure H-shaped upper

Available in whole sizes only for the time being.  With enough support from this campaign, we may be able to offer half sizes and wide options soon.

 

Meet The Designer

My name is Margaret.  

In my life, I’ve worn lots of hats and lots of shoes.  I believe that women should feel beautiful and confident all the time, but especially in the shoes that take them through each moment of their busy and demanding lives.

I also believe that style or comfort don’t need to be compromised one for the other.

Women can have both!

I’ve visited and lived in lots of places around the world and I’m currently living in Germany where my husband, Kelly, a former fighter pilot in the US Navy, is serving.  We live here with our two boys, Robert and Bryan, and our old Weimaraner, Finnegan.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Shoe manufacturers need a minimum purchase amount to start mass producing shoes.  By pre-purchasing your shoes on this campaign, you contribute to the capital we need to place an order with the manufacturer.
  • Supporters of this campaign will get their choice of high- or low-heel Valentinas just as soon as we can get them to the US.
  • When you select a perk, we do ask for your preferred heel height and size to assist in our production estimates for our manufacturer.  We will verify your specific shoe size and choice of heel before we ship anything to you.

 

Risks & Challenges

We have been working on the shoe design for almost a year and have tested two prototypes.  We are now in consultations with the manufacturer for a third prototype to finalize details.  Once our standards for quality, beauty, and comfort are met, we will be ready to go to mass production.

If the third prototype does not meet our standards, we will continue to work with the manufacturer to refine their processes until we are confident that the shoes going to our supporters meet our specifications.  We will keep you informed at every step on the way.

 

Returns & Exchanges

All purchases must be returned in their original condition within 30 days for a full refund or exchange.  Shoes cannot be returned if they show ANY signs of wear.  When trying the shoes, do NOT wear them on any surface other than carpet.  The shoes must be returned, undamaged, in the original box.  Do not ship the shoe box without the protection of an additional box.  Missing or damaged boxes will be subject to a 20% restocking fee.

For exchanges: please indicate the desired model/size.  We recommend you contact customer service to place your exchange on hold so it does not sell out while we await your package. Please call or send an e-mail with the order number, the item, and size you would like on hold.

If you receive an item that is damaged or defective, please contact us within 30 days of shipment.  After 30 days, we will attempt to assist with repairs and/or obtaining replacement hardware but may be unable to provide a replacement or refund for an irreparable product.

Bottom line:  We are a small company with limited resources.  The above standards are indicative of how we would prioritize our resources in ensuring each contributor is satisfied.  If you are not satisfied, let us know and we will work with you to figure out a solution.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people aren't interested in this shoe, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign! 
    • Visit the Donna Laria Facebook page and "Like" & "Share" us.
    • Visit the Donna Laria Website and sign up for updates and discounts!
  • You can also use Indiegogo's share tools to get the word out!

Thank you!

The Donna Laria Team

The Donna Laria Team

story:
This project has two goals:

  • Create unique rings, built out of scratch resistant ceramic 
  • Launch the Raw Light brand of rings 

With YOUR help, we can make this dream possible!

Vision:

Since getting married 2 years ago I've realized there are a lot of rings that just don't last. The materials that are most commonly used in a wedding band don't really lend themselves to an active lifestyle.  The biggest problem I have with my ring is that I am constantly scratching it up against different surfaces.  Over time this has turned my ring into a worn/scratched mess.

I wanted a ring that I could enjoy wearing without having to worry about the constant scratching and scuffing that come from an active lifestyle.  After going through multiple rings that weren't working, I decided to produce my own.

Material:

We started looking into the various materials that are used in rings when we happened upon pressure forged ceramic.  We wanted to make the ring out of the most scratch resistant material we could find. 

We looked into the current aerospace research and found that the actual blades used in jet engines are made out of this same material, these blades need to be made out of something that won’t scratch or scuff over time, to stay aerodynamic over the lifetime of the jet engine…we decided to take that same material and put it into our ring. 

Design:

We started with a rendering of the basic shape and design we wanted to use for the rings. We settled on a basic band that's rounded on the outside and on the edges. The roundness makes the ring comfortable to wear and gives each one a sleek look.

We wanted to use the world around us to inspire us for the design, and we loved the concept of light… There are so many naturally occurring sources of light in nature that we wanted to capture the raw essence of that light and incorporate that into our design.  

We settled on a design that we absolutely love, and we have received AMAZING feedback from everyone who has seen it.  The ring is a domed, pressure-forged ceramic band that comes in both black and white.  The inner glow is made up of a non-toxic blend of strontium alluminate...the same material you may be used to seeing in higher end swiss watches.  

The glow is rechargeable and lasts a lifetime.

Production Process

Mixing/Molding Glow:

Sizing First Prototype:

Finished Aqua Ring:

Glow Choices:

All glow rings will have the choice of either a white or black ceramic band, and one of the following interior glow colors:

Aqua and Green

Blue and Purple

Red

Why we need your help:  

The rings are already designed and ready to be manufactured. Our biggest hurdle when launching a project like this is being able to garner enough of the raw material and tools to manufacture the rings in each of the sizes and colors we have designed. 

What you can do: 

 Here are three things that can help us. Please do as many as you can

  • Pledge - Pledge for one of the rewards. 
  • Share - Share this page on social media and with friends. 
  • Tell - Let them know this is a unique experience that had not existed until now. 

Sizing:

If you need help finding your ring size. Here is a site that may help.

http://findmyringsize.com
