story:
WHO WE ARE

Myssyfarmi is an award-winning organic farm and an ambitious eco design company from Pöytyä, Finland.

The farm has belonged to the family since the early 19th century. The surrounding nature and the old farm scenery are a source of inspiration for our designs. We want to act as a bridge between the countryside and urban areas off­ering accessories and food products that are 100% traceable and organic. Finnsheep wool as well as organic food products. Myssy* products are handmade in Pöytyä by myssymummot, the local grannies. We get together at knitting circles and enjoy life. Every garment has some granny wisdom knitted in it.

* The word myssy means a beanie in Finnish.

 

WHAT WE BELIEVE IN

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET

By reaching our goal, we will be able to expand our visibility internationally and spread the word about the social and environmental responsibility of companies. Through our work, we hope to inspire others to see that companies do not need to exploit and increase inequality, but instead through their work create well-being in the communities the operate in and promote environmental sustainability.

To thank you for your support, we have a collected some of our most popular products as perks. By supporting us now, you will also help us make our operations smoother - all that we do concentrates on only one season, winter - and even out the workload throughout the year. You will get a Myssy, that you will hold on to forever just in time before the autumn colds.

 

*Farmester collection's retail prices USD 87 – 100

 

*Muffi collection's retail prices USD 82 – 92

 

*Luksus collection's retail prices USD 126 – 137

 

LIFETIME WARRANTY

All Myssy garments are handmade in Finland of a high quality yarn and we are proud of our work. We give all our products a lifetime warranty. If this product ever breaks down, we will ﬁx it or replace it with a new one. Simply mail the product back to the farm with a Warranty Repair Form which can be downloaded from this page. However, Myssyfarmi is not responsible for direct, incidental or consequential damages for any reason.

Please note, that the two following occasions are not covered by the warranty: stretching and felting. The myssy product stretches to match your head/body, which is one the attributes of the wool we use. If you want that the product takes more of its original shape, wash it carefully following the instructions and shape it while it’s still wet. Also if your myssy product becomes felted due to the hard rubbing or improper use, it is not covered by the warranty.

Your Myssy product will serve you long! 

 

GOOD TO KNOW

1. We offer free shipping to all products worldwide!

2. After you have funded, we will send you an order survey where you can choose the colours and the sizes of your products. 

3. Myssy Luksus, Muffi, Collar and Tube come in one standard size, but in Farmesters you can choose from S, M & L. Size M is bought by 90% of our customers, but if you like it more tight or loose, S or L are good for that. 

4. Our myssys are all unique and  though the grannies have this same chart, not all myssys size M are precisely the same.  

5. Wool is as stretching material that will adjust to the size of your head. After a few weeks of use, your myssy fits you perfectly. 

 

THE IMPACT

With your help, the local grannies get to do meaningful work, build a strong social network and of course – laugh and have fun. The grannies get a compensation for each myssy they knit, but this is not the essence of it. It’s about empowering our local communities and making sure everyone gets to be a part of it. The grannies are central to our work, but the positive impact extends to local producers, inhabitants and other local actors. We hope to grow in order to being able to get more grannies and local producers involved, and share the message of empowering the local communities around the globe.

 

RISKS

We are working with nature, the hands of people as our engine. All our myssy products are of high-quality organic wool, hand-knitted in their final form. In case of extremely high demand we might face a challenge in delivering all the products in time. We are used to responding to fluctuating demands as our growth has brought them about, and will not leave anyone disappointed to our Myssy product. Our promise is to deliver the products the latest before the snow falls in Finland in December. By pledging you acknowledge this risk of delayed delivery.

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

There is magical power in people when they talk! We would appreciate your help in letting people know we are here. Just click the icons on top of the page and spread the word.

 

***FREE SHIPPING TO ALL ITEMS WORLDWIDE ***
story_txt:
WHO WE ARE
Myssyfarmi is an award-winning organic farm and an ambitious eco design company from Pöytyä, Finland.
The farm has belonged to the family since the early 19th century. The surrounding nature and the old farm scenery are a source of inspiration for our designs. We want to act as a bridge between the countryside and urban areas off­ering accessories and food products that are 100% traceable and organic. Finnsheep wool as well as organic food products. Myssy* products are handmade in Pöytyä by myssymummot, the local grannies. We get together at knitting circles and enjoy life. Every garment has some granny wisdom knitted in it.
* The word myssy means a beanie in Finnish.

 
WHAT WE BELIEVE IN


WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET
By reaching our goal, we will be able to expand our visibility internationally and spread the word about the social and environmental responsibility of companies. Through our work, we hope to inspire others to see that companies do not need to exploit and increase inequality, but instead through their work create well-being in the communities the operate in and promote environmental sustainability.
To thank you for your support, we have a collected some of our most popular products as perks. By supporting us now, you will also help us make our operations smoother - all that we do concentrates on only one season, winter - and even out the workload throughout the year. You will get a Myssy, that you will hold on to forever just in time before the autumn colds.
 



*Farmester collection's retail prices USD 87 – 100
 



*Muffi collection's retail prices USD 82 – 92
 



*Luksus collection's retail prices USD 126 – 137
 
LIFETIME WARRANTY
All Myssy garments are handmade in Finland of a high quality yarn and we are proud of our work. We give all our products a lifetime warranty. If this product ever breaks down, we will ﬁx it or replace it with a new one. Simply mail the product back to the farm with a Warranty Repair Form which can be downloaded from this page. However, Myssyfarmi is not responsible for direct, incidental or consequential damages for any reason.
Please note, that the two following occasions are not covered by the warranty: stretching and felting. The myssy product stretches to match your head/body, which is one the attributes of the wool we use. If you want that the product takes more of its original shape, wash it carefully following the instructions and shape it while it’s still wet. Also if your myssy product becomes felted due to the hard rubbing or improper use, it is not covered by the warranty.
Your Myssy product will serve you long! 

 
GOOD TO KNOW
1. We offer free shipping to all products worldwide!
2. After you have funded, we will send you an order survey where you can choose the colours and the sizes of your products. 
3. Myssy Luksus, Muffi, Collar and Tube come in one standard size, but in Farmesters you can choose from S, M & L. Size M is bought by 90% of our customers, but if you like it more tight or loose, S or L are good for that. 
4. Our myssys are all unique and  though the grannies have this same chart, not all myssys size M are precisely the same.  
5. Wool is as stretching material that will adjust to the size of your head. After a few weeks of use, your myssy fits you perfectly. 

 

THE IMPACT
With your help, the local grannies get to do meaningful work, build a strong social network and of course – laugh and have fun. The grannies get a compensation for each myssy they knit, but this is not the essence of it. It’s about empowering our local communities and making sure everyone gets to be a part of it. The grannies are central to our work, but the positive impact extends to local producers, inhabitants and other local actors. We hope to grow in order to being able to get more grannies and local producers involved, and share the message of empowering the local communities around the globe.


 
RISKS
We are working with nature, the hands of people as our engine. All our myssy products are of high-quality organic wool, hand-knitted in their final form. In case of extremely high demand we might face a challenge in delivering all the products in time. We are used to responding to fluctuating demands as our growth has brought them about, and will not leave anyone disappointed to our Myssy product. Our promise is to deliver the products the latest before the snow falls in Finland in December. By pledging you acknowledge this risk of delayed delivery.


 
OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
There is magical power in people when they talk! We would appreciate your help in letting people know we are here. Just click the icons on top of the page and spread the word.

 
***FREE SHIPPING TO ALL ITEMS WORLDWIDE ***

story:
Let's join forces, making the summer of 2014 cooler, people happier and world better!

Design Drawings

Finished Product




First thank you for watching our video and hopefully you've enjoyed it. As what you've seen in the video, we've completed the product design and testing, the hats shown are not prototypes but fully functional units. We are currently working with the merchandise team from Seaworld Parks & Entertainment and they are very impressed and promises if we could meet all their terms they will be our partner which means carrying out our product throughout the country in their 12 parks. As the summer season fast approaching, we have to prove to them that we are capable of producing enough quantity under a certain price during the short season to meet the market demand, that's why we need your support. For $80,000 dollars we would be able to:

  • Finalize the contract with our oversea supplier.  
  • Modify the mold to lower the production cost and increase production speed. 
  • Place an 3,000 units order to stock up on inventory, it doesn't seem like a lot but it is a good start.
  • Pay for the shipping cost and other legal fees. 
  • Give back to supporters like you as rewards. 

We will start shipping as soon as $80,000 goal is reached. 

Safety has always been our number one concern, so we pay tremendous amount of attention to the manufacturing process, making sure the edges of the fan blade is smooth (rounded), solar cells are the most efficient and the hat is made with top quality, light yet strong material to last long.



Our Story

There were many setbacks along the way and we know without supporters like you we wouldn't have made it this far. Even though we haven't reached our goal yet, we are determined to make it happen. Each and everyday brings us closer to our target and thanks to all the amazing people like you, we are able to move forward at a much faster speed. 

Looking backwards, we've overcame so many. Overseeing the design, manufacture and perfecting a product is extremely demanding, letting alone I'm only 17, and my partner isn't that much older, we were just kids who have a beautiful dream- making this world a better place. I don't remember how many times we were rejected, but I do remember  being down but never out. 

We made it this far, on the last leg of this journey, we sincerely welcome you aboard. With an awesome product, Green light from the biggest parks across the country,supplier gearing up and ready to roll, with a little more resources, we could accomplish our goal and make this world a better place. You could help us by many means from making a pledge, spreading the words or giving constructive advice, any effort would be greatly appreciated. And I'm sure you would love our Solar Powered Fan Hat.

So let's go to work, make the next summer cooler, people happier and world better. 

Thank you!



                                                                                           Yuhao Fan & Jeremy Smither

story:
I'm known to many as Rose. I'm a 22-year-old sales associate at a thrift store, and I have recently opened up my own store -- an online jewelry shop! While some of my products are second-hand, a lot of my products are handmade by me. I haven't had much luck, however, and am finding myself with severe difficulties at work. I will soon leave my job so I can recover. In the meantime, while I search for a new job, I would greatly appreciate any help you can offer to my online jewelry shop!

Starting out, my goal is $2000, to make up for money I have spent on my shop, and to help me continue advertising it. Even if I do not reach my goal, the funds will still go towards my shop and to supporting me and my father while I search for work.

story:
Every year we participate in a maker immersion week. We take this whole week to focus on raising money to contribute towards the funding for unique trips that take place later in the year. During the week we also learn new skills, create designs, and build foundations for our future business careers. This year our funds are going towards a three day trip to the Mt. Lemmon Sky Center Observatory. The products we are marketing are t-shirts with unique designs made by the students. We practice business skills as well as creative thinking to generate designs for our t-shirts. While making our shirts, we learned to follow the process of screen printing, as well as being patient while incorporating teamwork. We printed these t-shirts to provide a creative way to fundraise for our trip to the Sky Center. 

 

Berryfest

 

Look Up

 

The Three Teddy Bears

 

Clock in a Tree

 

Palindrome

 

Hot Beverage

 

Home Sweet Home

 

Shining Star

 

Temptation

 

Dragon Knot

Stellar Wolf

The Grand Canyon State

 

Succulent

 

Lego Brick

 

Music

Flowers in a vase

 

CESSNA 172

Peace of the Ocean

 

Deep Sea Wonders

story:
Josh Fano is an independent design studio from Great Britain, with a mission to produce beautiful glasses and sunglasses, crafted to the highest standards.

 

 

Our inspirations range from post-modern art to minimalist architecture and design. These always have, and always will continue to influence the style and form of our frames.

For our newest glasses and sunglasses collection - The Studio, we were influenced by the originality of the Bridge of Aspiration at The Royal Ballet School in London. 

 

 

The Studio Collection will be handcrafted by artisans in the small Japanese town of Sabae; a historic community with a mastery of eyewear production.

 

 

These master-craftsmen were the first in the world to incorporate the high-grade Titanium used in aerospace technology into eyewear. Their process combines the traditional art of frame-making with modern technology to produce exceptional quality glasses and sunglasses.

 

 

We've decided to produce our collection from the high-grade Japanese Titanium used in aerospace technology as it has the highest strength-to-weight ratio of any metal. This also means our Studio frames only weigh 12.05 grams.

 

Benefits of Titanium:

 

We’ve joined forces with the international charity Sightsavers to offer one sight-saving cataract surgery for every ten pairs of glasses or sunglasses that we sell - so that we can do our part to help reduce global blindness.

 

The reason we're able to use the same Japanese master-craftsmen as the niche luxury eyewear labels but not charge extortionate prices is that we're coming to you on Indiegogo. 

We don't have to excessively spend on marketing costs, we don't have any retail stores, and we don't pay for celebrity endorsements. This means we can afford to offer eyewear of the same quality as the niche luxury labels, but for a fraction of the price. 

 

 

Prescription Lenses:

Lens Coatings

All of our prescription lenses include a 3 in 1 premium lens coating.

 

Sunglass & Blue-Light Computer Lenses:

 

Lens Upgrade Options:

 

Our Studio frames come with exceptional quality 1.61 lenses for no extra cost. However, if you would like to upgrade these, we have a range of options such as ultra-thin 1.67 and 1.74 index lenses or entry-level and Transitions photochromic lenses.

To upgrade your lenses, you will be able to purchase an add-on in a survey sent to you 10 days after the payment is processed.

 

We offer sun lenses in black, blue or brown. They are made from nylon, a top-notch performance material with amazing shock resistance whilst being extremely lightweight.

We're so confident about the strength and durability of our frame hinges that we decided to put them to the test. Watch below to see what happened.

 
We designed the temples of our Studio frames to be slightly tapered. This means they offer extra flexibility and are therefore suited to all head shapes. 
 

To assist you in selecting the right colour and shape of glasses, we're providing a virtual mirror smartphone application, available to all backers. 

We understand that shape and colour are crucial when choosing a new pair of frames, so we thought we'd help make it easy for you!

 

 

To select a pair of glasses or sunglasses from our Studio Collection, choose from one of the options on the right-hand side at the top of the page.

You'll be able to confirm your frame colour, model and lens type (prescription, sunglass or blue-light computer) in a survey sent to you 10 days after the payment is processed.

 

 

 

 

 

Since 2016, we've been channelling our passion for modern architecture and design into creating unique, high-quality eyewear. 

This year, we've decided to launch our most exciting eyewear yet, and we're thrilled to have the chance of working with the crowdfunding community to bring the designs to life.

Please share our story and we look forward to having you onboard!
 

- Dave, Adi & Ewan 

 

Got questions? Please drop us an email at hello@joshfano.co.uk.

story:
See our work! playhopscotch.net

Contact us! hello@playhopscotch.net


What is Hopscotch?

Hopscotch started as a women’s overalls project, when we realized that we couldn’t find a pair we loved at a price-point that wasn’t inhibitive. We started throwing ideas around and studying garment construction. As of today, the project has grown into the beginning of a more full collection which we plan to introduce in May 2016, at a pop-up shop in downtown Providence. The pieces in our collection seek to explore connections among the interests we share with our models, in textiles, music, photography, and more.


Who We Are

Nathan Zack and Lukas Winklerprins: two aspiring designers, freshly graduated from college in Literature and Mathematics, brought together by a shared interest in fashion and style. We live in Providence, RI, and are currently working to balance part-time jobs with our personal projects.


Why Support Us?

 

Hopscotch, for us, is not a profit-driven project—it is an endeavor to make earnest products and meaningful connections with our models, while learning along the way. We believe young ideas need space to be nurtured and that our time as young creatives is best spent developing our skills and forming networks of friends and collaborators to grow with. Your support will make the pop-up shop we have been working towards a reality.


Where Your Money Goes

Your contributions go directly towards material costs and transportation to New York City, so that we can learn more about materials sourcing and get the most appropriate fabrics for our dollar. We chose “Flexible Fending” because every dollar gets used; we are otherwise paying for the entire project out-of-pocket, which means looking for work instead of putting more time into Hopscotch. If you give enough for the perks, your money will offset the costs of the postcards, wood, acrylic, and hardware as well.

We source our tags from New York Custom Labels and fabrics bought in the garment district of Manhattan and Lorraine fabrics in our very own Providence, RI.

story:
We are Freshly Picked, a small startup in Utah founded by Susan Petersen, a mom who was frustrated by the lack of shoes that would stay on her baby’s feet. This inspired Susan to create our signature moccasins, which have disrupted the baby shoe industry, taken the internet by storm, and have become favorites of mothers across the globe. 

We’re now looking to do the same for another one of the biggest pain points for mothers: diaper bags. With your help, we’re excited to continue the legacy of improving the lives of mothers with our stylish, functional and innovative products!

Click here to download our press kit

 

A perfect balance of style and function. Designed for moms by moms!

We conducted focus groups across the US and identified what moms really want in a diaper bag: large capacity, ease of use, durability, and style. We’ve addressed each of these areas to create the perfect diaper bag that is both functional and beautiful.

Core features: 

  • Wearable 3 ways: backpack, cross-body, or purse 
  • 100% wipeable interior and exterior 
  • Magnetic front flap for easy close without zipping
  • Ten pockets and spacious central space for large items
  • Made with premium quality materials and luxe hardware
  • Metal feet on bottom so bag never touches the ground 

 

Exterior

 

The new Freshly Picked bag doesn't look like your typical old-fashioned diaper bag. There aren't any obnoxious prints, sagging pockets, or thick middle-school backpack straps. Instead, it's made of premium vegan leather with luxe hardware and can be worn 3 ways: backpack, purse and cross body! 

  • Top flap magnetic closure for easy-access and closure 
  • Padded bottom and metal feet keep bag upright
  • Expandable sides for increased capacity, with wide opening for easy access
  • 4 exterior pockets, including 2 side pockets that can accommodate up to a 32 oz beverage!
  • Durable, premium-quality YKK zippers with custom tassel
  • Custom matte gold hardware
  • Dual purpose back exterior pocket with magnetic clasp that hides backpack straps when they aren't in use

 

Interior

The large capacity interior of the Freshly Picked diaper bag is lined with 6 spacious pockets to fit numerous storage needs including a padded electronics sleeve, secure zip pockets for mom, and elastic pockets that can expand to keep bottles and other bulky items secure. Plus, the interior is lined with wipeable and spill-resistant nylon- a must have for mom's.

  • Spacious central space for large items
  • Padded electronics sleeve with magnetic closure that can fit up to 13’’ laptop and most tablets
  • Expandable sides for increased capacity 
  • Inner zip pocket keeps small items secure
  • Wide opening for easy placement and removal of items
  • Premium wipeable and spill-resistant interior lining

 

Durability

Made of premium vegan leather with a nylon interior lining, the diaper bag is spill-resistant and can simply be wiped clean.

Four matte gold metal feet on the bottom of the bag keep it from ever touching the floor, which means less germs and more stability. 

With a clean, timeless design made only the highest quality materials, the diaper bag by Freshly Picked will last through multiple babes and beyond. It truly can be your forever bag!

 

Ease of Use

The diaper bag has convertible straps to carry all the ways: cross-body for security, backpack for hands-free use, purse for easy on and off, and a top handle for grabbing quickly.

The top flap magnetic closure allows quick access to the interior and means you don't have to unzip the bag every time you open it. Plus, the wide opening makes it easy to place and remove items, even with one hand!

The padded base and structure of the bag keeps it upright--the bag will not fall over when it is set down.

 

Style

The new Freshly Picked diaper bag was created to work for today's parents. Its not your mom's old-fashioned diaper bag! Instead its modern design features sleek lines, luxe vegan leather for durability and for a lighter weight bag, and custom matte gold hardware. No obnoxious prints, sagging pockets or thick middle-school backpack straps here!

 

Large Capacity

The diaper bag features a large central interior space lined with 6 interior pockets and an additional 4 exterior pockets.

The sides feature metal snaps that be opened to expand the bag for increased capacity, or kept snapped for a thinner, more purse-like silhouette. 

It can comfortably carry all the items that moms need to transport, including: 

  • Dozens of diapers, baby wipes, changing pad 
  • Baby bottles and sippy cups 
  • Various size toys, spare clothes, blankets 
  • Water bottles, Hydro Flasks, tumblers, and up to a 32 oz drink 
  • Snacks and medicine
  • iPads and laptops up to 13’’
  • Wallets, keys, cell phones
  • Lip gloss, makeup, feminine products

DIMENSIONS: 

  • 13” wide x 15” high x 7” deep 
  • 26” adjustable backpack strap 
  • 47” shoulder strap (at longest length) 
  • 2.3 lbs. weight 
  • 4” top handle drop 

MATERIALS: 

  • High end vegan leather
  • Wipeable and stain-resistant nylon interior lining
  • Premium YKK zippers
  • Custom matte gold hardware

Final samples approved: September 2017

Bag production: September - October 2017

Bags delivered: November 2017

 

 

With the support of moms across the United States, we have a long legacy of bringing baby products to market that make mothers lives easier. However, this is a completely new category for us and we need your feedback and help to fund this next step for Freshly Picked!

Freshly Picked's CEO Susan Petersen, is a mom who was frustrated by the lack of well-designed shoes that would stay on her baby’s feet. Susan created our signature moccasins, which are hand-made with premium quality leather and an innovative easy-on elastic opening that keeps them securely on little feet.

Freshly Picked moccasins began to gather attention from celebrities and online so Susan took her innovation to Shark Tank. Her genius design was recognized by Mark Cuban, who called them “the greatest shoes” he had ever seen.

After Shark Tank, Freshly Picked grew phenomenally taking both the baby industry and social media by storm. Thanks to Susan’s innovative design Freshly Picked not only created a new category of soft sole moccasins, but gained the loyal support of mothers around the world.

Armed with another amazing design and the support of awesome backers, we’re excited to create a diaper bag that is not only stylish but also functional for modern parents.
story_txt:
We are Freshly Picked, a small startup in Utah founded by Susan Petersen, a mom who was frustrated by the lack of shoes that would stay on her baby’s feet. This inspired Susan to create our signature moccasins, which have disrupted the baby shoe industry, taken the internet by storm, and have become favorites of mothers across the globe. We’re now looking to do the same for another one of the biggest pain points for mothers: diaper bags. With your help, we’re excited to continue the legacy of improving the lives of mothers with our stylish, functional and innovative products! 

 Click here to download our press kit 

  A perfect balance of style and function. Designed for moms by moms!We conducted focus groups across the US and identified what moms really want in a diaper bag: large capacity, ease of use, durability, and style. We’ve addressed each of these areas to create the perfect diaper bag that is both functional and beautiful.Core features: 
Wearable 3 ways: backpack, cross-body, or purse 
100% wipeable interior and exterior 
Magnetic front flap for easy close without zipping
Ten pockets and spacious central space for large items
Made with premium quality materials and luxe hardware

Metal feet on bottom so bag never touches the ground 

 Exterior 
 The new Freshly Picked bag doesn't look like your typical old-fashioned diaper bag. There aren't any obnoxious prints, sagging pockets, or thick middle-school backpack straps. Instead, it's made of premium vegan leather with luxe hardware and can be worn 3 ways: backpack, purse and cross body! 
Top flap magnetic closure for easy-access and closure 
Padded bottom and metal feet keep bag upright
Expandable sides for increased capacity, with wide opening for easy access
4 exterior pockets, including 2 side pockets that can accommodate up to a 32 oz beverage!
Durable, premium-quality YKK zippers with custom tassel
Custom matte gold hardware
Dual purpose back exterior pocket with magnetic clasp that hides backpack straps when they aren't in use
 Interior
 The large capacity interior of the Freshly Picked diaper bag is lined with 6 spacious pockets to fit numerous storage needs including a padded electronics sleeve, secure zip pockets for mom, and elastic pockets that can expand to keep bottles and other bulky items secure. Plus, the interior is lined with wipeable and spill-resistant nylon- a must have for mom's.
Spacious central space for large items
Padded electronics sleeve with magnetic closure that can fit up to 13’’ laptop and most tablets
Expandable sides for increased capacity 
Inner zip pocket keeps small items secure
Wide opening for easy placement and removal of items
Premium wipeable and spill-resistant interior lining
 Durability
 Made of premium vegan leather with a nylon interior lining, the diaper bag is spill-resistant and can simply be wiped clean.Four matte gold metal feet on the bottom of the bag keep it from ever touching the floor, which means less germs and more stability. With a clean, timeless design made only the highest quality materials, the diaper bag by Freshly Picked will last through multiple babes and beyond. It truly can be your forever bag! Ease of Use
 The diaper bag has convertible straps to carry all the ways: cross-body for security, backpack for hands-free use, purse for easy on and off, and a top handle for grabbing quickly.The top flap magnetic closure allows quick access to the interior and means you don't have to unzip the bag every time you open it. Plus, the wide opening makes it easy to place and remove items, even with one hand!The padded base and structure of the bag keeps it upright--the bag will not fall over when it is set down. Style
 The new Freshly Picked diaper bag was created to work for today's parents. Its not your mom's old-fashioned diaper bag! Instead its modern design features sleek lines, luxe vegan leather for durability and for a lighter weight bag, and custom matte gold hardware. No obnoxious prints, sagging pockets or thick middle-school backpack straps here! Large Capacity
 The diaper bag features a large central interior space lined with 6 interior pockets and an additional 4 exterior pockets.The sides feature metal snaps that be opened to expand the bag for increased capacity, or kept snapped for a thinner, more purse-like silhouette. It can comfortably carry all the items that moms need to transport, including: 
Dozens of diapers, baby wipes, changing pad 
Baby bottles and sippy cups 
Various size toys, spare clothes, blankets 
Water bottles, Hydro Flasks, tumblers, and up to a 32 oz drink 
Snacks and medicine
iPads and laptops up to 13’’
Wallets, keys, cell phones
Lip gloss, makeup, feminine products
 

 DIMENSIONS: 
13” wide x 15” high x 7” deep 
26” adjustable backpack strap 
47” shoulder strap (at longest length) 
2.3 lbs. weight 
4” top handle drop 
MATERIALS: 
High end vegan leather
Wipeable and stain-resistant nylon interior lining
Premium YKK zippers
Custom matte gold hardware
 

 Final samples approved: September 2017Bag production: September - October 2017Bags delivered: November 2017 
  With the support of moms across the United States, we have a long legacy of bringing baby products to market that make mothers lives easier. However, this is a completely new category for us and we need your feedback and help to fund this next step for Freshly Picked!Freshly Picked's CEO Susan Petersen, is a mom who was frustrated by the lack of well-designed shoes that would stay on her baby’s feet. Susan created our signature moccasins, which are hand-made with premium quality leather and an innovative easy-on elastic opening that keeps them securely on little feet.Freshly Picked moccasins began to gather attention from celebrities and online so Susan took her innovation to Shark Tank. Her genius design was recognized by Mark Cuban, who called them “the greatest shoes” he had ever seen.
 After Shark Tank, Freshly Picked grew phenomenally taking both the baby industry and social media by storm. Thanks to Susan’s innovative design Freshly Picked not only created a new category of soft sole moccasins, but gained the loyal support of mothers around the world.Armed with another amazing design and the support of awesome backers, we’re excited to create a diaper bag that is not only stylish but also functional for modern parents.   
 Play

 
Replay with sound


 
Play withsound



00:00


00:00

story:
ABOUT BERMUDA BORN

My name is Patrice Morgan and I am the designer and sole creator of Bermuda Born. Bermuda Born is an independent, luxury accessories and gifts brand that was founded in my island home of Bermuda.

As a graduate of London College of Fashion, I am ready to use my knowledge of making highly skilled accessories, to bring you premium products that feel good to the touch and are made by the finest craftsmen out there.

I created Bermuda Born because I am really passionate about providing products that will survive for generation after generation.  

I am concerned with the environmental impact of “fast fashion". Fast fashion is the result of consumers demanding trend-driven, cheaply made products. However, this has created a disposable culture, which has resulted in global environmental issues in the form of not only clothing landfills, but the human factor.

My vision is to switch the fashion game around by changing the way consumers view quantity over quality. I want consumers to realize that fashion can be something special that’s worth investing in, whilst still remaining affordable. My aim is to create products, which are not only nostalgic, but will stand the test of time.

WHAT WE NEED

The biggest hurdle we face is to raise enough funds to market Bermuda Born in major cities around the world. With your support, we can take a giant step closer to our goals. All the money raised for Bermuda Born will go towards:

• Expediting the business development process which would contribute to the running of our business in a more timely fashion and would enable us to become an efficient global business trader.

• The cost of producing our first staple handbag collection (design, prototyping, materials, S&H).

• Various other start-up costs such as website development and international/local marketing initiatives.

Although the minimum amount of money we are expecting to raise is $20,000 we are hoping to surpass this amount.

WHAT YOU'LL RECEIVE FOR FUNDING US

Please support us by purchasing one of our Bermuda Born products, or by purchasing a Bermuda Born experience. We are offering the following:

  • $ 15: A handwritten thank you note showing our sincere appreciation for your support!

  • $ 25: A Stylus Bermuda Born I-Pen and a handwritten thank you note showing our sincere appreciation of your support!

         

  • $ 25: Warm Breeze by Bermuda Born is our first roll-on scented body oil for women. It is sensual, fruity and carries a semi sweet musk aroma.

 



  • $ 25: High Tide by Bermuda Born is our premier roll-on scented body oil for men. It is light and woody at the beginning, with a hint of spicy citrus fragrance.

  • $ 75: A Bermuda Born leather credit/business card holder. Available colors: black or brown.

 




  • $ 125: A Bermuda Born leather wallet case. A versatile unisex wallet case that can hold notes, a mobile phone and credit cards. Available colors: brown or black.



  • $ 175: A Bermuda Born handcrafted bracelet from our signature Bermuda Keepsakes Collection. This bracelet is made by the best artisans in Bermuda using authentic Bermuda Cedar. It has 100% Sterling silver enveloped in the middle of it. 

  • $ 250: Be a guest at a Private Bermuda Born dinner party. Meet Bermuda Born’s Accessory Designer, Patrice Morgan, as she hosts an intimate and stylish dinner at one of Bermuda’s best kept secret venues. (See details under the Perks menu).

  • $ 275: A Bermuda Born tote bag. This is our very first handbag design to go into production and you'll be among the first to receive it. Details: black leather and cream canvas.




  • $ 1200: Come to Bermuda! We'll put you in first class guest accommodation, and you'll live among the locals in luxury. This package is for 3 nights in Bermuda based on 2 people travelling. Upon arrival you'll receive a special Bermuda Born welcome gift. You'll meet Patrice Morgan, the designer of Bermuda Born and she will give you a private tour of Bermuda. (See dates and details under the Perks menu).

THE IMPACT

We live in an age where products are no longer created to be keepsakes. Instead, they are made with cheap materials and are then thrown away quickly. We want to bring back products that last and have a personal connection with the owner and we want to sell gifts that are nostalgic - gifts that really mean something. Our aim is to bring back fine leather goods and gifts at a price you can afford. 

ALTERNATIVE WAYS TO HELP

Just because you can't contribute, doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Tell your friends about this exciting 35-day time limited opportunity.
  • Please spread our message by emailing the link to our Indiegogo webpage to your friends and colleagues or by posting it on your Facebook page, Twitter or LinkedIn accounts. 

PLEASE JOIN US…

...as we go on this journey to turn our designs into high quality products that you can enjoy for decades to come!

After this 35-day campaign ends you can get updates via www.bermudaborn.com or www.facebook.com/bermudaborn

story:
Short Summary

Till Infinity would be a business I start up, creating designs for apparel that is stylish for everyone.

Till Infinity would be based on the idea of never quiting, to continue on and strive for whatever your goals are in life. Think of it like this, what are your goals and dreams? Now tell yourself, I won't stop, Till Infinity.

This campaign would allow me to pursue my dream, and for your to pursue yours! This will be your motivation, as well as mine.

What You Get & The Impact

You get the first Till Infinity stickers, t-shirts, and hoodies. Since Till Infinity is brand new, you'll be the first with the freshest clothing items.

You'll look cool, and have others looking and asking where did you get that from? You'll also feel comfortable too.

With Till Infinity you'll have that motivation and mindset to keep pushing, keep going on, and continue to be better and strive for greatness.

Consider the phrase Till Infinity. I can't imagine that ever going out of style. Everyone wants to keep going, whether it's in life, or in the pursuit of love, or continuing on to a fortunate life. Whatever it may be, I don't think anyone would stop, everyone would keep on keeping on, till infinity.

All contributions will be used first toward production and shipping costs to fulfill my commitment of the perks you've chosen. Then, my plan is to purchase a Screen Printer, stations, and all other additional accessories and equipment that go with it. That way I can do it all myself! Till Infinity! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Any amount is extremely appreciated!

What's also helpful? Sharing this campaign with others, whether that be family, friends, coworkers, fellow indiegogo users, and anyone else. Sharing is caring!

More To Come

Coming soon I will join some of the social media outlets including Facebook and Instagram. I'll provide the updates and links so you can follow Till infinity, till infinity.

Update 4/26/13

As promised:

Facebook.com/TillInfinity. Twitter @TillInfini_D. Instagram: TillInfini_D.

I'll continue to update this campaign and these social media outlets throughout the campaign duration and onwards, or Till Infinity!

Thank you for your time!

story:
Be a part of Britain's First Reality Show for Photography!

To find new creative meaning and explore the essential relationship of fashion and photography Back to Front TV has developed an exciting new concept, Back to Front (working title) a reality production backed by an award-winning team – the shoots and stories influenced by iconic images and legendary names in photography – each episode will be produced into a thrilling challenge for contestant and audience alike.

Back to Front TV is giving our audience and fans the opportunity to join in the making of this exclusive first series. While showing your love for fashion and photography, you have the chance to experience the show first-hand and be involved in it all! This truly is a 'reality' experience like never before!

Quick Facts

  • Reality Television Series for Fashion Photography
  • 12 Contestants, 2 Mentors, 3 Judges, 9 Episodes
  • Thrilling Challenges for Contestants
  • Ultimate Test of Artistic and Creative Ability

To apply as a contestant please click here.

In the Media


The Presenters & Mentors

WILLIE CHRISTIE - EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR

Willie Christie is an award-winning British fashion photographer, he worked extensively with British Vogue, working closely with both Grace Coddington and Liz Tilberis; he shot 10 Vogue covers and many inside spreads with them. Christie’s portfolio includes award-winning advertising campaigns, fashion and portrait work for international icons, notably Cary Grant, Grace Jones, Douglas Fairbanks Jnr, Sir John Mills and Catherine Deneuve; and Rock ‘n’ Roll album covers and portraits for Rolling Stones, Pink Floyd, David Bowie, Bryan Ferry and Lou Reed, among others.

ADRIAN WEINBRECHT - TECHNICAL DIRECTOR

One of Europe's leading and best established commercial advertising photographers, Adrian Weinbrecht is the technical director and co-presenter of the show. With a career spanning two decades and originally from Australia, Adrian is based in London and shoots assignments globally for a wide range of international clients, which include: Sony, UBS, BBC, Jaguar Land Rover and Adidas among others.

LARA JADE - AUDITION PANELLIST & GUEST MENTOR

Lara Jade has been working in the photography industry for the past eight years – continuously working with her clientele between the USA and Europe. Starting photography as a teenager shooting self-portraits in her early years allowed Lara to hone her skills, which then translated into the creative side of fashion photography a few years later.

Timeline

We are well underway with most of our processes and here is an overview of what the project roadmap looks like:

  • November 2013 - Call for Contestants
  • January 2014 - Contestant Shortlist
  • January 2014 - Finalise Producer
  • February 2014 - Contestant Auditions and Selection
  • March 2014 - Production Planning & Scheduling
  • April 2014 - Commence Production
  • August 2014 - Deliver Broadcast Package (The Show!)

Perks

We have designed some exciting perks for our audience and fans!

ARMCHAIR JUDGE - April, 2014

Be the first to support us and get to vote on the contestant's photos via the app we are developing. You will also be credited on the show's website as an armchair judge. The app (Android and iOS) will be available for download before we start production in April 2014 and is exclusive to indiegogo campaign backers only.

WINNING IMAGE - September, 2014

If what we have done so far is anything to go by, then the winning image will be iconic in its own right and seen by thousands - perhaps millions - around the world! You will receive an 20"x30" fine art print of the winning image, signed by the winning contestant.

LAUNCH PARTY & EXHIBITION - 26 March, 2014

Meet the cast, contestants and crew, hear about the production plans and enjoy an evening exhibition of Willie Christie’s work with other photography personalities and a glass of champagne and nibbles. We will be hosting this party in London on March 26, 2014 and we will provide full details of when and where in due course.

CHARITY BALL - 29 March, 2014

Wine, dine, dance, be photographed and filmed at this special charity ball, which we are hosting in aid of our adopted charity. The ball will be held at an exclusive location in London on 29 March, 2014.

LIMITED EDITION POSTER - December, 2014

Willie Christie has created a limited edition collection exclusively for the show! Receive an exclusive 11" fine art print, personalised and signed by Willie Christie.

View this special limited edition collection and choose your image!

MODEL FOR A DAY - 10-14 February, 2014

You want to be a model? We are inviting aspiring models to be professionally styled and photographed for a chance to build your portfolio and have something to show off! 

Our professional stylists and photographers will help you make an amazing portfolio and you could even be selected for the show itself, yes, that's right, we will be selecting lucky models who can feature on the pilot and the show!

From 10-14 February, 2014 we will be running the model shoots in London, more details to be announced soon.

Find out more about Model for a Day

LARA JADE WORKSHOP - March, 2014

An exclusive one or two day fashion photography workshop London (United Kingdom). These events feature either a fully focused shooting day or a two day course featuring shooting, business and retouching (see below for the course options). Working alongside Lara Jade as your mentor and collaborating with models and styling team you’ll be able to leave with fresh images for your portfolio, new ideas and most importantly – new techniques. The 2nd day of the TWO day workshop will be taught alongside a retoucher.

For full details on the Lara Jade Workshop

WORKSHOP WITH ADRIAN - 15 February, 2014

Spend the day with the technical director, Adrian Weinbrecht on location in London, as he takes you through the ins and outs of professional commercial photography. Adrian has developed a full-day show & tell for aspiring commercial advertising photographers with a hands-on shoot and demonstration using the highest specification professional photography equipment. The workshop will be held in London on 15 February, 2014.

GUEST STUDENT PHOTOGRAPHER - April 2014

Attend the 3-day contestant masterclass with Willie and Adrian! Learn from the best on how you can follow your dream in fashion photography and what it takes to cut it in a creative industry. The contestant masterclass is being designed for the contestants, to give them baseline competency in the art and technique of photography before they are let loose to find their way in the contest and prove that they have the ability to produce the ultimate image! Our Guest Student Photographers will be following a 'bootcamp' style curriculum along with the contestants of the show. 

GUEST PHOTOGRAPHER - May 2014

3-day pass to one of the shoot locations (UK), photograph the models with a professional camera, join in the fun, mix with the crew and cast, entertain and be entertained - come and go as you please. This is an incredible opportunity to join us on set and at the shoot locations for some very exciting episodes - we are designing and will be setting up a specialised studio for guest photographers.

WILDCARD CONTESTANT

You want to be on the show and you are available for the entire length of filming of the show for 8 weeks, commencing April, 2014.

Risks & Challenges

Projects of this nature typically carry a high amount of risk, which is precisely why we assembled the core team, the way we did. We understand that a project of this scale will require expert project and risk management guidance to make it to the production line; we are well prepared for the journey ahead.

And it is going to be a journey. We are using specialised funding techniques and embracing all aspects of social and digital technologies to make this happen – building on the experience of Willie and Adrian, our headline personalities who lend an enormous amount of enthusiasm and creative energy to this project.

Finally, the very nature of this concept lends itself well to attracting big-name sponsors and collaborators; we already have a growing number of supporters and are confident that we can execute this project given the expressions of interest we are receiving.

FAQ

How are the Funds Being Used?

Acquired funds will be used for the production costs of the show. The funds will cover expenses involved in filming a professional production.

Here's a budget breakdown:

  • Cameras, lighting and other equipment costs
  • Producer's cost for filming and editing the show
  • Project coordination, oversight and monitoring
  • Booking expenses for locations and venues
  • Stylist / wardrobe and related expenses 
  • Booking and administrative expenses for models
  • Travel expenses for crew, contestants and cast

As with any production project, our campaign can be scaled. If we exceed our funding goal, we will have the flexibility to make this first series the most valuable experience for our contestants and supporters, as well as our audience. Any additional funds would increase our ability to expand the concept and secure talented guest stars and, most importantly our ability to create an amazing reality show production!

Is crowdfunding your only source of funding?

No, we will have other contingent sources of funding, commercial and private.

What happens to my money if you don't reach your goal?

If we cannot film the show due to lack of funding, you will be refunded in full.

Thank You!

Last but not least, with thanks to the following folks for valuable advice and guidance:

  • Anna Schror - Art Editor
  • Rebecca Denton - Voice Artist
  • Ben Turner - Supporter
  • Kristien Carbonez - Supporter
  • Dries Vande Velde - Supporter
  • Tille Verhaege - Supporter
  • Michael Pritchard - Advisor
  • Adam Scorey - Advisor
  • Mary-Louise Angoujard - Advisor
  • Anushe Low - Advisor
  • Will Farrell - Editorial Assistant
  • Jim Marks - Camera and Filming
  • Miranda Rigg - Make Up Artist
  • Matthew Felstead - Trailer Editor
  • Amanda Martin - Supporter

ARMCHAIR JUDGE - April, 2014
Be the first to support us and get to vote on the contestant's photos via the app we are developing. You will also be credited on the show's website as an armchair judge. The app (Android and iOS) will be available for download before we start production in April 2014 and is exclusive to indiegogo campaign backers only.
WINNING IMAGE - September, 2014
If what we have done so far is anything to go by, then the winning image will be iconic in its own right and seen by thousands - perhaps millions - around the world! You will receive an 20"x30" fine art print of the winning image, signed by the winning contestant.

LAUNCH PARTY & EXHIBITION - 26 March, 2014
Meet the cast, contestants and crew, hear about the production plans and enjoy an evening exhibition of Willie Christie’s work with other photography personalities and a glass of champagne and nibbles. We will be hosting this party in London on March 26, 2014 and we will provide full details of when and where in due course.
CHARITY BALL - 29 March, 2014
Wine, dine, dance, be photographed and filmed at this special charity ball, which we are hosting in aid of our adopted charity. The ball will be held at an exclusive location in London on 29 March, 2014.
LIMITED EDITION POSTER - December, 2014
Willie Christie has created a limited edition collection exclusively for the show! Receive an exclusive 11" fine art print, personalised and signed by Willie Christie.
View this special limited edition collection and choose your image!
MODEL FOR A DAY - 10-14 February, 2014



You want to be a model? We are inviting aspiring models to be professionally styled and photographed for a chance to build your portfolio and have something to show off! 
Our professional stylists and photographers will help you make an amazing portfolio and you could even be selected for the show itself, yes, that's right, we will be selecting lucky models who can feature on the pilot and the show!
From 10-14 February, 2014 we will be running the model shoots in London, more details to be announced soon.
Find out more about Model for a Day

LARA JADE WORKSHOP - March, 2014





An exclusive one or two day fashion photography workshop London (United Kingdom). These events feature either a fully focused shooting day or a two day course featuring shooting, business and retouching (see below for the course options). Working alongside Lara Jade as your mentor and collaborating with models and styling team you’ll be able to leave with fresh images for your portfolio, new ideas and most importantly – new techniques. The 2nd day of the TWO day workshop will be taught alongside a retoucher.
For full details on the Lara Jade Workshop
WORKSHOP WITH ADRIAN - 15 February, 2014
Spend the day with the technical director, Adrian Weinbrecht on location in London, as he takes you through the ins and outs of professional commercial photography. Adrian has developed a full-day show & tell for aspiring commercial advertising photographers with a hands-on shoot and demonstration using the highest specification professional photography equipment. The workshop will be held in London on 15 February, 2014.
GUEST STUDENT PHOTOGRAPHER - April 2014
Attend the 3-day contestant masterclass with Willie and Adrian! Learn from the best on how you can follow your dream in fashion photography and what it takes to cut it in a creative industry. The contestant masterclass is being designed for the contestants, to give them baseline competency in the art and technique of photography before they are let loose to find their way in the contest and prove that they have the ability to produce the ultimate image! Our Guest Student Photographers will be following a 'bootcamp' style curriculum along with the contestants of the show. 
GUEST PHOTOGRAPHER - May 2014
3-day pass to one of the shoot locations (UK), photograph the models with a professional camera, join in the fun, mix with the crew and cast, entertain and be entertained - come and go as you please. This is an incredible opportunity to join us on set and at the shoot locations for some very exciting episodes - we are designing and will be setting up a specialised studio for guest photographers.
WILDCARD CONTESTANT
You want to be on the show and you are available for the entire length of filming of the show for 8 weeks, commencing April, 2014.



Risks & Challenges
Projects of this nature typically carry a high amount of risk, which is precisely why we assembled the core team, the way we did. We understand that a project of this scale will require expert project and risk management guidance to make it to the production line; we are well prepared for the journey ahead.


And it is going to be a journey. We are using specialised funding techniques and embracing all aspects of social and digital technologies to make this happen – building on the experience of Willie and Adrian, our headline personalities who lend an enormous amount of enthusiasm and creative energy to this project.
Finally, the very nature of this concept lends itself well to attracting big-name sponsors and collaborators; we already have a growing number of supporters and are confident that we can execute this project given the expressions of interest we are receiving.

FAQ


How are the Funds Being Used?

Acquired funds will be used for the production costs of the show. The funds will cover expenses involved in filming a professional production.
Here's a budget breakdown:


Cameras, lighting and other equipment costs
Producer's cost for filming and editing the show
Project coordination, oversight and monitoring
Booking expenses for locations and venues
Stylist / wardrobe and related expenses 
Booking and administrative expenses for models
Travel expenses for crew, contestants and cast


As with any production project, our campaign can be scaled. If we exceed our funding goal, we will have the flexibility to make this first series the most valuable experience for our contestants and supporters, as well as our audience. Any additional funds would increase our ability to expand the concept and secure talented guest stars and, most importantly our ability to create an amazing reality show production!

Is crowdfunding your only source of funding?
No, we will have other contingent sources of funding, commercial and private.
What happens to my money if you don't reach your goal?If we cannot film the show due to lack of funding, you will be refunded in full.
Thank You!
Last but not least, with thanks to the following folks for valuable advice and guidance:


Anna Schror - Art Editor
Rebecca Denton - Voice Artist
Ben Turner - Supporter
Kristien Carbonez - Supporter
Dries Vande Velde - Supporter
Tille Verhaege - Supporter
Michael Pritchard - Advisor
Adam Scorey - Advisor
Mary-Louise Angoujard - Advisor
Anushe Low - Advisor
Will Farrell - Editorial Assistant
Jim Marks - Camera and Filming
Miranda Rigg - Make Up Artist
Matthew Felstead - Trailer Editor
Amanda Martin - Supporter

story:
A great future for all hairdressers through high tech hair fashion designing

A very welcome to...Elaine Lee and Sons…The Future

Hello to all people, friends and hairdressing associates around the world. My name is Elaine Lee and this is my beautiful family. I have two gorgeous boys, Shane and Jayden. Originally from Malaysia, at this moment I am so lucky to live in one of the most beautiful cities in this world, Sydney Australia with my family. 

Yes, I am a very motivated mum, I like my children to have a great future, but not being selfish, I like all hairdressers to have a great future and to share this ambition together with me. Hairdressing must become more professional and we have to be hi-tech hair fashion stylists that take us in to the future making it so much more enjoyable for both stylist and clients.

I have cultivated with our team a new franchise concept that will be available to all my hairdressing companions on a global scale and who can join me by becoming part of one of the most advanced franchises in hairdressing and thereby creating lots of employment for hairdressers who should have a more comfortable life in return for the long hours of work they perform, therefore we can all give ourselves a better future and our children.

I live in an apartment at the city fringe of City of Sydney right next to Sydney Technology Park where I got to know a very professional IT company that can put together my second generation software.

I have worked passionately for some 4 years with my first generation software on my prototype in conjunction with a computer science professor and students working and studying at the University of Sydney. Thanks to their help we are going to change hairdressing worldwide and this will make us great professional hi-tech hair fashion specialist stylist rather than just hairdressers.

Please, I like to ask all people that love having their hair fashionable, consistently and professionally styled and all hairdressers and all my friends to support me to achieve this with my hairdressing friends here in Sydney. I need $50,000.00 USD for the second generation of software to make this happen. It will give our concept fantastic start in the right direction for all of us.

I like to thank you well in advance for your great support I know that you will give us very hard working hairdressers. And my sincere thanks to: the professor, the students and hairdressing friends that have made this all possible so far.

My sincere regards, Elaine Lee

story:
Liusid

It's funny how life takes you where you were always meant to be, but it never looks like it did in your dreams! My name is Ed Carlise.  I work in the customer service field.  I have been married for 7 years to my beautiful wife Heather and we have a 4 year old son named Kegan.  I am also a Cancer Survivor.

My campaign is to get my company Liusid and my nonprofit The Liusid Foundation funded and up off the ground.  Liusid is an apparel company that will sell quality clothing and reasonable prices with a portion of the proceeds going to The Liusid Foundation.  Once there are funds in The Liusid Foundation they will be distributed to various Cancer charities and patients in need of help.  These two ideas are VERY important to me.  Cancer took the lives of my aunt, uncle and dad all within a 6 year time period.  This disease also altered the lives of my cousin (who has had to battle throat Cancer 4 times and she has kicked it’s ass every time) myself, friends and several co-workers.  I am tired of watching this disease do whatever it wants whenever it wants and I have decided to stand up and FIGHT!

With your contributions, I will not only be able to get my business and nonprofit up off the ground but I will be able to make a stand against this ugly disease and help many affected by it along the way. So I ask you to please, please help me STAND UP and FIGHT!

I am asking for whatever I can get, but my goal is $10,000.  With this money I will be able to complete the process of filling papers such as my LLC, 5013c, and any other legal documents that may pop up.  I will also be able to complete the website and finalize the first line of clothing which will include t-shirts, jeans, and hats all of which have been submitted to the artist for final tweaking.  Hopefully with your help I will be able to have Liusid up and running by June 1, 2013.  If there is any money left over from the initial start up costs I will be donating the rest to a Cancer charity to be voted on by you, at www.liusid.com.

I hope to have sample shirts up on the site within the next two weeks so that people can get a glimpse of what is coming.  Also please stop by the site, it is just a teaser now but should be up and operational by the end of next week as well.  If you have any questions or comments or would like to submit a shirt design my email is carlisefamily@gmail.com.

I know that right now I am just some stranger to you with a story that you have probably already heard.  My story is different in that I am not just happy with being a Cancer Survivor.  I want to be a Cancer destroyer as well.  I want to know that when I leave this beautiful world in 50 years or so I did every thing in my power to end this disease and I make myself, my family and you as well, proud of what I accomplished.

P.S.  If you don’t want to donate to me that is totally fine but please find some Cancer charity and throw some cash their way, every little bit helps.

Thank You,

Ed Carlise

story:
The StashBelt:

Handmade in Kenya with 100% natural African leather, StashBelt is the WORLD'S ONLY traveler's money belt with integrated DATA STORAGE.

Your StashBelt is a wearable insurance policy, designed for intrepid travellers in troubled times. Yet StashBelt is versatile and comfortable enough to be worn every day by anyone. Whether you're stuck in a tough spot in Bangkok or hanging out a coffeeshop in New York City, StashBelt is for you.

It's HIDDEN 18-Inch Zipper Pocket is large enough to hide up to $500 in folded bills - enough to get you out of nearly any jam. You can also stash keys, jewelry, medication or any other small, precious items you'd rather keep away from sticky fingers. 

StashBelt is the only moneybelt with a built-in data storage solution: a hidden 4 GB Micro USB Stick. Use this to keep scans of key documents like your passport, travel insurance information, ID cards...or a selection of your favourite tunes to rock out to while on the road.

With our double snap design, you can even customize your StashBelt with buckles of your own.  

 

       Travel safe. Travel with confidence. Travel with a StashBelt!

 

The StashStory

After spending many years living and traveling abroad, the StashBelt team was fed up with common depictions of Africa, full of starving orphans and "Save Africa" rhetoric. Having actually spent time there, our experiences showed us Africa the proud, Africa the beautiful and Africa the hopeful.

So why didn't more people know about this side of the African story?

Realizing that only grassoots wealth creation can raise individuals and nations out of the cycle of poverty, StashBelt was formed in 2012 as a collaboration between skilled leather artisans in Kenya and young social entrepreneurs in Canada.

How does Stashbelt work?

Every StashBelt is hand-crafted by some of the top leather workers in Africa. All leather comes from indigenous Boran cows that graze and roam freely throughout the Kenyan countryside.

While sizing and styles vary, each StashBelt is equipped with a hidden zipper pocket to store important papers (copies of your passport, bank/credit cards, travel insurance, etc.) and emergency money (up to 10 bills can fit folded up).

All StashBelts are equipped with a small slot for our custom-made 4GB USB jump drives.

Buckle up and Stashbelt's hidden payload is now safe from prying eyes!

How will we use your money?

Well first of all, $10,000 goes a LONG way in Kenya!

As you can see, our Nairobi workshop is a little cramped even by local standards. Despite these conditions, the team has been able to turn out incredible products and create exciting new designs every time we speak to them. Our first bit of business is to move to a cleaner and larger location just down the road. Your Indiegogo pledge ensures a stable income for our master leather artisans and young apprentices. Together we're creating jobs and putting food on the tables of a lot of underemployed yet talented Kenyans.

The remaining funds will be directed into tooling up the shop for more sustainable and large-scale production, purchasing organic leather and raw materials (always locally sourced) and finally sorting out a streamlined method of getting our belts from Nairobi to your doorstep!

Your support means we can turn StashBelt into a reality. Help us create sustainable jobs and change lives in Kenya. In exchange you'll score sweet gear making you the coolest traveler around.

Check out this killer messenger bag (only 50 available) that our guys recently completed:

What makes Stashbelt different?

A North-South partnership conceived to leverage the complementary skills of African artisans and North American entrepreneurs, StashBelt pioneers a new model of cooperative development and shared benefit. To us, social enterprise isn't a passing fad; the triple bottom line is real and here to stay.

With this in mind, StashBelt pays above-market wages to our workers, sources only free-range Boran cows for leather hides, provides vocational training and certification for apprentices, and donates a portion of all profits to the StashBelt Foundation.

What's the StashBelt Foundation?

The StashBelt Foundation (SBF) aims to address issues of poverty and development in Kenya through the lens of trade not aid, pride not pity. With our first loan, SBF has helped launch the Kibera Gamer's Cafe, a video game hangout for kids in the largest slum in East Africa. 

From the first day, the Kibera Gamer's Cafe has become a hot spot and positive space for youth to hang out after school. Based on its success, plans for expansion into the next shop and more gaming systems are in the works.
 
SBF will continue to support similar creative projects in Kenya that provide long-term employment opportunities and positive spaces for youth.
 

Sounds amazing but what should I do now?

Please take a look at the rewards we have to offer. While climbing Mt. Kilimanjaro is obviously the coolest, we sincerely hope that you will consider buying a StashBelt as we are a new social enterprise looking to create a new way to do business while doing good in the world.

Feeling generous? Did you know more than 1/3rd of all Indiegogo donors show their support by donating above and beyond the perk amount? - And you can too!

Feeling frugal? We still need your help! Support us by spreading the word in any way you can: Like us, Tweet us, Pin us, Post us, let your favorite newspaper/blogger know... and for God's sake somebody please tell Ellen!

Thank you in advance for supporting our project.

If you have any questions, please feel free to email us at: info@stashbelt.ca

story:
Help support AVNAH for her showcase PLITZS NYFW

Fashion Designer Avnah Davis-Long has recently been approved to showcase during NYFW at the Warwick Hotel. This is a great opportunity for her and she greatly appreciates your efforts to help get her there. We are grateful for your support and all contributions are very much appreciated.

AVNAH is making a huge mark in the fashion industry. This collection features structured cuts, diverse patterns and creative design.  She is known for her ability to evolve, to take risk and go in a 360 degree opposite of the normal or everyday trends. Although she never recieved any kind of formal training or fashion schooling, her career as a designer has made a tremendous mark in the fashion industry in a short time.

Please support this campaign to help get AVNAH to NYFW! We thank you in advance for all of your support!

story:
Designed to fight childhood cancer, the Georgetown Jingle is ultimately about the children and teenagers who are living with cancer every day. Each year patients volunteer to be Patient Ambassadors for the Jingle. These patients and their families are partnered with a participating designer, and they willingly share their stories, their disappointments and their successes with all of us. Every time a member of the Jingle team walks into the pediatric clinic at the Georgetown Lombardi Comprehensive Cancer Center, one is a struck by the artwork on the ceilings and on the walls; the unflappable parent comforting a tired child; the tireless action of the staff; the smiles on all the faces; the courage that each and every child and adult must have to walk through those doors each day.

*This cause is very close to my heart, please donate any amout you can! 

Please check out our DELICOUS sponsor for the event.  The gelato is legit!

Dolci Gelati was started in 2005 by Former Italian champion water polo player turned pastry chef Gianluigi Dellaccio. Dolci Gelati offers many great varieties of gelato with a consistent level of quality that can only be achieved with artisan precision. The process starts every morning with deliveries from local dairy farms and other handpicked fruits, fine chocolates and other fresh ingredients.  Gelato offers the same great taste as ice cream with 1/3 the fat and none of the artificial ingredients. Gianluigi uses a 100% authentic Italian recipe and local fresh ingredients to bring you a little bit of Italy across the Atlantic.

 

Dolci Gelati is proud to support the Georgetown Jingle.  Beginning on November 27, #GivingTuesday, we have helped to design and erect a beautiful Christmas Tree at the Four Seasons in Washington DC which will be auctioned off.  As part of the package to be auctioned off, we will also donate a gelato party for 100 people to whoever wins the tree.

 

For more information about Dolci Gelati please visit www.dolcigelati.net

The process starts every morning with deliveries from local dairy farms and other handpicked fruits, fine chocolates and other fresh ingredients.  Gelato offers the same great taste as ice cream with 1/3 the fat and none of the artificial ingredients. Gianluigi uses a 100% authentic Italian recipe and local fresh ingredients to bring you a little bit of Italy across the Atlantic.
 
Dolci Gelati is proud to support the Georgetown Jingle.  Beginning on November 27, #GivingTuesday, we have helped to design and erect a beautiful Christmas Tree at the Four Seasons in Washington DC which will be auctioned off.  As part of the package to be auctioned off, we will also donate a gelato party for 100 people to whoever wins the tree.
 
For more information about Dolci Gelati please visit www.dolcigelati.net

story:
Support us & get a zip-on cover for your stability ball!

Product Overview
myBall covers transform plastic stability balls into a decorative addition to any room. They are great for additional seating or light workouts. Simply zip your myBall cover over your stability ball to create a new seating option. Our patent pending design also includes an integrated handle that makes it easy to carry your myBall from room to room or with you on the go. Fits a 65cm/26" or 75cm/29" stability ball. Removes easily. Machine washable. Made from recycled microfiber. Stability ball sold separately.  If you do not currently own a stability ball, we like this one. 


For our indiegogo campaign, we're launching one of our Signature navy and white NOPA myBall patterns (see image above). We will begin offering more patterns and designs available for purchase through our website in 2013.  

The idea for myBall spawned due to the growing popularity of stability balls as an alternative seating option in offices, homes and dorm rooms alike.  Many of our friends own stability balls, but they all look so plain and boring.  We saw an opportunity to enable people to outfit these PVC design nightmares in fun, sophisticated patterns.

Since creating some of our initial prototypes, we've had a lot of interest in myBall covers and we're currently designing a few other patterns that we hope to launch early next year.  Our goal is to sell at least 30,000 units of myBall covers in 2012 and become a household brand by 2015.  In order to do this we really need your help! We hope to raise the capital required to buy sustainable materials to produce additional myBall covers with our manufacturing partner.  Every investment, big or small, will help, and we'll show our appreciation by offering our unique, lovingly crafted rewards at each level. Thank you!


If you are not able to contribute, that doesn’t mean they can’t help.  Get the word out and make some noise about our myBall campaign.  You can share our project with your friends using the indiegogo share tools or follow us on our facebook page! Find out more about us through our website.  

Team

Shannon Grant and Peter Lockett founded myBall out of a combination of a good friendship and the love of pursuing ideas together. We love building new things and it is this passion that lead us to conceive myBall.

We decided to develop myBall as our first project as we saw huge potential from the beginning to reinvent the idea of the chair in the 21st century. We know that the best designs, applications and uses are yet to come, but we already believe myBall can change the way we sit for the better.

myball.co (that’s right, .CO)



A Sedentary Population
We sit too much. Many of us have sedentary jobs and engage in sedentary activities after work, like sitting on a couch watching television or sitting around a dinner table talking. When you add it all up, it's a lot more sitting than moving.

Risks Associated With a Sedentary Lifestyle
Researchers have tied sitting for long periods of time with a number of health concerns, including obesity, increased blood pressure, high blood sugar, excess body fat around the waist and abnormal cholesterol levels. While sitting at a desk hardly seems like a high-risk pastime, the health problems associated with it can seem surprising. People say, ‘Sitting at a desk all day is just part of working in an office. How can sitting all day at a desk be bad for your health?’ The human body was not designed to sit for long periods of time. We need to move. Incorporating movement into our day is one of the best ways to get healthier and keep our brains engaged. myBall aims to solve a widespread problem: encouraging an increasingly sedentary society to move throughout the day.

Burns Calories, Really?
Sitting on an stability ball (versus a chair) burns about six percent more calories than using a normal desk chair, according to a 2008 University of Buffalo study published in The European Journal of Applied Physiology.

Spinal Health
Sitting on an stability ball instead of a chair is also a good way to keep your spine healthy. The stability ball's instability forces your core muscles to work constantly at keeping you stable. Also, because the ball rolls around, it keeps you on your toes and keeps your body moving, which help prevent the stiffness and back pain that you can get from being too sedentary.

If you're going to sit, sit on a myBall!
