story:
Good day Fam!

Thank you for stopping by to check out our campaign. My name is Lawrence Young and I’m the Founder of STIR IT UP. I’m ecstatic to finally introduce the brand and make it public. I’ve been dreaming, meditating and grooming the STIR IT UP concept for a little over a year now. With God’s grace, the time to stir it up is now!

STIR IT UP is a company that uses artistic expression to stimulate, uplift and inspire progressive thinkers to reach their greatest God given potential.

It is our mission to present the unequivocal truth of who we are and what infinite power we all have to affect, lead and revolutionize our planet for the better. STIR IT UP!

Join us by helping to seed this awesome project! We've got great ideas, inspiration and ingenuity, but we need your help in giving the plan a jumpstart.

Being able to personally identify with a product is a rare and important quality for any consumer. STIR IT UP looks to provide our consumer with a quality product that was developed especially with you in mind. As we make efforts to introduce the brand to the market, there are costs associated with doing it in a timely and effective manner.

Backing this project at any level means a lot to us! All funds raised from this campaign will cover the production, packaging and distribution of our products in our starting t-shirt line. It will also help us produce and launch our e-commerce store. We know that if we can produce this first batch of t-shirts on our ecommerce website, we will be well on our way to success.

In return we are going to hook you up!

We see you as a partner in the company and want to make you a part of this experience. In exchange for your help at the various donation levels, the SIU team will honor your giving with  personal/public recognition, a sample of our products, website credits, official merchandise, and even an opportunity to have a T- shirt designed in your honor! Join the SIU fam today!

--------------

Stir It Up will donate a percentage of every tee shirt order received from the company’s retail website to Boys & Girls Clubs of America. It is the BGCA mission to enable all young people, especially those who need us most, to reach their full potential as productive, caring, responsible citizens. When you purchase your Stir It Up tee shirt, a Boys & Girls Club member gets one step closer to his or her high school graduation day!

Help us spread the word! Share our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Instagram or anywhere you hang online. Every level of giving makes a difference.

www.twitter.com/STIRITUP2

www.faceboook.com/STIRITUP2

My hope for our Indiegogo campaign is about so much more than raising money for our company. It will help us connect with people in  different countries around the world and create an ongoing community of supporters.

From my heart to yours,

Thank You

Lawrence

                                                 www.LetsStirItUp.com

story:
Hi everyone.  This project is cancelled and a new one will be started under the name of 'Happy Scissors."   The my pet scissors name was confusing to a few who though the scissors were for their cat, dog, or pet.

I'm raising money to finish development and bring to market a first time new design 

I was motivated to create this new design after I saw a picture on the internet of a 4 year old little boy who stuck a huge pair of scissors into his face when he was running and fell with them in his hands. 

Just the thought alone of a child being injured by a pair of scissors is more than enough to create needless stress and anxiety.  It only takes a few seconds for a bad accident to happen.  

Every parent shares this fear, and for far too many, this fear becomes a reality.  Thousands of children are rushed to hospital emergency room every year because of scissor accident.

Every child is at risk when using normal pointed scissors. 

I think you will agree that one accident is one too many. Together, we can provide a higher level of safety four you children and millions of others.  Please help me bring this product to life by picking a perk listed on the right and then making a donation. 

Please donate today.  You get great thank you perks in return for your donations; exclusive limited edition T-shirts, caps, first parents to have a set of "My Pet Scissors," more.  You can even give in the name of someone else such as a mother's day gift.

"My Pet Scissors" is a revolutionary, exciting new design in safety scissors for children.  Together, with your help, we can help protect millions of children from needless tragedies.

This project can only be a success with you help. It won't happen without your support.  Every day lost is another day another child is needlessly hurt.  Every dollar counts.  You can make a difference.

  1. Do you want to help make children's lives safer?
  2. Would you feel good knowing that you helped a parent breathe a sigh of relief because their child was not hurt by standard scissors? 
  3. Would you be proud wearing your limited edition "My Pet Scissors Founding Contributor" T-shirt and a parent see it and thanks you?
  4. Would you like to be one of the select few to be the first to receive your own pair of limited edition "My Pet Scissors" and other limited edition perks?
  5. Will you help me spread the word and also make a ‘contributing founder’ donation today?

Thank You, Kenneth Doyle

 

The Fun Part - The Printed Versions - Your "My Pet Scissors"

Making a contribution - PayPal.

Contributions are made through PayPal.  A PayPal account is not required.  You can use your account or as a guest.  To make your contribution, click the 'Contribute Now' or 'Claim This Perk' button, fill out the form, and then continue on to PayPal.  Your information is only seen by PayPal and is safeand secure.

"I love My Pet Scissors."  If I could talk yet that is.


DESIGN NOTES:

  • The pictures of the three My Pet Scissors are concept drawings. 
  • The mechanics of the scissors is not shown. 
  • The scissors part itself is just like a standard sewing scissor, except that the cutting blade is lengthened to 75%.  
  • It is then encased in a circular ring that has room on the side for the Pet images. 
  • The two different designs seen in the above pictures will be merged together into one single version.

DESIGN DETAILS:

  1. Size - The first versions of My Pet Scissors will be between 4"- 5" inches in diameter.  The maximum cutting lenght of the blades will be 75% of the diameter.  Kids have show to love the larger of the two sizes.
  2. The handle of a conventional scissor is removed and the blades are encompassed in a circular cage. The sides are printed with cute pet faces.
  3. Each My Pet Scissors Pet comes with its pet pedigree certificate.
  4. To use - simply squeeze the scissors together to cut.  Similar to how open end sewing scissors are used.
  5. Finger cut risk is reduced because the blades automatically return to their original opening width of approximately 1/4".  .
  6. The circular design eliminates dangerous points. 
  7. The blades are made of metal and the rest is plastic.


Funds Are Needed to Finalize Design and Begin Production.

  • Contract with a design studio to finalize the product. 
  • Create packaging and get a UPC number. (Bar code)
  • Product molds, raw materials, assembly.
  • Beginning inventory.  Product Insurance.
  • Send out promotional samples to bloggers and family websites.
  • Additional expenses include project and PayPal fees, perks and shipping.  We might have to pay CA. sales tax on perks.

The benefits of the product. 

Safe: 

Safer, reduced accident risk. 

  • Peace of mind.
  • One less thing to worry about.
  • Round, no sharp points.
  • Limited blade opening width - reduced finger cut potential

Fun: 

Tests show kids love them. 

  • Future Products - Complete Sets 
  • Dog Breeds
  • Cat Breeds
  • Barnyard Animals
  • Wild Animals
  • Birds
  • Chinese Horoscope
  • Western Horoscope
  • Scissor Shack - A storage case holding 10 My Pet Scissors. 
  • Collect them all.

The Designer: 

Kenneth Joseph Doyle III

  • Information Technology Specialist – 25 years.
    • Telecommunications - Healthcare - Entertainment.
  • Created the Soul Shack brand. 
    • Inactive since the recession.
    • See link to Soul Shack at bottom of this page.
    • Not accepting orders at this time.
  • Founded a non-profit in 1999 (currently inactive) for Veterans and their families. Garnered proclamations of support from 26 State Governors, and two popular celebrities endorsements. Links are below.

My Pet Scissors will marketed under the Soul Shack brand.


Contributions And Perks: 

The My Pet Scissors project can only become a reality with your support.

All donor names will be listed on the My Pet Scissors website.  Everyone will know you were part of this historical product launch.

  1. Contributors will receive a perk in return for their contribution. 
  2. Perks are listed above. Please remember to add the listed shipping and handling fees.  
  3. Perks destined for AK, HI, and foreign countries might require an additional surcharge for shipping.
  4. All perks are limited editions and are only available to you - the founding contributors.

We can exceed our funding goal and it is important that we do.  We can produce more products and deliver them sooner to more people.  Every extra dollar counts.


Other Ways You Can Help:

Even if you can't make a donation, please spread the word on your Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest pages, on blogs and websites focusing on parenting and children's topics.  Thank You.

story:
SAY GOODBYE TO TRADITIONAL

 

 

SAY HELLO TO DISC WALLET

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

SOLVING A REAL PROBLEM

 

Over the past few years, the minimalist wallet market has grown ever so extensive.

From the selection of beautifully handcrafted wallets to innovative wallets, the one thing we failed to notice was a minimalist wallet that truly excelled in coins, cash and cards accessibility.

Whilst contactless cards are popular in some countries, coins and cash are still the primary traditional form of payment in most countries around the world. 

Having seen feedback from all previous backers and our own frustrations with carrying around coins in bulky wallets for years, led to the journey of finding a solution where minimalist meets traditional.

            

We started with this problem.

We ended up solving it,

 

Disc Wallet is a throwback to the original Sony Discman and accompanying CD binders from the 1980s and 1990s which held CD-ROMs upright. Innovative for its time, the Discman revolutionised the whole industry.

We wanted to bring the same traditional principles and philosophy into our designs and hence the Disc Wallet was born to hold coins upright whilst still creating something beautiful, slim, packed with features and most importantly minimalist for the new generation.

                        

 

Our eureka moment!

 

In a eureka moment and after buying some cardboard paper, stretch bands we created a simple prototype. After searching countlessly we came across a genuine leathermaker business and created the first set of designs that led to multiple field testings, feedback, pivots, iterations, resulting in the highest quality product that solved the problem.

 

INITIAL PROTOTYPE

 

 

FINAL DESIGN

Initial Pattern Making

 

Leather Cutting

 

Traditional Hand Stitching

 

Premium Leather Handcrafted Disc Wallet

 

 

 

 

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

 

 

RFID Card Features:

Traditional RFID fabrics are only effective for small range frequencies.

RFID shield card has been created exclusively for backers which provides the maximum protection and blocking technology to prevent unauthorized access to personal information.

Fits easily in the Disc Wallet card slot.

Protects following types of contactless cards: All payment cards, Student IDs, Transit cards such as Oyster, ID cards, Access cards operates on frequency 13,56 MHz and Cards such as MIFARE, HID iClass, DESFire.

ISO 14443/15693 and EPC Gen1/Gen2 contactless smart card.

 

100% Full Grain Calf Leather Features:

 

 

We work closely with our supplier and only chose the highest quality of 100% Full Grain Calf Leather.

Features great durability and strength which can last a lifetime.

Entirely organic material.

Full-grain leather breathes and ventilates body heat away from the body, allowing them to remain cool and comfortable in summer while not becoming cold and rigid in winter.

Natural, supple, and provides a robust hand.

All wallets are traditional hand sewn with top quality stitching techniques, we are bringing back this lost art form.

 

 

REWARDS

 

 

 

 

 

PRODUCTION TIMELINE

 

 

We have completed an intensive, 6 month-long prototyping process with consistent stages of testing feedback, iterations to perfect our Disc Wallet as we move into production.

The next step is to place the order for materials and start the first production run of wallets. We will aim for early shipments making them great gifts coming towards the holiday season.

 

 

WHO ARE WE

 

 

Disc Brand Co. is an independent studio based in London with the goal of bringing you the best, slim, durable minimalist wallets.

The Disc Wallet is made for the everyday modern man looking for accessibility in his daily essentials. Inspired by minimalism, simplism and exploration.

We are passionate in creating products with the top craftsmanship and never compromise on quality. Our mantra is to always keep our customers satisfied and we will never fail on that promise.

We need your support to launch the Disc Wallet. We are raising funding for manufacturing, packaging, and logistics.

We always challenge the status quo and will continue to listen, evolve and bring out exciting products in the pipeline.

We have a small team with big ambitions and want to say thank-you for giving us the opportunity to create the Disc Wallet for you.

Want Hi-Res images to share on your blog?

They can be found here in our media kit:

 

STAY TUNED

 


 

     
 

  

 

RISK AND CHALLENGES

 

All projects have their challenges. Because Disc Wallet is made 100% in-house we have full control of the high quality of the work performed. This allows us to keep prices down and have control over the processes involved.

Our biggest challenge is delivering on schedule however from experience, we've found that having a working prototype is not enough. In order to accurately calculate manufacturing time, a production run is needed. We've done this and planned accordingly including surveys and logistical partners. If volume overwhelms us, we have a professional post-production team on standby.

Our personal promise is to run everything as streamlined as possible and also ahead of schedule. If you ever have any questions, feel free to reach out to us and we will get back to you ASAP.

 

FAQ

 

How many cards does the Disc Wallet hold?

Disc Wallet is capable of  holding 6 - 10 cards using all compartments

Will the coins fall out?

No.

We have tried and tested all scenarios and created a durable product to withstand all times a wallet is held, front pocket, back pocket, shirt pocket, blazer pocket, upright, upside down, all different angles, the coins stay compact and well held together.

Can I put keys in the wallet?

Yes, the two stitched pockets on top of the wallet are designed to fit keys in either compartment. We have created an intuitive design with daily essentials in mind.

When do the wallets ship?

Please see the timeline noted above. We will provide your updates as we start manufacturing and packaging the wallets for shipment.

Can the wallet fit all international notes and coin sizes?

Yes, the wallet allows for tall notes and large coins from all around the world.

I love your wallet, I want to distribute it in my shop / network / country, how can I do it?

Thanks for you interest in our project! Please send us an email at discbrandco@gmail.com Please let us know if you'd like to sell our products to final customers (B2C) or to sell them to shops (B2B), let us know which brands you distribute, and what is your network of retailers.

Do you ship worldwide?

Yes! We ship worldwide. We are based in the UK and ship internationally.

Do you offer more colours?

Our initial Disc Wallet is in the Walnut Brown colour. We will be looking to add more colours in the future.

Do you offer smart trackable features?

Not in the current version. We are working with well-known suppliers at the forefront of this technology and will look to release these in the future.

Love the artwork in the background who did that?

Thanks! Artwork was supplied by the super talented Vivian K, checkout her artwork @VivianKokundArt
story_txt: SAY GOODBYE TO TRADITIONAL  SAY HELLO TO DISC WALLET              SOLVING A REAL PROBLEM Over the past few years, the minimalist wallet market has grown ever so extensive.From the selection of beautifully handcrafted wallets to innovative wallets, the one thing we failed to notice was a minimalist wallet that truly excelled in coins, cash and cards accessibility.Whilst contactless cards are popular in some countries, coins and cash are still the primary traditional form of payment in most countries around the world. Having seen feedback from all previous backers and our own frustrations with carrying around coins in bulky wallets for years, led to the journey of finding a solution where minimalist meets traditional.            We started with this problem.We ended up solving it, Disc Wallet is a throwback to the original Sony Discman and accompanying CD binders from the 1980s and 1990s which held CD-ROMs upright. Innovative for its time, the Discman revolutionised the whole industry.We wanted to bring the same traditional principles and philosophy into our designs and hence the Disc Wallet was born to hold coins upright whilst still creating something beautiful, slim, packed with features and most importantly minimalist for the new generation.                         Our eureka moment! In a eureka moment and after buying some cardboard paper, stretch bands we created a simple prototype. After searching countlessly we came across a genuine leathermaker business and created the first set of designs that led to multiple field testings, feedback, pivots, iterations, resulting in the highest quality product that solved the problem. INITIAL PROTOTYPE  FINAL DESIGNInitial Pattern Making Leather Cutting Traditional Hand Stitching Premium Leather Handcrafted Disc Wallet    PRODUCT DESCRIPTION   RFID Card Features:Traditional RFID fabrics are only effective for small range frequencies.RFID shield card has been created exclusively for backers which provides the maximum protection and blocking technology to prevent unauthorized access to personal information.Fits easily in the Disc Wallet card slot.Protects following types of contactless cards: All payment cards, Student IDs, Transit cards such as Oyster, ID cards, Access cards operates on frequency 13,56 MHz and Cards such as MIFARE, HID iClass, DESFire.ISO 14443/15693 and EPC Gen1/Gen2 contactless smart card. 100% Full Grain Calf Leather Features:  We work closely with our supplier and only chose the highest quality of 100% Full Grain Calf Leather.Features great durability and strength which can last a lifetime.Entirely organic material.Full-grain leather breathes and ventilates body heat away from the body, allowing them to remain cool and comfortable in summer while not becoming cold and rigid in winter.Natural, supple, and provides a robust hand.All wallets are traditional hand sewn with top quality stitching techniques, we are bringing back this lost art form.  REWARDS     PRODUCTION TIMELINE  We have completed an intensive, 6 month-long prototyping process with consistent stages of testing feedback, iterations to perfect our Disc Wallet as we move into production.The next step is to place the order for materials and start the first production run of wallets. We will aim for early shipments making them great gifts coming towards the holiday season.  WHO ARE WE  Disc Brand Co. is an independent studio based in London with the goal of bringing you the best, slim, durable minimalist wallets.The Disc Wallet is made for the everyday modern man looking for accessibility in his daily essentials. Inspired by minimalism, simplism and exploration.We are passionate in creating products with the top craftsmanship and never compromise on quality. Our mantra is to always keep our customers satisfied and we will never fail on that promise.We need your support to launch the Disc Wallet. We are raising funding for manufacturing, packaging, and logistics.We always challenge the status quo and will continue to listen, evolve and bring out exciting products in the pipeline.We have a small team with big ambitions and want to say thank-you for giving us the opportunity to create the Disc Wallet for you.Want Hi-Res images to share on your blog?They can be found here in our media kit: STAY TUNED             RISK AND CHALLENGES All projects have their challenges. Because Disc Wallet is made 100% in-house we have full control of the high quality of the work performed. This allows us to keep prices down and have control over the processes involved.Our biggest challenge is delivering on schedule however from experience, we've found that having a working prototype is not enough. In order to accurately calculate manufacturing time, a production run is needed. We've done this and planned accordingly including surveys and logistical partners. If volume overwhelms us, we have a professional post-production team on standby.Our personal promise is to run everything as streamlined as possible and also ahead of schedule. If you ever have any questions, feel free to reach out to us and we will get back to you ASAP. FAQ How many cards does the Disc Wallet hold?Disc Wallet is capable of  holding 6 - 10 cards using all compartmentsWill the coins fall out?No.We have tried and tested all scenarios and created a durable product to withstand all times a wallet is held, front pocket, back pocket, shirt pocket, blazer pocket, upright, upside down, all different angles, the coins stay compact and well held together.Can I put keys in the wallet?Yes, the two stitched pockets on top of the wallet are designed to fit keys in either compartment. We have created an intuitive design with daily essentials in mind.When do the wallets ship?Please see the timeline noted above. We will provide your updates as we start manufacturing and packaging the wallets for shipment.Can the wallet fit all international notes and coin sizes?Yes, the wallet allows for tall notes and large coins from all around the world.I love your wallet, I want to distribute it in my shop / network / country, how can I do it?Thanks for you interest in our project! Please send us an email at discbrandco@gmail.com Please let us know if you'd like to sell our products to final customers (B2C) or to sell them to shops (B2B), let us know which brands you distribute, and what is your network of retailers.Do you ship worldwide?Yes! We ship worldwide. We are based in the UK and ship internationally.Do you offer more colours?Our initial Disc Wallet is in the Walnut Brown colour. We will be looking to add more colours in the future.Do you offer smart trackable features?Not in the current version. We are working with well-known suppliers at the forefront of this technology and will look to release these in the future.Love the artwork in the background who did that?Thanks! Artwork was supplied by the super talented Vivian K, checkout her artwork @VivianKokundArt

story:
SERMAN BRANDS 2.0 patent pending, Is a modern interpretation of minimalism and design infused together in a travel wallet.Hand crafted individually for travel and style whether it's a broad or to the grocery store on your way to your grandmas. A wallet for YOU! 

Wearing a dark blue tie, plain silver cuff-links and a pair of black lace-up Aldo shoes.

The next best satisfying addition to your wardrobe. 

You are a go getter. You get things done. 

 Whether you're starting off your morning right with your favorite cup of coffee or making phone calls or enjoying the nice day outside the SERMAN BRANDS wallet is there with you. 

You believe in the good of your community for a better tomorrow. 

SERMAN BRANDS does too.

Smart Tab you would never have to worry about a disorganized wallet! Store up to 5 cards and easily access them by pulling on the tab. 

The Problem: Constantly digging through a bulky wallet wastes time and energy in our busy world.The average person uses 1-2 main cards throughout their day.

The solution: The SERMAN BRANDS 2.0 wallet gives you quick access to your favorite or most used card. With the SERMAN BRANDS

Problem: Identity Theft is at All Time High. The Secret to Keeping Your Data Safe! Unless properly shielded, your card-based data is readily available when any active reader is in range!

Solution: SERMAN BRANDS 2.0 is equipped with RFID Blocking technology. The Best Way to Protect Your Smart Cards from unwanted capture of data from your:

• Credit or Debit (for example: MC PayPass, VISA PayWave, AMEX expresspay, INTERAC Flash, etc.)

•Driver's license  

•Protects against access by NFC-equipped Smartphones

The RFID lining does not shield against some cards that operate at low frequencies of 125 kHz like hotel key cards, employee ID Badges, transit passes etc. 

 Choose from any of the three colors, Texas Brown, California Desert, or Jetblack. Made with the Finest Full Grain leather,looks classy and very slim, Wallet Size: 4.25" in. x 3" in. .4" in.

 You invest in hobbies that make you happy.

Awaken Adventure. Grab your wallet and GO! SERMANBRANDS 2.0 got you covered. The destinations are endless.

 Be you. Follow your heart to uncharted territories.

SERMANBRANDS originated in a small town of California as Dad and the eldest son had a vision to create a family business. All aspects of this Kickstarter 2.0 project; from wallet design, creative design, pictures, and videos, were created exclusively by members of the SERMAN family. 

After long dedicated work days they join the rest of the family for European originated dishes as Mama busily feeds nine children as well as encourages and blesses the Serman Brands team. Together the family supports their passions and keeps this dream in their prayers. 

Risks and challenges

We value you, our supporters, and value our project.

We worked closely with our trusted supplier who helped us bring our last 2 Kickstarter project to life, in which we successfully delivered all the rewards/products. Our backers were satisfied!

Many years of experience has taught our team that although we are prepared in every aspect, unexpected events may come up that are not in our control. We ensure you, that we will take the necessary measures to directly communicate with you if any issue on shipping or production arises.

story:
I am... a mother, a wife, an aunt, a cousin, a daughter, a sister, a friend... and like you, I have to wear clothing in all of these roles. (bummer, right?!)  I also want to be an independent woman (hear me roar)... but a woman that has fun and creates love and positivity in her life... 

So... as I looked around me, I realized I wanted to work for myself, but with a company that has this same mission... what I found, well... it was nothing short of amazing... I found a clothing company that sells seriously cool clothes, which compliment all women …. large, small, curvy, straight, conservative, creative, short and tall... oh, did I mention... kiddos too?!  (check out the pics in my "Gallery")


And I'm ready...I am jumping off the cliff... arms outstretched... knowing I am amazing... but I need your help.  My goal for this fundraiser is $6,500...(This pays for the initial inventory which will include 300 items plus 70 pairs of super cute leggings.... pictured above ).... With this money, I will get the most amazing clothes (seriously... I can't say enough good things about how awesome these clothes are), and begin creating a community where women get to hang out, shop, and get to LOVE their clothes (and how they feel in them).


What do you get if you support me by donating... well, I'm glad you asked :) 

     First, you get added to my VIP list, which gets you access to the first order before I open it to the public. You will be invited to my home for the reveal of all products (plus, some wine, cheese, and great company with some glorious women)

     Second, you get some bang for your buck: 

  • Donate $50 receive 2 pairs of leggings from the initial inventory
  • Donate $100 receive  1 maxi dress
  • Donate $200 receive 2 pairs of leggings, 1 maxi dress
  • Donate $300 or more receive 1 pair of leggings, 1 dress or skirt and a shirt.
  • GUYS if your donating you will get to have a gift card for the lady of your choice with the items as free to gift to them. :-)

     Third, you receive a chance to win a free item from the line. 


What do you get if you support me by sharing this fundraising link? 

You receive a chance to win a free item from the line.  (Just tag my name when you share my post-- the more you share the more your name goes in the drawing).

 
I've decided to make this campaign run for a short 30 days ... (I have this vision of an amazing valentine's day party where women come together to really soak in how beautiful and wonderful they are... to really love themselves)... to accomplish that, I need this campaign to wrap up early January so inventory is here by Valentine's Day... SOOOOOOOOOOOO... jump on board... donate and share :)  


Love and light, 

Stacy

story:
Exchange rate Dollar to Euro: 1,00$ = 0,88€

deutsche version

 

THANKS TO 

EVERY SINGLE BACKER FOR 

AMAZING 139 CONTRIBUTIONS!

 
 

 

 

 

CABIN SPACEY - home anywhere

A new genre of urban living above the roofs and in every niche of the city. Together we will build a prototype!

 

Over the past 100 years, our urban living situation has changed very little. Whether brownstone or high-rise: The average configuration of two rooms/kitchen/bath remains standard. At the same time, our cities keep growing while affordable space is at a premium, making apartment hunting increasingly stressful. The resulting new urban challenges demand progressive innovations.
It’s not just modern urban nomads – here today, there tomorrow – who need CABIN SPACEY.

 

 

CABIN SPACEY offers living space that’s very much now: crafted from sustainable materials and designed to match the actual needs of those looking for a new home. Environmentally friendly, contemporary, intelligent, modular, flexible. No matter where you plan to live: Cabin Spacey exploits previously untapped potential. The minimal homes for new living conquer your city’s upper-most level – its rooftops. Berlin alone has 55,000 unused roofs that are unsuitable for regular development. This is where Cabin Spacey comes in.

 

 

The path forward takes us all the way up: CABIN SPACEY exemplifies the growing demand for high-quality, resource efficient, and extremely flexible urban living space. At just over 20 square meters, the smallest unit can easily house 2 people. CABIN SPACEY consists of an outer hull and an interior supply unit featuring a bathroom, bed, and kitchenette. For urban nomads, the minimal house is the perfect choice: It’s easy to transport, easy to install, and easily hooked up to existing utilities and infrastructures, whether unused roof, urban wasteland, or parking lot. With CABIN SPACEY, a confident generation unlocks new oases in the metropolitan jungle.

 

 

How it works

Many decision-makers are already intrigued by the idea. Negotiations with potential customers are currently under way. Our first prototype is about to see the light of day: CABIN SPACEY Model Zero – supported by Thoma Holz100, Green Living, and the Berlin-Mitte Housing Society.

Now, we want you to join the fun and help us bring CABIN SPACEY to life!

Leave your mark in the very first cabin or select a building block to contribute. Be the first to spend a night in CABIN SPACEY above the city’s skyline.

 

CABIN SPACEY features

CABIN SPACEY is completely sustainable: Holz100 technology turns a timber house into CABIN SPACEY. A large battery solar set-up, integrated into the innovation’s sandwich floor, provides the necessary power – and even supplies the house below in case of overproduction. If desired, the flexible minimal home can also be fitted with contemporary hardware selected by its residents.

Urban challenge

CABIN SPACEY offers easy access to new, innovative, and purist living spaces for urban nomads or anyone else fed up with the restrictions of traditional living.

 

Ready to go

Your support will help us realize the first prototype. The moment Model Zero is up and running and filled with life, we will attract global interest to this new type of living, inviting people to explore the experience of Cabin Spacey and enjoy the infinite possibilities of today’s intelligent living concept, designed for tomorrow.

 

The Team - Who we are

 

Simon - Designer of Future Housing and Mobility in Cities

As architect and driving force, Simon has already realized a huge range of ideas across many freelance projects via architectural competitions, product design, and smart city research.

 

Andreas - Architect and Wunderkind in Operations

Andreas is well-versed in all areas of private and public architecture, having a hand in design, detailed design, and project management. He is in charge of fine-tuning the Cabin Spacey concept: from initial design and building law all the way down to realization.

 

 

Extended Team

Cabin Spacey becomes real with the support of great people who pursue a vision of future living in cities:

Sebastian, Market & Service Researcher, supports the core team with product & business development.

Sarah, Growth Hacker, supports us with her creative Marketing against a budget of zero.

 

Christian, the sustainable materials guru supports us with his product expertise and supplier network.

 

 

Cooperations

CABIN SPACEY is very much the work of a team, supported by

smart urban pioneers

Green Living, the eco-friendly interior shop for sustainable materials,

Austrian manufacturer Thoma Holz100, and the housing association

WBM - Wohnungsbaugesellschaft Berlin Mitte.

 

 

 

Initiator and supporter of the campaign is smart with the smart urban pioneers challenge.
On top of the fundig goal, smart will provide up to 25.000€ of prize money

                          

 

                                                 

Partners

               

Sponsors

      

 

 

 

                

              

                          

 

       

 

      

 

 

 

Supporter

 

                    

     

      

 

 

     

 

Networks

    

 

Media

 

 

 

 

 

    

 

 

PRESS KIT

 

 

 

CABIN SPACEY Status:

 

For all supporters receiving a special status you will get off for
PREMIUM STATUS       5%
SUPERIOR STATUS      7%
GOLD STATUS                10%
for all over night stays in CABIN SPACEY worldwide.

 

 
 
 
 
 
_________________________________________________________________________

 

deutsch
 

CABIN SPACEY - home anywhere

Ein neues Genre des urbanen Wohnens auf den Dächern und in jeder Nische der Stadt. Zusammen wollen wir einen Prototypen bauen!

In unseren Städten hat sich der Wohnraum seit 100 Jahren nicht mehr maßgeblich verändert. Ob Altbau oder Platte - wohnen nach Schema F mit ZweiZimmerKücheBad ist Standard. Gleichzeitig wachsen unsere Städte immer weiter, bezahlbarer Wohnraum wird immer knapper und die Wohnungssuche stressiger. Dadurch ergeben sich neue urbane Herausforderungen, die mit zukunftsorientierten Wohn-Innovationen gelöst werden können. Nicht nur moderne Großstadtnomaden - heute hier, morgen dort - brauchen CABIN SPACEY. 

 

CABIN SPACEY schafft Wohnraum für den Zeitgeist: nachhaltige Materialien, designed nach den wirklichen Bedürfnissen der Wohnungssuchenden. Ökologisch, modern, intelligent, modular, flexibel. Ganz gleich, wo Du wohnen willst: Cabin Spacey öffnet Wohnpotenziale, die bisher noch nicht wahrgenommen wurden. Die Minimalhäuser für das Neue Wohnen erobern den Top-Level Deiner Stadt: die Dächer. Allein in Berlin gibt es 55.000 ungenutzte Dächer, die man mit herkömmlicher Bauweise nicht nutzen kann. Aber mit CABIN SPACEY.

Der Weg nach vorne führt nach ganz oben: CABIN SPACEY steht für die wachsende Nachfrage nach urbanem Wohnraum von höchster Lebensqualität und Ressourceneffizienz bei maximaler Flexibilität. Die kleinste Einheit verfügt über knapp 20m2 und kann mindestens 2 Personen beherbergen. Cabin Spacey besteht aus einer äußeren Hülle und einer inneren Versorgungseinheit mit Bad, Küchenzeile und Bett. 

Für den Großstadtnomaden bietet das Minimalhaus ideale Bedingungen: es ist leicht zu transportieren, einfach aufzustellen und lässt sich mit wenigen Handgriffen an vorhandene Infrastrukturen anschließen. Ganz gleich, ob sie sich auf ungenutzten Dächern, urbanen Brachflächen oder Parkplätzen befinden. Eine selbstbewusste Generation erobert mit CABIN SPACEY neue Wohnoasen im Großstadtdschungel. 

CABIN SPACEY "Modell Null"

Wir bauen den ersten Prototypen: CABIN SPACEY Modell Null. Dafür haben wir die Unterstützung von Thoma Holz100, Green Living und der Wohnbaugesellschaft Mitte. 

Jetzt wollen wir, dass auch Ihr mit dabei seid und CABIN SPACEY mit zum Leben erweckt. Verewigt Euch im aller ersten Cabin, sucht Euch ein Bauteil aus, das ihr dazu beitragen wollt. Seid die ersten, die eine Nacht in CABIN SPACEY über den Dächern der Stadt verbringen.

CABIN SPACEY Features

CABIN SPACEY ist durch und durch ökologisch: Holz100 Technologie macht aus einem Holzhaus ein CABIN SPACEY. Eine Photovoltaik-Anlage mit einem großen Akku im Sandwich-Boden der Wohn-Innovation sorgt für den nötigen Strom - und kann bei Überproduktion sogar das Haus darunter noch mitversorgen. Das flexible Minimalhaus ist offen für zeitgemäße Hardware, mit denen die Bewohner ein CABIN SPACEY individuell ausstatten können. 

Urban Challenge

CABIN SPACEY ist der einfache Zugang zu neuem, innovativem und puristischem Wohnraum für urbane Stadtnomaden und alle anderen, die keine Lust mehr auf die Beschränkungen herkömmlichen Wohnens legen. 

Ready to go

Mit Eurer Unterstützung können wir einen ersten Prototypen realisieren.  Sobald Modell Null steht und mit Leben gefüllt wird, lenken wir weltweites Interesse auf die neue Wohnform, laden ein zum Erleben und Erfahren von CABIN SPACEY. Und überzeugen Interessenten von den unendlichen Möglichkeiten der intelligenten Wohnform von heute für morgen. 

Das Team - CABIN SPACEY Crew

Kern-Team

Simon - Experte in Minimal-Architektur und Mobilität in der Stadt.

Als treibende Kraft hat Simon bereits in vielen selbständigen Projekten aus den Bereichen Wettbewerbswesen Architektur, Produktdesign und Smart City Forschung die unterschiedlichsten Ideen umgesetzt. 

Andreas - Produktentwicklung und Ausführungsplanung

Andreas hat in allen Bereichen der öffentlichen und privaten Hand in Entwurf, Ausführungsplanung und Projektleitung gearbeitet. Er kümmert sich um die Ausarbeitung von CABIN SPACEY: vom Entwurf über Baurecht bis zur Umsetzung.

Erweitertes Team und Kooperationen

Cabin Spacey ist mehr als nur das Kern-Team, sondern das Ergebnis von großartigen Menschen die die Vision einer neuen Stadt mit vorantreiben.

Sebastian, Market & Service Researcher, unterstützt das Kern-Team in Produkt und Geschäftsentwicklung,

Sarah, Growth Hacker, pusht kreativ unser Marketing trotz Budget Zero.

Christian, der ökologische und nachhaltige Inneneinrichter unterstützt uns mit Produkt Know-How und seinem Lieferantennetzwerk.

smart urban pioneers

deutsche version
 THANKS TO EVERY SINGLE BACKER FOR 
AMAZING 139 CONTRIBUTIONS!  
 


 
 


CABIN SPACEY - home anywhere
A new genre of urban living above the roofs and in every niche of the city. Together we will build a prototype!
 
Over the past 100 years, our urban living situation has changed very little. Whether brownstone or high-rise: The average configuration of two rooms/kitchen/bath remains standard. At the same time, our cities keep growing while affordable space is at a premium, making apartment hunting increasingly stressful. The resulting new urban challenges demand progressive innovations.It’s not just modern urban nomads – here today, there tomorrow – who need CABIN SPACEY.
 

 
CABIN SPACEY offers living space that’s very much now: crafted from sustainable materials and designed to match the actual needs of those looking for a new home. Environmentally friendly, contemporary, intelligent, modular, flexible. No matter where you plan to live: Cabin Spacey exploits previously untapped potential. The minimal homes for new living conquer your city’s upper-most level – its rooftops. Berlin alone has 55,000 unused roofs that are unsuitable for regular development. This is where Cabin Spacey comes in.
 

 
The path forward takes us all the way up: CABIN SPACEY exemplifies the growing demand for high-quality, resource efficient, and extremely flexible urban living space. At just over 20 square meters, the smallest unit can easily house 2 people. CABIN SPACEY consists of an outer hull and an interior supply unit featuring a bathroom, bed, and kitchenette. For urban nomads, the minimal house is the perfect choice: It’s easy to transport, easy to install, and easily hooked up to existing utilities and infrastructures, whether unused roof, urban wasteland, or parking lot. With CABIN SPACEY, a confident generation unlocks new oases in the metropolitan jungle.
 

 
How it works
Many decision-makers are already intrigued by the idea. Negotiations with potential customers are currently under way. Our first prototype is about to see the light of day: CABIN SPACEY Model Zero – supported by Thoma Holz100, Green Living, and the Berlin-Mitte Housing Society.
Now, we want you to join the fun and help us bring CABIN SPACEY to life!
Leave your mark in the very first cabin or select a building block to contribute. Be the first to spend a night in CABIN SPACEY above the city’s skyline.
 
CABIN SPACEY features

CABIN SPACEY is completely sustainable: Holz100 technology turns a timber house into CABIN SPACEY. A large battery solar set-up, integrated into the innovation’s sandwich floor, provides the necessary power – and even supplies the house below in case of overproduction. If desired, the flexible minimal home can also be fitted with contemporary hardware selected by its residents.
Urban challenge
CABIN SPACEY offers easy access to new, innovative, and purist living spaces for urban nomads or anyone else fed up with the restrictions of traditional living.
 
Ready to go
Your support will help us realize the first prototype. The moment Model Zero is up and running and filled with life, we will attract global interest to this new type of living, inviting people to explore the experience of Cabin Spacey and enjoy the infinite possibilities of today’s intelligent living concept, designed for tomorrow.
 
The Team - Who we are

 

Simon - Designer of Future Housing and Mobility in Cities
As architect and driving force, Simon has already realized a huge range of ideas across many freelance projects via architectural competitions, product design, and smart city research.
 
Andreas - Architect and Wunderkind in Operations
Andreas is well-versed in all areas of private and public architecture, having a hand in design, detailed design, and project management. He is in charge of fine-tuning the Cabin Spacey concept: from initial design and building law all the way down to realization.
 
 
Extended Team
Cabin Spacey becomes real with the support of great people who pursue a vision of future living in cities:
Sebastian, Market & Service Researcher, supports the core team with product & business development.
Sarah, Growth Hacker, supports us with her creative Marketing against a budget of zero.
 

Christian, the sustainable materials guru supports us with his product expertise and supplier network. 
 

Cooperations
CABIN SPACEY is very much the work of a team, supported by
smart urban pioneers
Green Living, the eco-friendly interior shop for sustainable materials,
Austrian manufacturer Thoma Holz100, and the housing association
WBM - Wohnungsbaugesellschaft Berlin Mitte.
 
 
 
Initiator and supporter of the campaign is smart with the smart urban pioneers challenge.On top of the fundig goal, smart will provide up to 25.000€ of prize money

deutsch

 


CABIN SPACEY - home anywhere
Ein neues Genre des urbanen Wohnens auf den Dächern und in jeder Nische der Stadt. Zusammen wollen wir einen Prototypen bauen!
In unseren Städten hat sich der Wohnraum seit 100 Jahren nicht mehr maßgeblich verändert. Ob Altbau oder Platte - wohnen nach Schema F mit ZweiZimmerKücheBad ist Standard. Gleichzeitig wachsen unsere Städte immer weiter, bezahlbarer Wohnraum wird immer knapper und die Wohnungssuche stressiger. Dadurch ergeben sich neue urbane Herausforderungen, die mit zukunftsorientierten Wohn-Innovationen gelöst werden können. Nicht nur moderne Großstadtnomaden - heute hier, morgen dort - brauchen CABIN SPACEY. 
 CABIN SPACEY schafft Wohnraum für den Zeitgeist: nachhaltige Materialien, designed nach den wirklichen Bedürfnissen der Wohnungssuchenden. Ökologisch, modern, intelligent, modular, flexibel. Ganz gleich, wo Du wohnen willst: Cabin Spacey öffnet Wohnpotenziale, die bisher noch nicht wahrgenommen wurden. Die Minimalhäuser für das Neue Wohnen erobern den Top-Level Deiner Stadt: die Dächer. Allein in Berlin gibt es 55.000 ungenutzte Dächer, die man mit herkömmlicher Bauweise nicht nutzen kann. Aber mit CABIN SPACEY.

Der Weg nach vorne führt nach ganz oben: CABIN SPACEY steht für die wachsende Nachfrage nach urbanem Wohnraum von höchster Lebensqualität und Ressourceneffizienz bei maximaler Flexibilität. Die kleinste Einheit verfügt über knapp 20m2 und kann mindestens 2 Personen beherbergen. Cabin Spacey besteht aus einer äußeren Hülle und einer inneren Versorgungseinheit mit Bad, Küchenzeile und Bett. 


Für den Großstadtnomaden bietet das Minimalhaus ideale Bedingungen: es ist leicht zu transportieren, einfach aufzustellen und lässt sich mit wenigen Handgriffen an vorhandene Infrastrukturen anschließen. Ganz gleich, ob sie sich auf ungenutzten Dächern, urbanen Brachflächen oder Parkplätzen befinden. Eine selbstbewusste Generation erobert mit CABIN SPACEY neue Wohnoasen im Großstadtdschungel. 
CABIN SPACEY "Modell Null"
Wir bauen den ersten Prototypen: CABIN SPACEY Modell Null. Dafür haben wir die Unterstützung von Thoma Holz100, Green Living und der Wohnbaugesellschaft Mitte. 
Jetzt wollen wir, dass auch Ihr mit dabei seid und CABIN SPACEY mit zum Leben erweckt. Verewigt Euch im aller ersten Cabin, sucht Euch ein Bauteil aus, das ihr dazu beitragen wollt. Seid die ersten, die eine Nacht in CABIN SPACEY über den Dächern der Stadt verbringen.
CABIN SPACEY Features

CABIN SPACEY ist durch und durch ökologisch: Holz100 Technologie macht aus einem Holzhaus ein CABIN SPACEY. Eine Photovoltaik-Anlage mit einem großen Akku im Sandwich-Boden der Wohn-Innovation sorgt für den nötigen Strom - und kann bei Überproduktion sogar das Haus darunter noch mitversorgen. Das flexible Minimalhaus ist offen für zeitgemäße Hardware, mit denen die Bewohner ein CABIN SPACEY individuell ausstatten können. 
Urban Challenge
CABIN SPACEY ist der einfache Zugang zu neuem, innovativem und puristischem Wohnraum für urbane Stadtnomaden und alle anderen, die keine Lust mehr auf die Beschränkungen herkömmlichen Wohnens legen. 
Ready to go
Mit Eurer Unterstützung können wir einen ersten Prototypen realisieren.  Sobald Modell Null steht und mit Leben gefüllt wird, lenken wir weltweites Interesse auf die neue Wohnform, laden ein zum Erleben und Erfahren von CABIN SPACEY. Und überzeugen Interessenten von den unendlichen Möglichkeiten der intelligenten Wohnform von heute für morgen. 
Das Team - CABIN SPACEY Crew

Kern-Team


Simon - Experte in Minimal-Architektur und Mobilität in der Stadt.Als treibende Kraft hat Simon bereits in vielen selbständigen Projekten aus den Bereichen Wettbewerbswesen Architektur, Produktdesign und Smart City Forschung die unterschiedlichsten Ideen umgesetzt. 
Andreas - Produktentwicklung und AusführungsplanungAndreas hat in allen Bereichen der öffentlichen und privaten Hand in Entwurf, Ausführungsplanung und Projektleitung gearbeitet. Er kümmert sich um die Ausarbeitung von CABIN SPACEY: vom Entwurf über Baurecht bis zur Umsetzung.Erweitertes Team und Kooperationen
Cabin Spacey ist mehr als nur das Kern-Team, sondern das Ergebnis von großartigen Menschen die die Vision einer neuen Stadt mit vorantreiben.
Sebastian, Market & Service Researcher, unterstützt das Kern-Team in Produkt und Geschäftsentwicklung,
Sarah, Growth Hacker, pusht kreativ unser Marketing trotz Budget Zero.

Christian, der ökologische und nachhaltige Inneneinrichter unterstützt uns mit Produkt Know-How und seinem Lieferantennetzwerk.

story:
Mojietu T1 is the first polarized anti-ultraviolet sunglasses with integrated lens design, which can help protect the eyes from strong glare. With high-quality UV protection and waterproof design, made for all-day, everyday comfort.

The one-Piece integrated curved lens design is anti-droplet which can effectively protect against droplet pollution by blocking saliva spray during close conversations, laughing, coughing and sneezing. Help to prevent unnecessary risks of transmitting virus in daily life.

 

 

  • More Pictures

 

The German TAC night photochromic lens uses the yellow lens to physically increase the brightness and color clarity, thereby improving the contrast and human eye resolution, providing a more accurate vision. The polarization rate is 20% and the partial polarization can effectively reduce dazzling light. It can also sense ultraviolet rays, the shade of the lens color can change with the intensity of sunlight.

German TAC gray progressive lens uses progressive color, the color goes deep up and goes light down, real color, comfortable to wear. The polarization rate is 99% and the partial polarization can effectively reduce dazzling light.

Night yellow-background photochromic lens could automatically adjust the color according to the intensity of ultraviolet light; light gray in cloudy and rainy conditions, lens color becomes darker when the ultraviolet light is strong in the sun, providing UV protection.

 

The Mojietu T1 polarizer is selected from a Taiwanese factory (50 years of lens making experience) designated for the world's top-tier glasses’ cooperated partner, with 56 craftsmanship and ingenuity.

The surface of the plastic parts of the frame is sprayed with multi-layers nano-level materials. The metal parts have to be made through multiple stamping, electroplating, laser carving and other precision processes, just to bring you an excellent wearing comfort.

To thank you all, we have added a pure leather eyewear storage bag for every user who supports us!

 

Leave your comment about “what do you like about Mojietu T1?” with your #order number# on our comment page. For example: "#233# I am a big fan of Mojietu. Love the Integrated Lens most! “

  • How to share?

Following us on Indiegogo!

Share Mojietu T1 on Facebook

Share Mojietu T1 on Twitter

Share the referral link with everyone

Established in early 2015, ROIDMI is an innovation company of Xiaomi ecosystem, specializes in designing, developing and manufacturing high quality smart cleaning products. As a leader in the cordless vacuum cleaner industry in China, ROIDMI cordless vacuum cleaners have been sold to over 157 countries around the world. It has already grown into a global brand, operating in 60 overseas territories including USA, UK, Europe and Japan. With six international design awards and over 100 patents, ROIDMI is teeming with innovations and high-performance features to make smart products easier.

MOJIETU is a sub-brand launched by ROIDMI, focusing on the development of automotive smart devices. Their 2S Car Charger & P8S car air purifier has successfully completed two crowdfunding campaigns on Indiegogo.

  • Our Factory and Sales Champion

story:
Libre, MBARQGO’s newest collection, will help bring awareness to one of the greatest humanitarian crises of our generation, Restavek.

 

Introducing the LIBRE collection with highest quality of materials.

 

Goods from this one-of-a-kind collection at 25-35% off the retail price.

These pieces are sure to turn heads and start conversations. By simply wearing the collection you bring awareness and become a fighter for freedom.

Restavek Freedom Foundation receives 10% of the proceeds from each sale

The proceeds go towards education, housing, food, medical, and mentoring for the children, as well as the ability to rescue more children from human trafficking.

 

The heroes in all of this, the children, gets the experience of being recognized...

for something that will be celebrated and talked about around the world for its beauty, uniqueness, inspiration, and soul.

 

 

LE TRIOMPHE-OVERSIZE TOTE

Indiegogo Price $225 — Estimated Retail Price $315

Carrying victory never looked so good. Constructed from calfskin leather and coated canvas with repurposed oil drum metal Libre placard and hand drawn Libre font screen printed on exterior. Removable cross body strap that adjusts from 64cm to 121cm.

The 54cm long leather handles can be carried by hand or on the shoulder. The expansive interior features both a zip pocket and a pouch pocket as well as print of painting by Victoria, a former Restavek. See Victoria's interpretation of her painting below. Drawstring closure lip for added security. 64cm length x 14cm width x 48cm drop.

Available in Mahogany & Ash colorway.

​ **********************

 

LE LEGIONNAIRE-CONTEMPORARY BANDOLIER

Indiegogo Price $235 — Estimated Retail Price $330

Long gone are the days of the frumpy fannypack.

This utilitarian piece of work is second to none when comes to style & edge. This piece is carefully constructed of calfskin leather and coated canvas with repurposed oil drum metal Libre placard. The frontal triplet pockets are 7.5cm in length x 2cm in width with 11cm drops. The middle pocket is triple card-slotted.

Adjustable leather strap for chest and waist carry 49cm—90cm.

Optional second strap for added security and versatility 40cm—70cm.

Back YKK zippered envelope pocket, 27.5 cm in length with a 11cm drop feature hidden passport slot as well as painting by Katia, a former child living in Restavek. See Katia's interpretation of her painting below.

Available in Mohagany & Ash colorway.

​

 

**********************

 

 

 LE JOURNAL-FREEDOM SCARF

Available in 4 colorways: Indiegogo Price $59 —  Retail Value $79

Don't just read the news, wear it!

Written in both English and French this newspaper patterned scarf features actual information about the Restavek system and our fight to overthrow it.

Features painting by Alexandra, see below for her painting interpretation.

100% light weight chiffon which means it can be worn year around. 174cm x47cm.

Available in 4 color ways:  Washed Blue, Rose, Loden, Sepia.

 

**********************

NAME IN THE NEWS

Visualization leads to manifestation. Customize the Le Journal Freedom Scarf by adding a personal dream or goal to the story. Only available on Indiegogo $150.

Personalize your Le Journal freedom scarf by having your name and a personal goal or future dream written into it. Visualization is a key step to any achievement. As with the standard version this scarf is written in both English and French, patterned after a newspaper, and features actual information about the Restavek system and our fight to overthrow it.

Features painting by Alexandra, see below for her painting interpretation.

100% light weight chiffon which means it can be worn year around. 174cm x47cm.

__________________________________________________.

 

FORMER CHILDREN TRAPPED IN THE RESTAVEK SYSTEM ILLUSTRATE FREEDOM ON THE FABRIC

We commissioned the children from Restavek Freedom Foundation to do illustrations of what freedom meant to them. The MBARQGO tradition is to create pieces that embody the theme of the offering and use them to illustrate the inner workings (soul) of the bags and other accessories. In regards to the harsh lives and traumas that the children have gone through, we weren’t sure what would materialize, but we were blown away by what we received. Below are some of the paintings along with the explanations.

These masterpieces now make up he lining of the bags and scarves.

 

Conversations lead to actions, actions lead to change!

When you wear and use this collection you create conversations which will ultimately result in the betterment of all of us.

To get the production off the ground we need your help.

To wear/share the story we need your help. 

Let's make history together! 

We are free...nous sommes Libre.

 

Special thanks to: 

PHOTOGRAPHY & VIDEOGRAPHY

Yvon Vilius- yvonvilius@gmail.com

JonArthur Photography- www.photographedj.com

Courtney Barron IG- @cbphoto8

Alberto Velasquez- www.highresfotos.com

Aaron Lacy- IG @aaronlacy

Allycin Powell-Hicks- IG @allycinhicks

Begaz Photo- IG @bgzlife

Theo Brown- IG @awesomertheo

Kahreh- thewurfestates@gmail.com

MODELS

Silvain Toucet

Sheléa Frazier- @sheleamusic

Alexander Cooper- @theclouddancer

MUSIC

"Go" Song: Written, played, produced and mixed by Keith Tutt II- IG @keithtuttii / keith@keithtuttii.com

GRAPHIC DESIGN

Steeve Dorsan- IG @margin_art

Andre Loftis- andre@andreloftis.com

When you wear and use this collection you create conversations which will ultimately result in the betterment of all of us.
To get the production off the ground we need your help.
To wear/share the story we need your help. 
Let's make history together! 
We are free...nous sommes Libre.

 

Special thanks to: 
PHOTOGRAPHY & VIDEOGRAPHY
Yvon Vilius- yvonvilius@gmail.com
JonArthur Photography- www.photographedj.com
Courtney Barron IG- @cbphoto8
Alberto Velasquez- www.highresfotos.com
Aaron Lacy- IG @aaronlacy
Allycin Powell-Hicks- IG @allycinhicks
Begaz Photo- IG @bgzlife
Theo Brown- IG @awesomertheo
Kahreh- thewurfestates@gmail.com
MODELS
Silvain Toucet
Sheléa Frazier- @sheleamusic
Alexander Cooper- @theclouddancer
MUSIC
"Go" Song: Written, played, produced and mixed by Keith Tutt II- IG @keithtuttii / keith@keithtuttii.com
GRAPHIC DESIGN
Steeve Dorsan- IG @margin_art
Andre Loftis- andre@andreloftis.com

story:
Sick and tired of the status quo, it's USC athletics coverage from the minds of those that care as much as you do.

I'll always remember the day I got my USC acceptance letter as one of the best days of my life. I know I speak for our contributors as well when I say getting into the University changed me in ways that I'll forever be grateful. However, it also turned me into something I'm still not sure if I'm better for - a college sports fan. Now, set with the disease that is unconditional love and support for our alma mater, we've set out on an ambitious project that looks to add another voice to the chorus of news, editorials, and opinion that surrounds the University of Southern California. We look to make USC news FOR Trojans, BY Trojans.

Our coverage of football, basketball, and the other sports at our fine university will be fair, but written from a Trojan point of view. We make no claims to be journalists - in fact, we look to avoid the bureaucracy and agendas that often pervade bigger news outlets (*cough* ESPN *cough*), and give the news that comes out of Heritage Hall a fun, accesible spin. We aren't looking to change the way you see the Trojans. In fact, we're not looking to change anything at all. Our value lies in our passion, knowledge, and support of USC through good and bad, and we want you to be a part of that.

Kick the Pole will mainly function as a blog with multiple editorial sections:

  • Football - coverage and opinion of the USC Trojan football team, fun tweets and social media coverage of the team, and gameday experiences, both at the Coliseum and abroad.
  • Basketball - with the arrival of coach Andy Enfield, the basketball program is looking up, and we plan to be there for it. Coverage of the plays, players, teams and trends from the Galen Center.
  • Other Sports - including but not limited to pieces on baseball, water polo, volleyball, and track, this section will provdie previews and watch lists from the non revenue sports, along with profiles on especially spectacular athletes.
  • "The Student Section" - inspired by sites such as Bleacher Report and BuzzFeed, we seek to supplement our more factual coverage of athletics with the more jovial side of being a USC student - whether it covers tailgating, top 10 lists, funniest tweets, pictures of passed out fans, etc., we seek to provide a lighthearted section of the best from the life of Trojans.

Your donation will aid in the costs associated with the design, branding, and marketing of the site. Any left over funds will be saved for server and domain maintenance.

We hope you believe in us enough to support our project. In doing so, you're providing a platform for fun, informative USC news to reach the masses of the interwebs and providing athletics information to Trojans young and old.

And next gameday, when the grill is packed and the beer is gone, join us and the rest of the Trojan Family at the end of Trousdale and Kick the Pole.

Fight on!

Chris Yoshonis, Will Gutilla, Matt Schmitmeyer, Travis Shirley, Jonny Drazen, Andy Greos, Tyler Tokunaga, Trevor Williams, Peter Lockwood, Nick Selbe, Steaven Rojas, Max Reza, Luis Garcia, Landon Cohen.
