story:
**********Contenu français plus bas- French content below**********



Protect the beauty of the world with sustainable eco-friendly little black dresses by GYORK&VEIL!

photo: Hélène Bourgeois-Leclerc wearing the Eve Dress at the GYORK&VEIL launch party March 25th,2014

Photo: Sophie Durocher wearing the Marjorie Dress at the GYORK&VEIL launch party March 25 th,2014. Co-founders Diana Gyorkos and Melanie Veilleux at both ends.

Made 100% locally in Montreal, from design to materials and production. The perfect sustainable little black dress comes in 7 sizes for all shapes and beauties.

www.gyorkveil.com

https://www.facebook.com/GyorkVeil

https://twitter.com/GYORKVEIL

http://www.pinterest.com/gyorkveil/pins/

GYORK&VEIL, a Montreal-based e-commerce start-up, launched its collection of little black dresses with a unique and bold business model. The brand is positioning itself to be THE online destination for the perfect little black dress, knitted and produced in Montreal from responsible materials (notably recycled polyester made from recycled water bottles and organic cotton). GYORK&VEIL makes designer dresses sold at a fraction of the price by eliminating the middlemen and selling exclusively online.

The success of crowdfunding has also inspired this young company to launch a campaign on the Indiegogo platform. “We want to do business in a different way in the fashion industry. Collective and engaging funding is something that resonates with us,” explains Diana Györkös, co-founder of GYORK&VEIL. “We strongly believe in innovation, and we feel inspired by the audacity, energy and authenticity displayed in the tech industry right now. We want to establish a real relationship with our clients, and for us, crowdfunding is a way to connect directly with our target market right from the start.” GYORK&VEIL hopes to finance part of its next production cycle as well as research and development costs to continually improve its online store platform. Their objective is to raise $100 000.

GYORK&VEIL, makes little black dresses for all silhouettes, from XXS (0-2) to XXL (16-18). Designed, knitted and produced in Montreal from responsible materials, this start-up’s collection is made up of designer dresses sold at a fraction of the price by eliminating the middlemen and selling exclusively online.

The founders

Designer and entrepreneur for nearly a decade, Melanie Veilleux quickly distinguished herself in the Montreal fashion industry by her creativity. After a stint in the prestigious workshops of Marie Saint Pierre, she founded FALBALA, her own brand of women's clothing designed and manufactured in Montreal. 

For this new line of ready-to-wear, sold exclusively online, she ventures with Diana Györkös, graduate of HEC with over 15 years of experience in project and operations management. 

This passionate team shakes up preconceived ideas in fashion with a transparent business model, attention to design, and a desire to showcase the beauty of all women.

ABOUT THE COMPANY 

Design - Modern. Versatile. Flattering for all figures. Highlighting the unique beauty of every woman.

GYORK&VEIL dresses are inspired by real women. Classical, casual or sexy, they are easy to accessorize, and all silhouettes will find the model that suits them. The brand’s trademark? Ensure that women who wear G&V dresses feel beautiful and especially good! “To create a design, I truly get inspired by real people. For this first collection, for example, I sat down with girlfriends and women I know and I asked them to imagine the perfect little black jersey dress. I then drew each dress and gave it the name of the woman who had inspired it! Each woman becomes a muse and ambassador. This process allows us to create a variety of styles for all kinds of women”, explains Mélanie Veilleux, designer and co-founder. “Our dresses love women from XXS to XXL!,” is one of the brand’s taglines.

The little black dress is a must in a woman’s wardrobe ; practical, versatile, easy to wear. GYORK&VEIL wants to establish itself with this piece. Dresses will also be available eventually in other colors.

Open Book- A transparent business model. A model based on integrity, a relationship of trust with clients. High quality dresses at a lower cost.

GYORK&VEIL has a unique business model and is completely transparent. The founders believe in the local economy, price transparency and integrity of their process and products. They have cut the middlemen and are selling their dresses exclusively online. Result: closer monitoring, from design to production, and a more direct relationship with clients. GYORK&VEIL dresses are of superior quality and cost up to three times less than in retail stores.

Sustainability - Sustainable fabric knitted in Montreal. Accessories made locally. Ethical local production.

The company founders have chosen to work with sustainable materials because they truly believe in a better world. Dresses are all produced in Montreal from environmentally friendly fabrics such as recycled polyester - from recycled water bottles - or organic cottons. Accessories, such as zippers, are also manufactured in Montreal. The goal is to reduce the company’s ecological footprint to a minimum without sacrificing design.

The Campaign


    This Indiegogo Campaign is important to us , our goal is to raise 100 000$. Reaching this objective will allow us to;

    • Set up a functional workshop

    • Improve our transactional website and develop tools for easy online purchases

    • Create brand awareness and break into the U.S market by doing pop up shops

    • Invest in research and development attend relevant trade shows and industry events


PERKS for your contribution and support

65$ - You will receive a GYORK&VEIL Women or Men T-SHIRT 

Available in Small, Medium and Large.

Made of organic coton, all knitted, designed and produced in Montreal with love. 

Add 25$ for shipping outside of Canada and US.



250$ -You will receive the Felicia or Gaelle Dress and 

a GYORK&VEIL Women or Men T-SHIRT 

Available in Small, Medium and Large.

Made of organic coton, all knitted, designed and produced in Montreal with love. 

Add 25$ for shipping outside of Canada and US.

Felicia Dress  - You’ll feel like a Mad Men knockout in this streamlined sleeveless number with a slim, knee-length pencil skirt. Flattering detailed side seams accent your silhouette. An easy-to-accessorize must-have staple for your wardrobe.


Gaelle Dress - Gorgeously body conscious, this dress features a classic boat neck and feminine three quarter sleeves to flatter your shoulders. Beautiful on its own, it is also a versatile piece you can easily dress up with a great belt, blazer, colored tights or a great pair of shoes.

FABRIC: 49% recycled polyester + 45% biologic cotton + 6% spandex

Available in  5 sizes XXS, XS, S, M, L.

 All the accessories (zip, clasps, agraphes) can be subject to change without notice

                             Felicia Dress                                            Gaelle Dress

300$- You will receive a Marjorie or Sophie Dress and 


a GYORK&VEIL Women or Men T-SHIRT 

Available in Small, Medium and Large.

Made of organic coton, all knitted, designed and produced in Montreal with love. 

Add 25$ for shipping outside of Canada and US.

Marjorie Dress  - This beautiful dolman-sleeved number is gorgeous worn alone or as a tunic over leggings or jeggings. Reveal as much or as little shoulder as you want, and accessorize with great jewelry. We’re betting it will soon become one of your favourites. 

Sophie Dress - This little cowl neck dress with a short skirt is great worn as a tunic with leggings or skinny jeans and is incredibly flattering. You could also be bold and wear it alone to show off those legs! Accented with two golden pearls, the elastic waist is super comfortable and can either sit on the hips or cinch the waist. Flat pockets complete the look.

Model is 5'8" tall, size 27 waist and is wearing a small.

FABRIC: 49% recycled polyester + 45% biologic cotton + 6% spandex

Available in 7 sizes  XXS, XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL

 All the accessories (zip, clasps, agraphes) can be subject to change without notice

                           Marjorie Dress                                          Sophie Dress


350$ -You will receive the Annie, Diana or Karine Dress and 

a GYORK&VEIL Women or Men T-SHIRT 

Available in Small, Medium and Large.

Made of organic coton, all knitted, designed and produced in Montreal with love. 

Add 25$ for shipping outside of Canada and US.

Annie Dress - A sexy modern little dress with a rounded neckline and a golden zipper that runs down the front. The short skirt hits around mid-thigh and is accented with cool side pockets and shallow pleats in the front. Perfect with a blazer and opaque tights at the office, or worn alone for drinks or a date night.

Diana Dress - A universally flattering sleeveless dress you’ll want to wear everywhere. With a deep wrapover neckline and a flattering gathered waist band, it will make you feel confident and fabulous. The pencil-shaped skirt features a flirty cutout slit at the back. 

Karine Dress - We promise this swinging little 60’s-inspired number is going to be in your wardrobe forever. The rounded neckline and fitted top half hug you just right before flaring out slightly. The long sleeves are accented by gold buttons. Pull your hair up in an elegant chignon to show off the golden zipper in the back.

Model is 5'8" tall, size 27 waist and is wearing a small.

FABRIC 49% recycled polyester + 45% biologic cotton + 6% spandex

 All the accessories (zip, clasps, agraphes) can be subject to change without notice

Available in 7 sizes  XXS, XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL

Annie Dress                                  Diana Dress                            Karine Dress


450$ -You will receive the Catherine, Eve or Fernande and 

a GYORK&VEIL Women or Men T-SHIRT 

Available in Small, Medium and Large.

Made of organic coton, all knitted, designed and produced in Montreal with love. 

Add 25$ for shipping outside of Canada and US.

Catherine Dress - This sexy little cocktail dress will make heads turn. The top bares your shoulders seductively and a deep, flirty slit runs down the front. The skirt features a rused waist panel to flatter your body and hide any imperfections. Ladies with a daintier chest will look especially stunning in this dress.

Eve Dress - Wrap yourself in this elegant, comfortable and feminine dress. A cute rounded hem at the front highlights your legs while the rest of the skirt hits just above the knee. The slitted cap sleeves feel just right. A classic.


Fernande Dress - Elegantly reveal your shoulders and back with this stunning cocktail dress. In the front, integrated support makes you feel confident while two little golden pearls accent the halter neckline. The back features sexy strap detailing. Irresistible.


Model is 5'8" tall, size 27 waist and is wearing a small.

FABRIC 49% recycled polyester + 45% biologic cotton + 6% spandex

 All the accessories (zip, clasps, agraphes) can be subject to change without notice.

Available in 7 sizes  XXS, XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL

          Catherine Dress                         Eve Dress                           Fernande Dres

Size Chart


Other Ways You Can Help

Help spread the word and share with your friends and family!


Thank you!


***********************************    FRANCAIS   **************************************

Protégez la beauté du monde avec une petite robe noire fait de matières durables par GYORK&VEIL!

100% Fait localement à Montréal, du design à la confection. Ces parfaits petites robes noires sont disponibles en 7 grandeurs  de XXS à XXL.

www.gyorkveil.com

https://www.facebook.com/GyorkVeil

https://twitter.com/GYORKVEIL

http://www.pinterest.com/gyorkveil/pins/

GYORK&VEIL, un start-up e-commerce de mode montréalais, lance sa collection de petites robes noires et son modèle d’affaires unique et audacieux. La marque est désormais la destination en ligne pour la parfaite petite robe noire, tricotée et produite entièrement à Montréal à partir de tissus écologiques (polyester recyclé à base de bouteilles d'eau récupérées et coton biologique). GYORK&VEIL produit des robes de designer à une fraction du prix en éliminant les intervenants et en vendant uniquement en ligne.

Le socio-financement est un modèle qui rejoint cette jeune entreprise avant-gardiste, d’où la campagne de crowdfunding lancée sur la plateforme Indiegogo. « Nous avons envie de faire des affaires autrement dans le domaine de la mode. Le financement collectif et participatif colle à nos valeurs », explique Diana Gyorkös, l’une des deux fondatrices. « Nous croyons à l’innovation et nous sommes très inspirées par l’audace, l’énergie et l’authenticité qui habitent les nouvelles technologies en ce moment. Nous voulons établir un lien privilégié avec notre clientèle, et pour nous, le socio-financement est une autre façon d’entrer en relation directement avec notre marché-cible, dès notre lancement ». En effet, GYORK&VEIL compte financer une partie de sa prochaine production ainsi que les coûts de recherche et développement dans le but de continuellement améliorer sa plateforme internet. L’entreprise se fixe un objectif de socio-financement de 100 000$.

GYORK&VEIL, présente ses petites robes noires pour toutes les silhouettes, de XXS (0-2) à XXL (16-18). Dessinée, tricotée et produite à Montréal dans des matières durables, la collection de ce start-up montréalais est constituée de robes de designer à une fraction du prix en éliminant les intervenants et en vendant uniquement en ligne.

LES FONDATRICES

Designer et chef d’entreprise depuis près d’une décennie, Mélanie Veilleux s’est rapidement démarquée dans le milieu montréalais de la mode par sa créativité. Après un passage dans les prestigieux ateliers de Marie Saint Pierre, elle a connu un vif succès avec FALBALA, sa propre griffe de vêtements pour femmes conçus et fabriqués à Montréal.

Pour sa nouvelle collection de prêt-à-porter vendue exclusivement en ligne, elle s’allie à Diana Györkös, gestionnaire émérite diplômée des HEC, spécialisée depuis plus de 15 ans en gestion de projet et des opérations.

 « J`ai toujours rêvé de me lancer en affaires. Je savais que je voulais me retrouver dans un monde de création et que je ne voulais pas le faire seule. Il faut de la patience pour trouver la bonne idée et je crois sincèrement qu’une entreprise solide se construit sur une amitié solide. C`est ce que je retrouve avec mon associée Mélanie», mentionne Diana.

Cette équipe passionnée bouscule les idées reçues sur la mode actuelle avec un modèle d’affaires transparent, un souci du design omniprésent, et un désir de mettre en valeur la beauté de toutes les femmes.

À PROPOS DE L’ENTREPRISE


Un modèle d’affaires transparent. Une démarche intègre, une relation de confiance avec nos clientes. Des robes de haute qualité à un coût moindre.

GYORK&VEIL a adopté un modèle d'entreprise unique et totalement transparent. Les fondatrices croient en l'économie locale, en la transparence des prix et à l'intégrité de leur démarche et de leur produit.  L’entreprise a coupé les intermédiaires et vend ses robes uniquement en ligne. Résultat : un suivi plus étroit, du design à la production, et une relation plus directe avec les clientes. Les robes de qualité supérieure de GYORK&VEIL sont jusqu'à trois fois moins chères qu'en boutique.


Tissus écologiques tissés à Montréal. Accessoires fabriqués localement. Confection locale et éthique.

 Les fondatrices de l’entreprise ont choisi de travailler avec des matières durables parce qu’elles croient sincèrement à un monde meilleur. Les robes sont toutes confectionnées à Montréal à partir de matières écologiques, soit avec des polyesters recyclés – à partir de bouteilles d'eau recyclées – ou des cotons biologiques. Les accessoires, tels que les fermetures éclair, sont également fabriqués à Montréal. Le but est de réduire au minimum l’empreinte écologique de la production, sans jamais sacrifier le design.


Moderne. Versatile. Flatteur pour toutes les silhouettes. Pour mettre en valeur la beauté unique de chaque femme.

Les robes GYORK&VEIL sont inspirées par des femmes réelles. Classiques, sexy ou décontractées, elles sont faciles à accessoiriser et chaque silhouette trouvera le modèle qui la met en valeur. La marque de commerce? Faire en sorte que les femmes qui portent les robes GYORK&VEIL se sentent belles, et surtout bien! « Pour créer un modèle, je m’inspire réellement d'une personne. Pour cette première collection, par exemple, je me suis assise avec des amies et des femmes que je connais et je leur ai demandé de me dire leurs préférences pour la petite robe noire parfaite en jersey. Ensuite, j’ai dessiné les modèles et je leur ai donné le nom des femmes qui les ont inspirés! Donc chacune d'entre elles devient une ambassadrice et en quelque sorte une muse. Avec cet exercice, nous allons vraiment toucher tous les styles de robes et de femmes», explique Mélanie Veilleux, designer et co-fondatrice de l’entreprise. D’ailleurs, un des slogans de la marque est : « Nos robes aiment les femmes de XXS à XXL! ».

La petite robe noire est un must dans la garde-robe : pratique, versatile, facile à porter. C’est avec ce morceau que GYORK&VEIL entend faire sa marque. Les modèles seront également disponibles éventuellement en quelques autres couleurs.

La campagne

La campagne Indiegogo est importante pour nous, notre objectif est d`attendre 100 000$ de financement. Cela nous permettra de réaliser les projets suivants;

·  Création d`un atelier

·  Améliorer notre site transactionnel et inclure des outils qui aideront à mieux déterminer la grandeur pour l`achat en ligne.

·  Faire connaitre notre marque en Amérique du nord et faisant des pop up shops

·  Investir en recherche et développement et introduire d`autres matières durables

·  Participer aux événements de l`industrie 

Merci de contribuer, de nous encourager et de partager !

Diana et Mélanie

are selling their dresses exclusively online. Result: closer monitoring, from
design to production, and a more direct relationship with clients.
GYORK&VEIL dresses are of superior quality and cost up to three times less
than in retail stores.
Sustainability - Sustainable fabric
knitted in Montreal. Accessories made locally. Ethical local production.
The company founders have chosen to work with sustainable materials because
they truly believe in a better world. Dresses are all produced in Montreal from
environmentally friendly fabrics such as recycled polyester - from recycled
water bottles - or organic cottons. Accessories, such as zippers, are also
manufactured in Montreal. The goal is to reduce the company’s ecological footprint
to a minimum without sacrificing design.
The Campaign
This Indiegogo Campaign is important to us , our goal is to raise 100 000$.
Reaching this objective will allow us to;

Set up a
functional workshop 
Improve our
transactional website and develop tools for easy online purchases
Create brand
awareness and break into the U.S market by doing pop up shops 
Invest in research
and development attend relevant trade shows and industry events

PERKS for your contribution and support65$ - You will receive a GYORK&VEIL Women or Men T-SHIRT Available in Small, Medium and Large.Made of organic coton, all knitted, designed and produced in Montreal with love. Add 25$ for shipping outside of Canada and US.250$ -You will receive the Felicia or Gaelle Dress and a GYORK&VEIL Women or Men T-SHIRT Available in Small, Medium and Large.Made of organic coton, all knitted, designed and produced in Montreal with love. Add 25$ for shipping outside of Canada and US.Felicia Dress  - You’ll feel like a Mad Men knockout in this streamlined sleeveless number with a slim, knee-length pencil skirt. Flattering detailed side seams accent your silhouette. An easy-to-accessorize must-have staple for your wardrobe.Gaelle Dress - Gorgeously body conscious, this dress features a classic boat neck and feminine three quarter sleeves to flatter your shoulders. Beautiful on its own, it is also a versatile piece you can easily dress up with a great belt, blazer, colored tights or a great pair of shoes.FABRIC: 49% recycled polyester + 45% biologic cotton + 6% spandexAvailable in  5 sizes XXS, XS, S, M, L. All the accessories (zip, clasps, agraphes) can be subject to change without notice                             Felicia Dress                                            Gaelle Dress300$- You will receive a Marjorie or Sophie Dress and a GYORK&VEIL Women or Men T-SHIRT Available in Small, Medium and Large.Made of organic coton, all knitted, designed and produced in Montreal with love. Add 25$ for shipping outside of Canada and US.Marjorie Dress  - This beautiful dolman-sleeved number is gorgeous worn alone or as a tunic over leggings or jeggings. Reveal as much or as little shoulder as you want, and accessorize with great jewelry. We’re betting it will soon become one of your favourites. Sophie Dress - This little cowl neck dress with a short skirt is great worn as a tunic with leggings or skinny jeans and is incredibly flattering. You could also be bold and wear it alone to show off those legs! Accented with two golden pearls, the elastic waist is super comfortable and can either sit on the hips or cinch the waist. Flat pockets complete the look.Model is 5'8" tall, size 27 waist and is wearing a small.FABRIC: 49% recycled polyester + 45% biologic cotton + 6% spandexAvailable in 7 sizes  XXS, XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL All the accessories (zip, clasps, agraphes) can be subject to change without notice                           Marjorie Dress                                          Sophie Dress350$ -You will receive the Annie, Diana or Karine Dress and a GYORK&VEIL Women or Men T-SHIRT Available in Small, Medium and Large.Made of organic coton, all knitted, designed and produced in Montreal with love. Add 25$ for shipping outside of Canada and US.Annie Dress - A sexy modern little dress with a rounded neckline and a golden zipper that runs down the front. The short skirt hits around mid-thigh and is accented with cool side pockets and shallow pleats in the front. Perfect with a blazer and opaque tights at the office, or worn alone for drinks or a date night.Diana Dress - A universally flattering sleeveless dress you’ll want to wear everywhere. With a deep wrapover neckline and a flattering gathered waist band, it will make you feel confident and fabulous. The pencil-shaped skirt features a flirty cutout slit at the back. Karine Dress - We promise this swinging little 60’s-inspired number is going to be in your wardrobe forever. The rounded neckline and fitted top half hug you just right before flaring out slightly. The long sleeves are accented by gold buttons. Pull your hair up in an elegant chignon to show off the golden zipper in the back.Model is 5'8" tall, size 27 waist and is wearing a small.FABRIC 49% recycled polyester + 45% biologic cotton + 6% spandex All the accessories (zip, clasps, agraphes) can be subject to change without noticeAvailable in 7 sizes  XXS, XS, S, M, L, XL, XXLAnnie Dress                                  Diana Dress                            Karine Dress450$ -You will receive the Catherine, Eve or Fernande and a GYORK&VEIL Women or Men T-SHIRT Available in Small, Medium and Large.Made of organic coton, all knitted, designed and produced in Montreal with love. Add 25$ for shipping outside of Canada and US.Catherine Dress - This sexy little cocktail dress will make heads turn. The top bares your shoulders seductively and a deep, flirty slit runs down the front. The skirt features a rused waist panel to flatter your body and hide any imperfections. Ladies with a daintier chest will look especially stunning in this dress.Eve Dress - Wrap yourself in this elegant, comfortable and feminine dress. A cute rounded hem at the front highlights your legs while the rest of the skirt hits just above the knee. The slitted cap sleeves feel just right. A classic.Fernande Dress - Elegantly reveal your shoulders and back with this stunning cocktail dress. In the front, integrated support makes you feel confident while two little golden pearls accent the halter neckline. The back features sexy strap detailing. Irresistible.Model is 5'8" tall, size 27 waist and is wearing a small.FABRIC 49% recycled polyester + 45% biologic cotton + 6% spandex All the accessories (zip, clasps, agraphes) can be subject to change without notice.Available in 7 sizes  XXS, XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL          Catherine Dress                         Eve Dress                           Fernande DresSize ChartOther Ways You Can HelpHelp spread the word and share with your friends and family!Thank you!***********************************    FRANCAIS   **************************************Protégez la beauté du monde avec une petite robe
noire fait de matières durables par GYORK&VEIL!

100% Fait localement à Montréal, du design à la
confection. Ces parfaits petites robes noires sont disponibles en 7 grandeurs  de XXS à XXL.
www.gyorkveil.com
https://www.facebook.com/GyorkVeil
https://twitter.com/GYORKVEIL
http://www.pinterest.com/gyorkveil/pins/
GYORK&VEIL,
un start-up e-commerce de mode
montréalais, lance sa collection de petites robes noires et son modèle d’affaires
unique et audacieux. La marque est désormais la destination en ligne pour la parfaite petite robe noire,
tricotée et produite entièrement à Montréal à partir de tissus écologiques (polyester
recyclé à base de bouteilles d'eau récupérées et coton biologique). GYORK&VEIL
produit des robes de designer à une fraction du prix en éliminant les
intervenants et en vendant uniquement en ligne.
Le
socio-financement est un modèle qui rejoint cette jeune entreprise
avant-gardiste, d’où la campagne de crowdfunding
lancée sur la plateforme Indiegogo. « Nous avons envie de faire des
affaires autrement dans le domaine de la mode. Le financement collectif et
participatif colle à nos valeurs », explique Diana Gyorkös, l’une des
deux fondatrices. « Nous croyons à l’innovation et nous sommes très
inspirées par l’audace, l’énergie et l’authenticité qui habitent les nouvelles
technologies en ce moment. Nous voulons établir un lien privilégié avec notre
clientèle, et pour nous, le socio-financement est une autre façon d’entrer en
relation directement avec notre marché-cible, dès notre lancement ». En
effet, GYORK&VEIL compte financer une partie de sa prochaine production
ainsi que les coûts de recherche et développement dans le but de
continuellement améliorer sa plateforme internet. L’entreprise se fixe un
objectif de socio-financement de 100 000$.
GYORK&VEIL,
présente ses petites robes noires pour toutes les silhouettes, de XXS (0-2) à
XXL (16-18). Dessinée, tricotée et produite à Montréal dans des matières
durables, la collection de ce start-up montréalais est constituée de robes de
designer à une fraction du prix en éliminant les intervenants et en
vendant uniquement en ligne.
LES
FONDATRICES
Designer
et chef d’entreprise depuis près d’une décennie, Mélanie Veilleux s’est rapidement
démarquée dans le milieu montréalais de la mode par sa créativité. Après un
passage dans les prestigieux ateliers de Marie Saint Pierre, elle a connu un
vif succès avec FALBALA, sa propre griffe de vêtements pour femmes conçus et
fabriqués à Montréal.
Pour
sa nouvelle collection de prêt-à-porter vendue exclusivement en ligne, elle
s’allie à Diana Györkös, gestionnaire émérite diplômée des HEC, spécialisée
depuis plus de 15 ans en gestion de projet et des opérations.
 « J`ai toujours rêvé de me lancer en
affaires. Je savais que je voulais me retrouver dans un monde de création et
que je ne voulais pas le faire seule. Il faut de la patience pour trouver la
bonne idée et je crois sincèrement qu’une entreprise solide se construit sur
une amitié solide. C`est ce que je retrouve avec mon associée Mélanie», mentionne
Diana.
Cette
équipe passionnée bouscule les idées reçues sur la mode actuelle avec un modèle
d’affaires transparent, un souci du design omniprésent, et un désir de mettre
en valeur la beauté de toutes les femmes.
À
PROPOS DE L’ENTREPRISE

Un
modèle d’affaires transparent. Une démarche intègre, une relation de confiance
avec nos clientes. Des robes de haute qualité à un coût moindre.
GYORK&VEIL
a adopté un modèle d'entreprise unique et totalement transparent. Les
fondatrices croient en l'économie locale, en la transparence des prix et à
l'intégrité de leur démarche et de leur produit.  L’entreprise a coupé les intermédiaires et vend
ses robes uniquement en ligne. Résultat : un suivi plus étroit, du design
à la production, et une relation plus directe avec les clientes. Les robes de
qualité supérieure de GYORK&VEIL sont jusqu'à trois fois moins chères qu'en
boutique. 
Tissus
écologiques tissés à Montréal. Accessoires fabriqués localement. Confection
locale et éthique.
 Les fondatrices de l’entreprise ont choisi de
travailler avec des matières durables parce qu’elles croient sincèrement à un
monde meilleur. Les robes sont toutes confectionnées à Montréal à partir de
matières écologiques, soit avec des polyesters recyclés – à partir de
bouteilles d'eau recyclées – ou des cotons biologiques. Les accessoires, tels
que les fermetures éclair, sont également fabriqués à Montréal. Le but est de
réduire au minimum l’empreinte écologique de la production, sans jamais
sacrifier le design. 
Moderne.
Versatile. Flatteur pour toutes les silhouettes. Pour mettre en valeur la
beauté unique de chaque femme. 
Les robes
GYORK&VEIL sont inspirées par des femmes réelles. Classiques, sexy ou
décontractées, elles sont faciles à accessoiriser et chaque silhouette trouvera
le modèle qui la met en valeur. La marque de commerce? Faire en sorte que les
femmes qui portent les robes GYORK&VEIL se sentent belles, et surtout bien!
« Pour créer un modèle, je m’inspire réellement d'une personne. Pour cette
première collection, par exemple, je me suis assise avec des amies et des
femmes que je connais et je leur ai demandé de me dire leurs préférences pour
la petite robe noire parfaite en jersey. Ensuite, j’ai dessiné les modèles et
je leur ai donné le nom des femmes qui les ont inspirés! Donc chacune d'entre
elles devient une ambassadrice et en quelque sorte une muse. Avec cet exercice,
nous allons vraiment toucher tous les styles de robes et de femmes», explique
Mélanie Veilleux, designer et co-fondatrice de l’entreprise. D’ailleurs, un des
slogans de la marque est : « Nos robes aiment les femmes de XXS à XXL! ».
La petite
robe noire est un must dans la
garde-robe : pratique, versatile, facile à porter. C’est avec ce morceau
que GYORK&VEIL entend faire sa marque. Les modèles seront également disponibles
éventuellement en quelques autres couleurs.
La campagne 
La campagne
Indiegogo est importante pour nous, notre objectif est d`attendre 100 000$ de
financement. Cela nous permettra de réaliser les projets suivants;
· 
Création
d`un atelier
· 
Améliorer
notre site transactionnel et inclure des outils qui aideront à mieux déterminer
la grandeur pour l`achat en ligne.
· 
Faire
connaitre notre marque en Amérique du nord et faisant des pop up shops
· 
Investir en
recherche et développement et introduire d`autres matières durables
· 
Participer
aux événements de l`industrie Merci de contribuer, de nous encourager et de partager !Diana et Mélanie

story:
What you wear says a lot about who you are.  Trouble Life$tyle Watches are designed for creative, fashionable individuals.  Our statement watches are not like anything currently on the market. 

We wanted to create a line of watches that are unique, versatile and affordable.  The numerous color combinations allow you to express your personal style and bridge the gap between comfort, fashion and affordability. 

Trouble Life$tyle from Concept to Creation

We started with an idea to make unique, one of a kind watches.  We believe that what makes our watches stand out is the Trouble Life$tyle logo.  We envisioned how the logos should look, so the next step was to find a product design specialist to create them.  After a few trials and errors we found a designer whose sketches really captured our vision. 




Once we found someone to capture our ideas we played around with different colors and combinations. 

Finally, we found the color combinations that we thought would work best for our watches. 

The next step was to find a manufacturer that could bring our watches to life.


So far the feedback from our samples has been awesome and we want to keep the momentum going!  The initial batch will include SEVEN different color silicone watch bands and SEVEN interchangeable watch faces with our custom logo.  

We have more colors, designs and ideas so we need your help to get Trouble Life$tyle Watches up and running!


Trouble Life$tyle Watch Specifications

  • Japanese Movement
  • Japanese Battery
  • 3 Year Warranty
  • 3ATM Waterproof
  • Strap is 100% eco-friendly silicone

The Future of Trouble Life$tyle Watches

We are starting with watches, but we want Trouble Life$tyle to be so much more!  Our goal is to expand to tee shirts, snapbacks, hoodies, jackets and more! 

We are so excited about this project and need you to help make our dream a reality!!

We appreciate your support. 

Thank you in advance.

story:
about imagine gnats

imagine gnats started as a little etsy shop, selling small sewn items to help support my family and also to give me a creative outlet in a corporate world. it's come a long way in just five years... from a hobby to a full-time job. my love of sewing and design has grown as well, and now my own sewing patterns help and inspire others to create.

i am proud to have created patterns for garments that are easy to sew and easy to wear. imagine gnats patterns feature classic silhouettes with a modern twist that incorporate clever details and practical techniques

read more about me and imagine gnats here.

why contribute?

currently, my patterns are all offered as printable pdfs. the money raised here will help cover the costs of an initial run of paper patterns, which means sharing my designs with even more sewists and inspiring more people.

for the cost of one pattern, you can help me reach my goal AND be one of the first to get the printed pattern of your choice. for a little bit more, you can get a full set of imagine gnats printed patterns. plus, early bird specials are available starting february 3rd for even better deals.

want to be my hero forever? for $250, i'll make you a custom text embroidery with your favorite phrase. for $400, i'll stitch up any one of my patterns especially for you, with extra love in every seam. 

what's next?

we print! my initial print run will include 500 each of my existing five garment patterns. all of the money raised here will go directly to that effort. once patterns are printed, i begin the selling and distribution phase.

other ways you can help

not in a place to contribute financially, but want to help? already contributed and would like some more ways to support the effort?

I would love for you to tweet, share on facebook, email your friends and family... anything that will get the word out. every share helps and is so appreciated.

thank you, and happy stitching!

xo, rachael

story:
The World's First Beach Towel, Bag, and Active Network.

Do you want to have fun this summer?  We do.  

But we wanted to do something different.  So we looked at the beach and started with the towels.  Why does everyone have square towels (ok, rectangular)?  Who wants to be square (or even rectangular)?  

We think round is a lot more fun not only because you can also use a round towel as a bag (shown above) but for something even more important: connecting with other fun people! 

We believe beach towels are inherently social.  After all, unless you want a quiet afternoon to yourself reading a book (nothing wrong with that), aren't beach towels places where you hang out with friends and make new ones?

So why not create towels that are also social?

INTRODUCING S.A.N.D., THE SPOTS ACTIVE NETWORK (THE "D" IS COMPLIMENTARY, WE PROVIDE IT AT NO EXTRA CHARGE).

SAND will provide activities that we sponsor (where you can meet other people), notices of events, and even a way to discover new people online, meet them on the beach, and connect your Spots TowelsTM together to create a larger circle, a "hangout spot" or "party spot" for everyone.

Doesn't that sound like it would be more fun than grabbing a faded 1990's superhero towel from the bottom of the linen pile this summer?  

We're hoping you'll help us create something completely new for everyone.  

This summer, we're hoping you'll join the circle.


Our Products -- Exclusive Early Bird Discounts and Free Shipping for Indiegogo Campaign Supporters!  Ends May 26th!  (Plus a Money Back Guarantee)  Don't Miss out!

Spots TowelsTM and Spots TowelTM Bags are made from super absorbent, 100% microfiber and are a full 5.5 feet in diameter (60% more space versus the large rectangular beach towels you find at mainstream retailers)!  So relax and stretch out!
Spots TowelsTM are for those who want to join the circle with an awesome new towel but who don't need a bag.  They are bright, colorful, 5.5 feet in diameter, round beach towels complete with the cool (definitely not square) "Spots" logo lettering on their front.
Spots TowelsTM Bags are for those who want an awesome Spots TowelTM and the convenience of a bag.  They come in the same bright colors, are 5.5 full feet in diameter, and also have the cool (definitely not square) "Spots" logo lettering on their front letting people know you're a part of the circle.
If you like what we're doing, get your towels through this campaign as these introductory, crowdfunding discounts will not be available going forward.

What We Need & What You Get

By funding our campaign, you'll help us build a different social experience for people who want to have fun on the beach.  Plus, you'll get really cool stuff!

  • The money from this campaign is our starting point for SAND.
  • It will be used to provide beach activities this summer with the most fun people we can find on the beach.  The Spots TowelsTM Fun Team will be on southern California beaches this summer hosting activities, games, providing giveaways and adding fun.
  • So grab a towel (or two for yourself and a friend) and create your own beach spot this summer.


Risks & Challenges

With regards to providing our supporters with the towels and gear they order, we don't see any risks or reasons to be concerned.  We can deliver the products our backers select.  In fact, the first 600 customers will be enjoying their new Spots TowelsTM this July (while purchasing them at special, introductory, one-time only crowdfunding discounts).  Product shipments after the first 600 will be shipped in conjunction with the order in which they are received.

So we really don't foresee any risk on the products or their delivery.  Now, how quickly can we expand SAND?  That will depend on our backers and the support they're able to provide.


Other Ways You Can Help

We realize that people are at different points in life and that not everyone can contribute financially or at the same level.

  • If you like what we're doing and are unable to provide a financial contribution at this time, we understand.  We hope that you'll tell your friends and help us get the word out so that we can all do something completely different.

Let's all join the circle.

story:
This is a fragrant project reserved exclusively for members of the Facebook Group Mrs Gloss & The Goss. It's a secret signal for Glossers to recognise each other as they waft by.

On Saturday 13th February, 20 of us - 19 Glossers and me, Sarah McCartney - gathered in Acton to select the raw materials for a brand new fragrance, and now we're making it: we're only planning to handmade around 15 litres - divided into 2.25, 9ml, 30ml and 100ml bottles. 

A normal fragrance launch, from a tiny niche brand to a big celeb scent, would be between 100 and a million litres (not kidding). Ours is pretty exclusive!

It's a 4160Tuesdays fragrance - you can read about us at our website.

If we have enough people joining in, we shall have a special bottle printed in rose pink. The photo above shows our gold bottles. Our gallery shows the pink ones too.

I'm making our fragrance in eau de parfum strength, with natural rose absolute, geranium essential oil, atlas cedarwood, pink grapefruit, Ambrox, bergamot, vanillin, a powdery note and musk. Right now we have advance samples for you to test, and  I'll make the second batch this week to start maturing over the next month, to distribute in March 2016.

This is a bespoke fragrance, exclusively for The Glossers, so if you aren't a member, do find Mrs Gloss & The Goss on Facebook and join in. (It's great.)

It's not available anywhere else, but it will comply with IFRA (International Fragrance Association) and EU regulations on safety for cosmetics.

It was great to create this with Mrs Gloss & The Goss, and as long as we have enough people joining in, we can keep the prices sensibly low . As it's coming directly to you from us - handmade in our studio - and we don't have to pay for advertising or sell via a distributor, you can have a little luxury at a very reasonable rate. 

#MrsGlossMadeMeDoIt

story:
Thank you for all the support in our first crowdfunding campaign!

Please also visit us at www.tenvas.com


Try out io Classic & io Creative 

The first watch in the world that you can customise using colour 3d printing.
A classic beauty, the IO watch is for the ultimate trend setter.

 Buy io Classic  $79  $49


Buy io Classic "exclusive"  $89  $59  



 Buy io Creative $119 $79


What the press has to say:

"It looks like Tenvas is a company to watch out for with it’s user-focused philosophy, ...  great designs, and support for individual artistry and technological innovation." 
3Dprint.com

Place order now. Design later.

We'll contact you at the end of campaign for your choice of colour and design.
- choose from Designer's Collection ( visit TENVAS store now)
- design a watch strap yourself ( try Customization now)

For URGENT gift delivery ~ 4 weeks

Select this PERK ( click here ) on top of io Creative / io Classic order. 
It will be shipped within 4 weeks after your order is paid.


Product Features

SNAP... IO Creative strap onto IO Classic. 

Like a chameleon, io Creative can be customized to suit your sense of style, personality and passion. 


Material

BUY NOW. 
We will follow up with you in term of designs and watch size after the campaign.

Step 1 - select the PERK & pay
ioClassic, ioClassic Exclusive, ioCreative 

Step 2 - select your DESIGN
choose from Tenvas designer's collection (click here) OR
design your own strap  (click here)



Step 1 : Choose LAYOUT 
Step 2: Design your graphic
Change background colour, choose/upload icons, add text, apply filter.
Step 3: Preview your design & SHARE

 

Beta version of our customisation tool is ready. 
Try Now(click here)

  • For the best experience, use Chrome on desktop 
  • Sign up with Facebook or new account
  • Click on "personalise" to begin

PRO TIPS: 

  1. If you select a blank template, you can choose the background colour. If you have an existing background image, upload it with the "+" button. 
  2. Under "Icons", you can select icons for your design. You can also upload your own icons by clicking on the "+" button. 
  3. Users can also change the text by selecting the desired text and typing over. The attributes of text can also be changed by selecting it, picking the font family from menu or right-click to bring up it's properties. 
  4. The properties of an image can be modified by clicking on it and  selecting a filter to change the appearance.

Felicia's collection_horse

Felicia's collection_tiger

Felicia's collection_fairy

XiaoMei's collection_Cats 
(Tenvas youngest designer, 8 yrs old)


Hong's collection_octopus
( Xiao Mei's brother, only 10 yrs old)



User Testimonial

Eric customized an "io Creative" for Eunice to express how he felt about her. If you looking for a special gift, show someone how much you care by putting in the time and effort to customise the colour and pattern of this watch.





 


PERKS











Please leave a comment after you have pledged telling us which colour strap you would like.



FAQ

Q. If my question is not answered here, how do I ask ?

A. Please email us at talktous@tenvas.com

 

Q. Will the size of the watch fit me?

A. Yes, it will. We will get your wrist measurements and 3d print a size that best fits your wrist. It is in fact customised for your wrist. Similar to how a tailor would tailor-make suits and gowns.


Q. Will the watch be water and splash resistant?

A Yes, it is tested to be water resistant up to 3 atm or 30m. The 3D printed material will retain its colour even after prolonged exposure to water.


Q. Is the 3d printed material durable?

A. Yes, the 3d printed material is durable. There are two key materials used during 3d printing. The first is nylon plastic which is a strong and flexible material. The second is visijet plastic which is used during colour 3d printing. This material has vibrant colours and is durable as well. 


Q. Why is the delivery time in October or later?

A. We will receive the funds from Indiegogo 3-4 weeks after the end of the campaign in July. 

After receiving the funds, we will send your designs for 3D printing. The 3D printing process takes between 2 to 3 weeks depending on the volume of jobs. It is printed in Europe before it is shipped to Singapore for finishing and assembly. 

Picking and packing for shipping will require another 2-3 weeks. 

We hope to deliver sooner and we will update our backers as regularly as possible.


Q. I'm interested to buy the black IO Classic. How do I choose this?

A. Simply select the "IO Classic" perk. We will contact all our backers at the end of this campaign to get your size and preference for strap colour. 


Q. I'm interested to buy IO Creative. Do I have to design my watch first?

A. No, you do not have to design your watch before purchase. We will contact all our backers at the end of the campaign and verify your IO Creative designs before starting the 3D printing process. This will happen end July or early August.  We will send an email with instructions on how to design and when to submit, at the end of the campaign. 




The Team behind Tenvas

Our team has a vision to build powerful and easy to use tools for creating and customising accessories such as watches.  We want to find an easier way for our users to experience a sense of fulfilment and pride when making their own personal items.

We believe that everyone can be creative if given the right tools and confidence. 


Damien is the CEO and co-founder of Tenvas. He was previously from the printing industry and saw an opportunity to create tools that simplify co-creation and 3D printing. He is also a certified product manager and solution architect.

Jimmy is the CTO and co-founder of Tenvas. He has a strong background in virtual reality, augmented reality as well as web and mobile development.

Alfred is the Chief Designer and co-founder of Tenvas. He is a talented industrial designer and is responsible for product design, videography and web design.


Our team is based in sunny Singapore in Launchpad at one-north. The hub for startups in South East Asia.



Thank you!

Thank you for your support. Please remember to pledge and make customisable watches a reality. It will not happen without your support.

Please also share this campaign with the Indiegogo share buttons located at the top of the page.

Do tell your friends about us and our mission for everyone to be creative with their watches!

story:
The 30 Year T-Shirt is...

So well made that we Guarantee it for 30 Years. A combination of technology, luxury fabric and old school craftmanship make it built to last a lifetime.

Handmade by world class artisans in rural Portugal who have been crafting beautiful clothing for over 50 years.

Made 100% out of luxury 360 grams per metre loopback cotton from only the finest quality yarn. This ensures both incredible softness and durability.

Ethically made using organic cotton, reflecting our commitment to quality, respect for the environment and responsible production ethos.

Value you deserve created by cutting out pointless retail markups and delivering The 30 Year T-Shirt direct to you at wholesale.

Sustainable fashion designed to lead an industry trend towards protecting our natural resources by making truly durable clothing.

HELP US MAKE THE WORLD'S PERFECT T-SHIRT: There are some items that should feature in everyone’s wardrobe and a crewneck t-shirt is certainly one of them. We need your help to allow us to begin our first production run of The 30 Year T-Shirt.

Here’s how you can support our campaign and be the first to wear The 30 Year T-Shirt this summer:

1) Select a perk on the right hand side to start your order.

2) Continue onto the next page to enter shipping information followed by payment details.

3) Complete payment via Paypal or using your credit/debit card. 

4) Your 30 Year T-Shirt will be dispatched when our campaign ends. We can't wait to deliver it to you.

Thanks so much in advance to everyone who supports our cry for sustainable fashion by getting a 30 Year T-Shirt.



Why should we accept brands that sell us clothing that is deliberately designed to wear out after just a year or two?

Many big fashion brands make their clothing knowing that it will fall apart, so that their customers will have to return to buy more. It’s called built-in obsolescence, and it creates a cycle of consumption and waste that’s become all too common these days.

We believe brands should sell their clothes based on the quality of their designs and a customer should return to buy more because they have released a great new product, not return to buy the same wardrobe staple that's been systemically produced to fall apart.

This status quo has to change. It's time to return to that bygone era where clothing was made so beautifully it could last a lifetime. Partnering with a group of old school Portuguese craftsmen, who have been hand-making clothing since 1964, we have created a luxury cotton crewneck t-shirt that is so well made we are backing it up with a 30 Year Guarantee.

Together we can create a more sustainable fashion industry and lead a trend towards truly durable clothing. Starting right here, with The 30 Year T-Shirt.

This will only be possible with your help! Choose a 30 Year T-Shirt in your favourite colour, or share this video with your family, friends and work colleagues, and you’ll have made a difference. Thank you so much for your support, it means the world to us and we can’t wait to deliver you The 30 Year T-Shirt.





We believe The 30 Year T-Shirt could not be better made; it was built for life.

That is why it comes with a 30 Year Guarantee. If your t-shirt should ever rip, tear or otherwise need a repair over the next 30 years, you can send it back to us and we will immediately mend it free of charge.



We describe our colors as unique because intricate dye blends go into each of them. Each one of The 30 Year T-Shirt’s colors was produced by blending together as many as six shades. The marled effect this creates adds depth to our luxury fabric. Choosing just one color can be hard, so we have discount bundles available.

At the end of the campaign we’ll get your color selections, sizes and address details.



Our t-shirts are so expensive to make that if we were selling through retailers, they would cost £50 at the very least. We are saying no to pointless retail markups though and passing on the 50% saved by this directly on to you. We are offering The 30 Year T-Shirt to you at the wholesale price of £25.





Tom Cridland started with just Tom himself (the guy in the video above), but is now a team of 4 people and a British fashion brand well known for producing handmade luxury clothing in unique colors, especially their signature slim fit pants and sweatshirts.

Tom has been designing clothing since the age of 18, when he sold nearly £3,000 worth of "SWINE 09" t-shirts in a single week of school and donated all the profits to Médecins Sans Frontières.

In January 2014, aged 23, he founded Tom Cridland, specialising solely in creating the perfect pair of pants. He quickly built a vertical luxury menswear brand that made high quality clothing and sold it direct to the consumer at a value price. Tom believes that retail markups are inefficient and unfair on the customer, who ends up paying higher prices for no reason.

Tom founded his eponymous menswear brand upon the simple principle of making truly luxurious clothing and selling it direct to customer online and, as THE GUARDIAN said, "high-spec material and production seem to be his thing". Tom is half Portuguese and it is in Portugal that all our clothing is made. We partnered with a group of old school craftsmen there, who have been hand-making clothing since 1964.

Tom Cridland Pants have quickly become well known from London to Los Angeles and, as FORBES note, have been "donned by celebrities such as Leonardo DiCaprio, Hugh Grant, Stephen Fry, and Daniel Craig". Tom Cridland have also made clothes for many other distinguished men, including Ben Stiller, Brandon Flowers, Robbie Williams, Nile Rodgers and Frankie Valli. The rock star drummer, Nigel Olsson, in the Elton John Band since 1969, is such a fan of Tom's trousers that he had the Tom Cridland brand made an official sponsor of Elton's concerts. This resulted in the release of Tom's best-selling Nigel Olsson Navy Pants.

Tom Cridland's premium organic cotton crewneck sweatshirts have been acclaimed by everyone from the BBC to THE INDEPENDENT to THE HUFFINGTON POST, which makes us very confident we can deliver you the world's perfect t-shirt.

We have spent the past year meticulously developing The 30 Year T-Shirt because it's ok to pay for luxury, just don't pay too much.



CONTACT

Backers: customerservices@tomcridland.co.uk

Business Enquiries: tc@tomcridland.co.uk

Press Enquiries: tc@tomcridland.co.uk

FAQs

How do you select your size and color of preference?

As soon as the funding period is over, we will send out a survey to each and every one of you to collect your size and colour of preference, as well as your address. We’ll then get straight to work in Portugal hand-making your t-shirts.

Washing Instructions

You can machine wash The 30 Year T-Shirt. Recommended temperature is 40 degrees celsius.

Exchanges

Once we’ve shipped everyone’s 30 Year T-Shirt, if you’ve mistakenly chosen a size that doesn’t fit well we will be able to exchange yours for a different size. You’ll simply send your t-shirt to us and we’ll cover the return postage of your new one.

UK & US Shipping 

You did read correctly that Free Shipping to the UK and US is included in your pledge. We know this means that, even if we do make our target and reach the minimum order we need to get production started, we won’t really make money on The 30 Year T-Shirt. We don’t care though. This is a creative project and a labour of love.

EU Shipping

We are doing secure EU Shipping with FedEx, which is just an extra £15.

International Shipping

We are also doing secure International Shipping anywhere in the world with FedEx, which is just an extra £20.

Terms of the 30 Year Guarantee

There aren’t many T&Cs! The 30 Year T-Shirt is built to last a lifetime but, if anything happens to it over the next 30 years, send it to us and we will mend it and send it back to you. That means the cost of repair and return postage is on us. Please note that we are unable to fix stains or items that have been shrunk through negligence!

story:
Overview

LE PETIT by LES FINES LAMES is the aficionado pocket knife many were waiting for. Following the success of the original Cigar Knife, LE PETIT uses its core attributes in a much more compact and affordable version.
Grab one + it's leather sheath now starting €109 (approx. £99 or $120)!
 

UPDATE #1 : Stretch goals & Referral contest added!
See on the page below

UPDATE #2 : Introducing the SOLO perks!
Get the knife without its sheath at a discounted price.

UPDATE #3 :

  • 70K€ Stretch Goal unlocked!
    Everyone will receive a ONE YEAR Humidification Bag from our partner BOVEDA.
    Now onto the 80K€ Stretch Goal, turning the campaign LE PETIT into Limited Editions! 
  • Referral contest leaderboard updated. 

UPDATE #4 :

  • 80K€ Stretch Goal unlocked!
    All LE PETIT sold on the campaign are now Limited Edition with the "Founder" engraving.
    Now onto the 90K€ Stretch Goal, exclusive indiegogo leather sheath! 
  • Referral contest leaderboard updated. 

UPDATE #5 :

  • 90K€ Stretch Goal unlocked!
    Everyone gets an additional and exclusive leather sheath for free!
    Do you think the 100K€ Stretch Goal can be unlocked? That would mean everyone gets an exclusive cigar stand for free! 
  • Referral contest leaderboard updated. 

UPDATE #6 :

  • 100K€ Stretch Goal unlocked!! Free cigar stand for every backer!
  • 110K€ Stretch Goal added
  • Referral contest leaderboard updated. 

UPDATE #7 :

  • 110K€ Stretch Goal unlocked
  • Referral contest leaderboard final rankings posted. 
 
 
Meet LE PETIT by LES FINES LAMES, the ultimate aficionado pocket knife. A sleek yet bold, pocket sized, multi purpose friction folder knife that you can also use to cut your cigars - we're reinventing the everyday cigar accessory.
 

 
Designed in Marseille, produced and assembled in Thiers, LE PETIT by LES FINES LAMES is 100% made in France. Its 6.5 cm long blade makes it legal to carry in a vast majority of countries (even the most restrictives ones!). 

LE PETIT by LES FINES LAMES is very easy to operate and provides the cleanest of cuts you can imagine. It is also simple to open with one hand thanks to the lever extending the blade, typical feature of Piedmont Folder Knives.

Its built-in 23 mm aperture can cut a 58 ring gauge cigar in half. Depending on how much cap you cut, you can cut up to a 70 ring gauge cigar.

 

#PerfectCut

 

Its knife / cigar cutter dual functionality will make you find your LE PETIT useful in a variety of strategic situation such as opening your mail, slicing lemons for your mojito or, as we often do in France, having an aperitif with a few friends.

LE PETIT by LES FINES LAMES has been designed to be no bigger than the other cutters on the market while being much more versatile adding the pocket knife dual functionality. Two in one : save space on your EDC (Every Day Carry).

Its leather sheath fits perfectly into your pocket. And it comes with a lanyard hole for added safety!

 

 

LE PETIT by LES FINES LAMES exists in six versions.

PADAUK, the natural red
Strong, and stiff, with exceptional stability, Padauk has a very unique reddish orange coloration, and the wood is sometimes referred to by the name Vermillion.

OLIVE WOOD, the timeless classic
A very hard Mediterranean wood, prized for its durability, color and interesting grain patterns.

EBONY, back in black
A very durable, extremely high density jet-black wood, with little to no variation or visible grain. Occasionally dark brown or grayish-brown streaks may be present.

BLUE MICARTA, the everlasting
This composite material is a high pressure laminate of canvas into resin. Virtually impossible to destroy, this is the kind of item sure to last a lifetime.

CARBON, race your way up
Made from Carbon Fiber, a high grade composite material extensively used in high-end automobile racing and supercar manufacturing. The material's unsurpassed strength-to-weight ratio having a strategic importance in these applications.

BRASS, beauty ahoy!
An highly durable and incomparable alloy. A piece sure to start conversations in the lounge!

 

Each version of LE PETIT by LES FINES LAMES is available as a 40% OFF EARLY BIRD perk - limited to 50 each.

 

Then each version is still available for you to purchase, saving 18% on the retail price.

 

And wait, there's more! Every perk includes its made in France premium leather sheath! In 4 different colors to choose from for the wood & Micarta perks : Brown, Tan, Burgundy or Black.

 

And three additional colors sporting a racing inspired embossed pattern for the Carbon & Brass perks : Italian Red, Bleu de France and Vintage Brown!

 

LES FINES LAMES celebrated this year the 50th anniversary of first Moon landing sending three luxurious knives into the stratosphere.

For the first time in History, a cigar cutter reached an altitude of 36km (22.4 miles), before coming back to Earth. In collaboration with the British company SENT INTO SPACE, three cigar knives made from gold and diamonds flew above the ozone layer.

With the help of a sounding balloon filled with hydrogen, the carbon structure holding the knives took off from Sheffield at 11.54 am beginning a 2 hours and 33 minutes flight, landing in Dishforth, 107 km away. Filmed with a 360° camera installed on the structure, the module reached an altitude of 36 km, crossing -57°C zones.

Unique and extraordinary, the handles of the knives are made from yellow, white and rose 18K gold, thanks to a 3D printing technology: selective laser melting. NASA topographical maps made the exact reproduction of the surface of the Moon possible.

Two VS1 certified diamonds are crimped in the handle, as a reference to the men who have actually stepped on the Moon: Neil Armstrong et Buzz Aldrin.

Watch the 360° YouTube video of the flight

Technical details : 18K 752 yellow gold, 2 VS1 certified 0.05ct diamonds

What are stretch goals?

Stretch goals are additional features, products or add-ons that will be added for free to all contributions if we reach a certain amount of money raised. We defined 4 stretch goals corresponding to 70K€, 80K€, 90K€ and 100K€ of contribution received.

Have a look at what you can get for free if the campaign performs well!

All stretch goals unlocked!

What is a referral contest and how does it work?

A referral contest is a way to reward the people who share the campaign link the most and generate the most contributions.

Entering the contest is easy : all you have to do is to promote our campaign with Indiegogo’s share tools while logged into your Indiegogo account.

Please find below the prizes :

 

And the final ranking is :

Every winner will be privately contacted through his email address.

After testing our first LE PETIT prototype since February and crafting a 100 knives pre-production series in June (the First Batch), we've been constantly improving them in order to bring you the best cutter. Join us on our journey to bring LE PETIT to market and ensure you're one of the first to own one.

Born in 2015 after a successful first INDIEGOGO campaign, LES FINES LAMES proposes a unique range of exceptional cigar accessories, 100% made in France, and sold all over the world: more than 90% of its turnover is made abroad. With a strong presence on social networks, LES FINES LAMES built in less than 4 years a loyal 45K followers Instagram community, met during international cigar events, and developed numerous collaborations with leading and prestigious brands.

story:
Short Summary

I have once again been invited to show a collection in New York this February.  I want to show the very best of my designs, especially my large, intricate ball gowns, which become quite costly to make. I am raising funds to supply the materials for about 5 gowns.  The gowns will also be used for future photoshoots and shows.

What We Need & What You Get

I am trying to raise about $800 for material costs such as some beautiful beaded fabrics, satins, sheers and laces.  As well as small materials like lining fabrics, boning, lace trim etc.  

I have special perks for donors! Check them out to the right.  

If I get more donations than needed it will go towards further awesome fashion projects.

The Impact

I am a Colorado based designer and I wish to share my designs nationally and hopefully one day internationally.  This show gives me the opportunity to show in the fashion capital along with other amazing designers and artists.

Since I showed in New York in September of 2013 I have been published in several magazine publications and worked with some of Colorado's best photographers, makeup/hair artists, and models.

I am looking forward to meeting  new people in New York and expanding my network of people!


Risks & Challenges

Presently my only challenge is finances.  I make very detailed and intricate designs which take a lot of materials.  My other challenge is time, however I will seek help from other seamstress and forego sleep if needed.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign to help an awesome collection be made!

story:
Our mission is to create a restorative and regenerative circular economy that keeps fashion products, components and materials at their highest utility and value always. By collaborating with female-driven independent brands and designers who are betting against fast fashion and producing clothes in an ethical way that considers both people and planet, we believe we can create a better, more sustainable world and inspire other visionaries to do more with less.

             Our closed-loop system aims to not only reduce textile waste in landfills but will also empower women change-makers to spend less time getting dressed, and spend more time pursuing their passions and supporting other women to do the same. This new way of consuming and purchasing clothes will hopefully help women save time and money, but more importantly, it will help save our planet.

               
               
              

                  

                  
 

     

UnCo. has made its goal to provide a variety of garments that are ethically and responsibly made by brands across Canada. Our clothing selection includes minimal, transitional, and good quality pieces that can be styled to your personal taste to create a diverse capsule wardrobe that takes you from 9am to 9pm.

** To clarify this is an example of a 12 piece capsule, this is not exactly what you would be receiving. Capsules, will be customized based off your preference and picks at the end of the campaign.**

HOW IT WORKS 
First, you take a brief quiz so we can learn more about you and your lifestyle. Then, shop our online selection of responsibly made independent brands. Choose versatile pieces to build a 6, 8 or 12-piece capsule wardrobe. Then our innovative algorithm mixes and matches your wardrobe essentials and presents you with the possible outfit combinations based on your picks. You can buy the entire capsule or purchase items individually. Our timeless and versatile designs never go out of style, so you’ll always be able to incorporate them into your existing wardrobe.

When ready to change up the essentials, UnCo. offers an integrated recycling program. Simply send your old capsule clothing items back to us, and we’ll give you a rebate on the next capsule purchase. After we receive the clothing, we give it a new life by reusing the fabrics or recycling the textiles. At UnCo. we’re empowering the next generation of conscious consumers to do more with less — and to look good while doing it.

              BENEFITS 
• Less stress, more productivity.
• Saving money.
• Less decision making (more time to do what you’re passionate about).
• A simplified wardrobe.

           
             

                                               

             

              
             
             

             
              

               
         
         
         
         
                   Valued Over: $895.00

          
                   Valued Over: $1200.00        

           
                   Valued Over: $1800.00
           
        

             
             

We are dedicated to developing and providing a circular economy that promotes the responsible production and consumption.

Buying ethical, sustainable fashion isn’t just a sale; it’s a solution.

We are committed to working with female-driven independent brands and designers who share our same ethos to focus on the greater good. We believe collaboration is the new competition. It’s time to let emerging female designers and forward-thinking entrepreneurial women shine. We are building a community of creators, explorers, leaders who think differently about the world. Buying a thoughtful, responsible capsule wardrobe not only makes getting dressed even easier but also provides these hard-working women with more time to think about how they’re going to change the world — and how they’re going to support other women to do the same.

              

             

Funding Breakdown

Goal: $30,000 +

​Indiegogo Fee + Transaction Fee  = 8% ($2500)

Web Development   = (Between$8500-9K)

Inventory/ Wholesale = (Between $15K-$17K)

Shipping+ Logistics  =  ($1500-$2K)

Q&A

What is a capsule wardrobe?
A small selection of garments that work together interchangeably and never go out of style to provide you with a multitude of outfits by only using those garments.

How much does it cost?
We have three options of capsules, with three different price points. Ranging from $599-$1095.00.

Why is it so expensive?
All of our garments are responsibly made right here in Canada, most of the designers and brands we are working with are emerging and deal with small batch manufacturing. Which means producing at a lower volume results in higher costs.

In the capsule concept, we are able to offer you an exclusive price point that is not accessible if you were to buy the individual pieces separately. These are high quality, made in Canada--investment pieces. We love the saying quality over quantity.

What happens if the garments don’t fit? Or if I don’t like certain pieces?
We totally understand, that finding the correct fit is SO important when building a wardrobe. That being said, are team is committed to finding you the right pieces for your capsule wardrobe and your lifestyle. After receiving your capsule, you will have 14 days to request an exchange or refund. Our team will work with you find a solution that best fits you, even if that is a refund.

If you are experiencing fit issues, we would be happy to recommend to Jaclyn@uncoofficial.com as she has loads of experience with fit/ styling challenges and would be happy to help you!

Do you ever have sales?
No, we believe in the honesty of our pricing for quality made garments. We know that if a sale were to happen, that someone along the supply chain would be paying for it. Quality over quantity is our motto.

Why is there a shipping cost when I’m already paying for a capsule?
Your new wardrobe is of high value, and we utilize shipping that guarantees the security of your order.  The small shipping cost ensures your order gets to you safely.

I never got a confirmation email or my package never reached me.
E-mail laddyboss kim@uncoofficial.com

If you have a general question or just want to say hey- holler at us at hello@uncoofficial.com

Risks & Challenges

This isn't our first crowdfunding campaign, so we know how to coordinate these products on time and in the high quality. While we have been relentlessly concerned with the details and logistics throughout prototyping, and planning for collaborative production, there is always the chance that unforeseen challenges will arise.

In the event that things don't go as planned, whether it's a delay in the manufacturing timeline, shipping date, or something else, we promise to communicate honestly with you and continue to be transparent as we can with you until we correct the issue.

Survey - Fill out your survey as soon as the campaign is over. 3-4 days after the campaign is concluded, you will be emailed a link to a survey. There you’ll provide us with your size(s), color choices(s), and address (etc) so we know what to send you and where to send it.

Quality - We are working with some of the best emerging designers and brands in Canada. We have chosen to work with premium fabrics. The garments are being sewn with premium threads and stitching right here in Canada through our collaborative partners.

Shipping - As soon as the campaign is over, you’ll be mailed a link for a survey. Please fill this out as soon as possible so we can ship your lovely product to you! We’re going to begin pre-sale orders ONE (1) WEEK after the end of the campaign.  Orders will be shipped once the curation and selection process is completed with each individual backer that chooses the capsules wardrobe option as a reward.

RETURNS - Most campaigns do not have return policies. Being that this is apparel, we will offer an exchange policy. If you find a manufacturer’s defect, or received the wrong size, you have 30 days to exchange the garment upon receiving the capsule. Just follow the directions on the packing slip. The packing slip will have a customer support email address and phone number, so you will be able to get a response from a real person.
