While we have been relentlessly concerned with the details and logistics throughout prototyping, and planning for collaborative production, there is always the chance that unforeseen challenges will arise.In the event that things don't go as planned, whether it's a delay in the manufacturing timeline, shipping date, or something else, we promise to communicate honestly with you and continue to be transparent as we can with you until we correct the issue.Survey - Fill out your survey as soon as the campaign is over. 3-4 days after the campaign is concluded, you will be emailed a link to a survey. There you’ll provide us with your size(s), color choices(s), and address (etc) so we know what to send you and where to send it.Quality - We are working with some of the best emerging designers and brands in Canada. We have chosen to work with premium fabrics. The garments are being sewn with premium threads and stitching right here in Canada through our collaborative partners.Shipping - As soon as the campaign is over, you’ll be mailed a link for a survey. Please fill this out as soon as possible so we can ship your lovely product to you! We’re going to begin pre-sale orders ONE (1) WEEK after the end of the campaign.  Orders will be shipped once the curation and selection process is completed with each individual backer that chooses the capsules wardrobe option as a reward.RETURNS - Most campaigns do not have return policies. Being that this is apparel, we will offer an exchange policy. If you find a manufacturer’s defect, or received the wrong size, you have 30 days to exchange the garment upon receiving the capsule. Just follow the directions on the packing slip. The packing slip will have a customer support email address and phone number, so you will be able to get a response from a real person.

story:
Elegance is a personal manner. We want you to choose the design that best represents who you are. Each strap has a unique style and adapts to a particular type of user. From classic to casual, and for those who are always in a hurry.

 

We strongly believe that our customers contribute to the definition of our value proposition. That's why we want to let you choose how to combine your favourite case with the strap that you prefer. 

You can choose among a wide range of straps of different colors:

  • ROPE: Salmon Pink//Blue Navy//Green Tiffany//Black 'Seppia'
  • LEATHER: Brown 'Testa di Moro' or 'Crocodile'//Black 'Nappa' or 'Crocodile'
  • MILANESE MASH: Gold//Silver//Black

 

 

When we started this project our long term goal was to reduce the environmental impact of our production process.  Since this is not something you can achieve from a day to the other, we also meant to find a way to leave an immediate footprint. That's when our partnerships with NGOs that have been helping the planet for decades kicked in. Every different model of our new collection is linked to a different environmental campaign ran by one of our partners.

 

 

 

Carolina, our designer, has studied for years the cultural-aesthetic figures of Italian design and the great humanistic tradition of Italy at the faculty of design of Genoa. Her Italian cultural background provided her an early passion for Italian fashion designers, from the trailblazing giants who built the great fashion empires, with their unmethodical and emotional character, to the independents who march to the beats of their own drums and represent tomorrow’s innovators.

 

 

From this combination of Italian tradition and contemporary propulsion, the concept of Bacàn design arose with an environmentally friendly approach in an attempt of conciliating “la bella figura” with the challenges of the future.

 

 

 

 

SPECIFICATIONS: 

  •  Watch case: zinc alloy, stainless steel;
  •  Dial colours: gold, silver, blue navy, bordeaux, black, green;
  •  Water resistant: 3 ATM, 30 meters;
  •  Glass: high quality crystal;
  •  Strap size: 18 mm for him, best fit for 14 - 23 cm wrist; 16 mm for her;
  •  Date: 31 days; 
  •  Watch size (diameter / thickness): 

- Bacàn Square for Him - 36 / 9 mm;

- Bacàn Square for Her – 28.6 / 9 mm;

  •  Weight (with strap): 35 - 57g;
  •  Movement: VJ34 SEIKO (battery included);
  •  Strap: genuine leather, braided rope elastic with brown genuine leather finish, milan mash;

- Available genuine leather strap colours: brown mahogany, croco brown mahogany, black; nappa, croco black nappa;

- Available braided rope elastic strap colours: blue navy, salmon pink, green tiffany, black nappa; 

- Available milan mash strap colours: gold, silver, black nappa;

  •  Warranty: 2 years limited warranty against manufacturing defects.

 

 

Our business model consists of the manufacture and sale of highly stylish watches, without charging the luxury mark-up. By skipping the traditional channels of distribution and making improvements of efficiency, we are able to re-invest part of our profits in the creation of a sustainable supply chain. The first steps we are going to move in order to reduce the environmental impact of our watch are going to be the use of high-quality materials and the requirement of certificates of social and environmental sustainability of our suppliers. 

 

Before being colleagues, we are friends. We are a team of students from Genoa (Italy) who share common values and interests: design, care for the environment, politics, internet.

The idea of the value proposition of our campaign  was born in the library of the university of economics of our city. We were discussing about the political responses to the threats posed by global warming, and we all agreed that we don’t believe to the lies of those who claim that climate change is an invention in order to raise their electoral consensus. Therefore, we tried to find out how to conjugate our business with this important issue.

Our answer? Bacàn Square, the watch that saves the planet.

THANK YOU! 

The campaign is over... So now what? Although the goal was not met we are going to go ahead and come up with an alternative Fashion Week Event for you to attend and for me to invite buyers and present my line. Please stay posted so we . Also, for those who had tangible perks or a fashion call, I will deliver on those as soon as possible! Stay tuned for updates and most of all...

THANK YOU

-----------------------------------------------

Why do we need your support?

As an emerging designer and with limited work-space and limited funds, it's hard (if not impossible) to claim your spotlight in the industry. A great way to reach influential buyers is through New York Fashion Week - the most important fashion event of the year and where news looks are hand-picked to fill the clothing stores.

The process of showing a collection at New York Fashion Week includes...

First, you need a collection worth showing 

Most established designers focus solely on the design, but an emerging designer does all the work alone. It is extra difficult to find time to do both the brand planning and targeted networking, while still seeking inspiration for each design. The work is tough, but I cannot deny this is what I love! 

Second, you need a show 

This means renting a venue, hiring models, hair and make-up, production, lighting, sound, seating and catering... You name it! The more appealing the show, the more people will attend and talk about it. 

Third, you need to spread the word in the industry so right buyers show up. In the end, if they don't see your products, what's the point?

Now the solution lies with you and I! We are already working hard to create a beautiful show, but there still essential pieces that need the extra push to come together. As of now, we have a great number of followers on Twitter and Facebook. Our work has been highly recognized in the media for the past year, but we feel that extra push is about to come through with this campaign!


What is in it for YOU?

To make this as attractive for you as possible, we are giving away different sorts of perks that will really make you part of the journey:

1) You will be invited to my Show @ New York Fashion Week

This is really fun! You get to participate in the fruitful results of your support. The New York Fashion Week takes place in the second week of February 2014. You can choose between General Admission and VIP front row tickets. Oh yes, and there is going to be an awesome after-party you will be invited for also!

2) You will receive a garment of your choice from the new collection. 

No need to make any decisions yet. When the campaign is completed in January 2014, we’ll get in touch with you to find out your chosen style, color, and size.

3) You will be able to spend time with Layana Aguilar

Spend some quality time with me! I will help you make the most of your wardrobe and style, whether it is via email, Skype or in person!


The Collection Preview

(More to come. You will be able to chose your garment based on your backing amount)



TOTE BAG:


About the Designer

Layana comes from a very small town in Brazil, a place where family comes first and the coolest kids are farmers. Back then, she had no idea there was such a thing as having a career in fashion, but every party she went to she did wore the best outfit and used to tell all her girlfriends what to wear. It was only when she moved from Brazil to the U.S. that she discovered her talent for designing clothes, and how she truly loved dressing women and helping them feel beautiful. 

After Layana's first visit to New York, she decided to go to fashion school. Layana graduated from the prestigious Fashion Institute of Technology, winning the award for best in class. Soon after, she started interning for Oscar de la Renta, where she learned a lot from some of the most talented and experienced people in the fashion industry.

The year 2013 has been overwhelming for Layana: it was the year of her television debut as well as the year of launching her first season line: Layana Aguilar New York. Layana resides in the Upper West Side New York together with her husband and beautiful newborn son. 

Here is some press Layana Aguilar has gotten so far:


        

         


   

Stay Connected with Layana!

Regardless of the scale of your support, whether it is in dollars or sharing this page, I would still like to Thank you for coming by!

  • LayanaAguilar.com - See more of the collection at my website and blog
  • Youtube Channel - Watch the web series "Claiming my Spotlight"

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Instagram
  • Pinterest

story:
About Green Matters Natural Dye Company

There already is large scale production in place for things like organic cotton, but very limited eco-friendly options for the dyeing of textiles. That is where we come in. Green Matters Natural Dye Company is a natural dyeing service to clothing and fiber product company with sustainability incorporated into their company and brand image. We use plant materials that can be found all over the world and can even be sourced locally in Lancaster County, PA. We cook down the plant materials, strain them out, and introduce the fiber (yarn or fabric) into large dye pots for coloring. Once the dyed fiber is dried, the finished product is delivered to our customer.

We are currently working out of Winona's home. Even though it has served us well, it is time for us to move into a warehouse. When moving along with upgrading our equipment and processes, we will be able to at least double our production capabilities. We have gained solid traction in the first year of our operation, and it is not out of reach for us to be working with industry leaders like Patagonia in the next two years. 

The Impact

By contributing to our campaign, you are not only helping efforts to clean up local water ways, but also the water pollution problem of the world at large. For each yard of fabric that we dye, we are eliminating the contamination of anywhere from 15-30 gallons of water. As our company grows, we will go from eliminating the contamination of thousands of gallons of water to millions.

Our business is also positively impacts the Lancaster County area. As our company grows, we will be providing jobs for all skill levels. We also will be supporting the Lancaster agricultural community by purchasing our dye materials from the local farms and greenhouses.

Meet the Co-founders

Winona Quigley is a dyer, designer and photographer who grew up in Lancaster County. She has a degree in Fashion Design from Parsons the New School for Design. After 3 years of working for various luxury fashion houses in New York City, Winona found her career in harvesting color and researching sustainable systems. Her research in natural dye has been developing for over 3 years and in November of 2015, she received the Tishman Scholarship for Sustainability to fund her first collection of zero waste, locally sourced, naturally dyed knitwear. She spends her free time researching local fiber and dye systems, growing dye plants, and traveling to research different types of fiber systems. 

Tyler Stoltzfus was born and raised in Lancaster County. He has his degree from Temple University in Entrepreneurship where he excelled in the Entrepreneurship program winning 1st place in two of the annual competitions with the idea of natural dyes along with Winona. Tyler enjoys growing an idea from infancy to a thriving business.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $7,000 to help us get to the next step. This money will be going towards the following:

   - Dye Vats

   - Electric Heating Sources

   - Washer

   - Supplies (stirrers, containers, buckets, scrubbers, etc.)

   - Upgraded Facility

*If funds are not fully reached, we will be getting only some of the listed needs. 

What is unique about the perks

The t-shirts we are providing are unique in the fact that they are not only naturally dyed, but 55% hemp and 45% organic cotton. Hemp is durable and efficiently wicks away moisture from your body, so the combination with the softness of cotton makes the perfect t-shirt for everyday wear and tear. 

This is the first time we will be printing our logo on t-shirts! 

Risks & Challenges

There are not many other natural dyers doing what we are doing, therefore there are not many benchmarks to go off of. Much of our processes have been discovered on our own, so through a lot of trial and error. We believe we have processes set in place that are efficient and have proven their success by completing natural dye orders and creating happy, repeating customers. Our efficiency will only improve as we grow and gain more experience.

There is also variability in natural dye. We have communicated this to our current customers and are okay with the variability for each dye plant material. As we upgrade our processes and equipment and continue research and development, the variability will continually be narrowed down. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If helping financially is out of the picture for you, there are other ways you can help! 

Share this page on social media platforms

Talk about it with your friends and family

Follow us on instagram @greenmattersgreenmattersnaturaldyeco

--------

This crowdfunding campaign is part of The Great Social Enterprise Pitch, a friendly competition facilitated by ASSETS and the Lancaster County Community Foundation. The Pitch consists of social enterprise ideas based in Central Pennsylvania. A Social Enterprise is a market-based, income-generating enterprise that aims to solve a social and/or environmental problem through its business activities. Social enterprises focus on a trip bottom line: people, planet, and profit. Upon completion of the Crowdfunding phase of the competition, 5 ideas will be chosen to move on to the Live Pitch, during which the contestants will present their ideas to a panel of judges, with winners receiving a package of cash and pro-bono prizes. In 2017, winners received over $65,000 in cash and pro-bono prizes. Please visit www.lancasterpitch.com for more information. To access to the crowdfunding sites of all participating social enterprise ideas, click here: www.indiegogo.com/partners/SocialEnterprisePitch.

By contributing to this campaign, you give permission to this business and to ASSETS to collect and use your name, email address, and mailing address. Your information will not be sold or shared with other organizations. You may opt out of electronic communications by selecting the unsubscribe link and following instructions on any emails that you receive.

story:
Short Summary

  • 21 years old Ayat Mahareeq lives in Samoa village south of the West Bank city of Hebron , she has a talent in fashion design and get a training course in fashion, her mother and aunt as many Palestinian women makes traditional Palestinian cloths with traditional embroidery, now Ayat mix the Traditional Palestinian fashion with stylish fasion and make custom designed dress and sell them in order to support her family. 
  • this campaign is important in order to develop Ayat's skills and to provide her with technology to reach the worldwide market, also to make people enjoy the beauty of the Palestinian embroidery on there modren dresses .
  • your contributions will help us to spread the knowlege about our culture and to develope the skills of this young Palestinian talent.

 

What We Need & What You Get

your funds will provide Ayat with :

1- she does not have a computer ! so we will get her a computer.

2- a USB drawing tablet will be used instead of papers so she can use professional software to design and show her designs online.

3- an intinsive and professional training course in graphic design and cad software so she can use her USB drawing tablet and the design software.

4- a website with advanced programing so customers can choose and order what they want ! 

5- and of course genuine software to work with such as adobe creative suite and cad programs .

our perks will be customed dresses, and you will be astonished !

 

her work will still hand made even with the technology that your help will provide.

Other Ways You Can Help

share this campaign on your social network and that will be a great help for her.

since ayat cant talk English you can ask what ever you want to Mussa Qawasma at mussapix@gmail.com or at his facebook https://www.facebook.com/mussa.qawasma

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
At Bryker Hyde we have always been drawn to artisan crafted leather products. But the truth is we wanted the quality of a higher priced item but couldn't justify the cost. We figured exquisite hand selected leather, detailed stitching and practical designs were out of our budget. If this was true for us than it must be for others too.

So we began designing our own leather goods. We started with wallets and are now ready to expand the Bryker Hyde experience by launching a product that we love and have been asked for on numerous occasions: Exquisite Leather Messenger Bags. 

Our messenger bags are available two unique styles: Buffalo Brown & Mustang Brown.  Each bag is handcrafted with full grain cowhide leather and treated using the crazy horse leather technique; a specialized technique that gives the bag a unique and antique appearance while retaining its ruggedness and durability.

 

Buffalo Brown Style

Designed with the business professional in mind

 

Buffalo Brown Style: 

*Displaying large size in video

 

Mustang Brown Style

Designed for a more rugged look

 

Mustang Brown Style: 

*Displaying large size in video

 

Details

Great Features included in both styles:

  • Full Grain 1/8"-1/4" thick cow leather from top to bottom, inside and out, treated with the Crazy Horse Leather technique making each bag unique in grain and texture. 
  • Briefcase handle for easy carry.
  • Stands on its own with or without the strap.
  • Leather shoulder strap: padded, adjustable and detachable.
  • Solid brass hardware on all buckles, zippers, and clasps.
  • Exterior Front Pocket: 1 large slip outer pocket (specifically designed with extra thick leather to protect loose papers & magazines). 
  • Exterior Back Pocket: 1 medium zippered outer pocket (lined with black canvas lining, great for carrying accessories).
  • Large internal compartment: versatile area that allows plenty of room inside bag for documents, cords, books and other items.
  • Laptop Compartment: *Medium size* - Designed to fit up to 13.5" laptops like 13" Macbook, 13.3 Macbook Air, Surface Pro, 13.5" Surface Book and similar sizes. *Large Size* - Designed to fit up to 15.6" laptops like 15" Macbook Pro, 13.3" Macbook Air, Surface Pro, 13.5" Surface Book, 15.6" HP Pavilion and similar sizes.
  • Interior leather strap to keep laptop or tablet secure.
  • 2 interior, slip pockets: ideal for a phone, wireless mouse, wallet or other quick grab items.
  • 1 interior, zippered pocket: perfect for battery chargers or power cords, smaller personal items, and accessories.
  • + key chain clip
  • + 4 pen slots & 6 credit card slots
  • Black canvas interior lining (stylish and heavy duty).
  • Great Unisex look (practical and fashionable for both sexes).
  • Lifetime warranty, 100% Money Back guarantee and Quality guarantee.

Specs: 

Medium Buffalo Brown Bag 

  • Dimensions: 14" Long x 10.5" High x 3" Wide (35.5 cm x 26.6 cm x 7.6)
  • Removable Strap: 37"- 61.5 Long (93.9 cm - 156 cm)

    Large Buffalo Brown Bag  

    • Dimensions: 15.95" Long x 12.01" High x 3" Wide (40.5 cm x 30.5 cm x 7.6 cm)
    • Removable Strap: 37" - 62" Long (93.9 cm - 157.4 cm)

    Large Buffalo Brown Bag

      Medium Mustang Brown Bag   

      • Dimensions: 14" Wide x 10.5" High x 4.25" Deep (35.5 cm x 26.6 cm x 10.7 cm)
      • Removable Strap: 33" - 61" Long (83.8 cm - 154.9 cm)

      Large Mustang Brown Bag 

      • Dimensions: 15.95" Wide x 11.5" High x 4.25" Deep (40.5 cm x 29.21 cm x 10.79 cm)
      • Removable Strap: 46" - 62" Long (116.8 cm x 157.4 cm)

      Medium Mustang Brown Bag

       

      Side-by-side comparison, Medium & Large Bags

       

      Why use Crazy Horse Leather?    

      Most widely used for horse saddles, the crazy horse leather technique is specially processed to have an antique appearance while retaining its ruggedness and durability. Our artisan leather bags will be made out of handpicked Full Grain Leather.

      In fact, the more you use it, the better it will look. Your bag will gradually change in appearance and take on natural character. Most leathers are heavily coated with chemicals, paints, oils and pigments which shorten its lifespan. Your bag is not one of these. With our combination of fine leather and quality craftsmanship, your bag will last you a lifetime.

      *Dye Transfer - Our Buffalo Brown leather is treated with a dark dye that when damp or wet with excessive friction can transfer on to white and light colored clothing. 

       

      What your support accomplishes 

      By supporting our project you’re helping us move our mission to the next stage.

      • In order to make these products come to life, we need your help to complete our first run of production.
      • In return you get access to our exquisite line of bags at a discount far below our listed retail price.
      • Every bag comes with a LIFETIME WARRANTY. We believe in great quality products and stand behind our craftsmanship.
      • Everyone wins!

           

      Other Ways You Can Help

      • Word of mouth is the best way to get the word out and help us share the Bryker Hyde experience with others. So let your friends and family know about these exquisite bags at great price.
      • You can use the Indiegogo share tools at the top of the page to share our story.

       

      PERK FULFILLMENT, PROJECT TIMELINE, & SHIPPING

      DOMESTIC SHIPPING:

      We will use either USPS or UPS and each order will have insurance and a tracking #. All orders include FREE DOMESTIC SHIPPING!

      All messenger bags we plan to have produced and shipped by Nov 24th and you will receive yours no more than 8 business days later, Dec 6th, just in time for the holiday gift season.

      INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING: 

      All rewards will be shipped using USPS as the carrier, sent Priority Mail, will arrive within 6-10 business days, no tracking number or insurance provided. 

      All messenger bags we plan to have produced and shipped by Nov 24th and you will receive yours no more than 10 business days later, Dec 8th, just in time for the holiday gift season.

      Our terms of sale for international orders are FOB Destination. This means that you pay all freight and duties or taxes. There is a possibility that international backers may receive their rewards at a later date depending on the customs, sorting, and shipping procedures of their destination country.

      REFUNDS, RETURNS, WARRANTY

      We do not offer refunds or returns on bags that were received as a perk. However, each bag will come with our Lifetime Warranty. 

       

      The Bryker Hyde Experience

      You might not believe it, but Bryker Hyde started as a wallet company by a regular guy, just like you, back in 2015. Working a regular day job and, "burning the midnight oil", designing wallets at night. 

      At Bryker Hyde we have always been drawn to artisan crafted leather products. But the truth is we wanted the quality of a higher priced item but couldn't justify the cost. We figured exquisite leather, detailed stitching and practical designs were out of our budget. If this was true for us than it must be for others too.

      This inspired us to start designing and manufacturing our own leather goods. Over the past two years we have invested thousands of dollars and countless hours into fine tuning and creating our products. Obsessed with quality and focused on affordable pricing, the Bryker Hyde team continues to innovate and develop new designs so that you too can enjoy artisan crafted leather goods without having to break the bank.

      Jon and John (Bryker Hyde Founders and Partners)

       

      Thank you!
story_txt:
At Bryker Hyde we have always been drawn to artisan crafted leather products. But the truth is we wanted the quality of a higher priced item but couldn't justify the cost. We figured exquisite hand selected leather, detailed stitching and practical designs were out of our budget. If this was true for us than it must be for others too.
So we began designing our own leather goods. We started with wallets and are now ready to expand the Bryker Hyde experience by launching a product that we love and have been asked for on numerous occasions: Exquisite Leather Messenger Bags. 
Our messenger bags are available two unique styles: Buffalo Brown & Mustang Brown.  Each bag is handcrafted with full grain cowhide leather and treated using the crazy horse leather technique; a specialized technique that gives the bag a unique and antique appearance while retaining its ruggedness and durability.
 
Buffalo Brown Style
Designed with the business professional in mind

 

Buffalo Brown Style: 

*Displaying large size in video
 
Mustang Brown Style
Designed for a more rugged look

 

Mustang Brown Style: 

*Displaying large size in video
 
Details
Great Features included in both styles:


Full Grain 1/8"-1/4" thick cow leather from top to bottom, inside and out, treated with the Crazy Horse Leather technique making each bag unique in grain and texture. 

Briefcase handle for easy carry.

Stands on its own with or without the strap.

Leather shoulder strap: padded, adjustable and detachable.

Solid brass hardware on all buckles, zippers, and clasps.

Exterior Front Pocket: 1 large slip outer pocket (specifically designed with extra thick leather to protect loose papers & magazines). 

Exterior Back Pocket: 1 medium zippered outer pocket (lined with black canvas lining, great for carrying accessories).

Large internal compartment: versatile area that allows plenty of room inside bag for documents, cords, books and other items.

Laptop Compartment: *Medium size* - Designed to fit up to 13.5" laptops like 13" Macbook, 13.3 Macbook Air, Surface Pro, 13.5" Surface Book and similar sizes. *Large Size* - Designed to fit up to 15.6" laptops like 15" Macbook Pro, 13.3" Macbook Air, Surface Pro, 13.5" Surface Book, 15.6" HP Pavilion and similar sizes.

Interior leather strap to keep laptop or tablet secure.

2 interior, slip pockets: ideal for a phone, wireless mouse, wallet or other quick grab items.

1 interior, zippered pocket: perfect for battery chargers or power cords, smaller personal items, and accessories.
+ key chain clip
+ 4 pen slots & 6 credit card slots

Black canvas interior lining (stylish and heavy duty).

Great Unisex look (practical and fashionable for both sexes).

Lifetime warranty, 100% Money Back guarantee and Quality guarantee.

story:
About the Noise Pendant and the team behind Noise Jewelry

1.  You record your sound with our app, or on our website

2. We convert your sound into a wave and engrave it on your Noise pendant. 

3. With our app, you will be able to scan your unique pendant and retrieve the exact sound that was used to create it. 

 

 

Specs Of Soundwave

Your memories will last forever. You upload a sound file or record a sound directly on our website or in our app. The length of the recording is allowed to be 12 minutes long on the recorder and 10mb size for upload.

Materials Used

The surface of the pendant is rough and only lightly polished. This gives the Noise necklace a timeless feel. It also ensures that the surface is more forgiving.

Our pendants come in sterling silver and bronze. The sterling silver pendant comes with a sterling silver necklace and the bronze pendant comes with a gold plated sterling silver necklace. We've also made a special gold version for this Indiegogo.

 

Examples of Prototypes

We made a few examples of words, sentences, and music we recorded and engraved. As you can see, you can turn anything - from a simple word to a full song - into a design. You will be able to create your own soundwave after the campaign.

Lenght of Necklace:

The chain comes in several lengths:

Our Vision:

Noise Jewelry is built on quality and craftsmanship. The product comes first. 

What's your story?

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are here on Indiegogo to expand our budget for marketing. Our idea is to work with micro and macro influencers on Instagram, to get the most out of every penny spent. We are planning to get into the music market, and use grand-artist-fan pages to do so. We already have a variety of different ideas in the pipeline, and that is why we need your help to reach our goal!
  • The perks of this campaign are granted in the discounts. We provide a 50% discount on the product for all funders and a special-made gold version, which will only be available during the Indiegogo.
  • If we do not reach our entire goal of funding, the funds collected will be going straight into marketing and expanding. We have nobody in our project who works on an hourly rate, which makes it possible for us to spend everything on expanding.

Vision, Fundings and Team Members

  • All the members of Noise Jewelry are really excited about the idea of making memories last forever. The idea was first thought of by our founder, Nicolas, who has had this project in his pipeline for years but never had the time to fulfill it. 
  • The Noise Team consists of:
    Nicolas: Master in Business and Design - Comes from a family of Jewelers. Partner in the Danish 3D-printing firm, Northern Layers.
    David: Master in Programming - Has been a code developer for over 10 years.
    Kåre: Professional joiner - Partner in the Danish 3D-printing firm, Northern Layers.
    Mads: Has started various succesful e-commerce businesses - Well aware of today's trends in Digital Marketing. Skilfull in IT, Communication and New Media.
    Kristian: Founder of Samlino - A danish comparison site, used to compare prices of electricity, insurance, phone-subscriptions etc.

Risks & Challenges

Our product is ready and prototypes are fully tested. Unforeseen challenges may arise, but as we have a team with deep jeweler experience we feel confident that we will be able to fix problems in case they come along.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you do not have the funds to contribute to our project, there are loads of other ways you can help. Share it on social media or tell your friends!

story:
Awe-inspiring perks

Back us. Invest through us in a new ethical approach of doing business. And be one of the first to receive our awe-inspiring bags.

(cor affection/tablet sleeve)


Hello!

My name is Bernadette and I am the founder of ono. For years I have been pondering about how to improve the ethical practices in business. I wanted respect and care for both humans and nature. 

ono is my dream of creating a new normal. ono is driven by the question of how to do business in the most sustainable and cooperative way.

Two years ago, while working for an NGO in Indonesia, I started looking for the best possible natural and sustainable materials. The following year I met my business partner Nadine, built a team, bought a couple of sewing machines and started to train local women in Bali to manufacture bags.

After almost two years of intense learning and attempting to excel, our first line of awe-inspiring bags is now ready:

  • Produced under human-friendly conditions 
  • Entirely made from sustainable materials 
  • Innovative material combination of cork and tencel®
  • Unique and beautiful design 


(cor unity/unisex bag & cor courage/awesomeness bag)

Why crowdfunding?

For two years I passionately invested a lot of my time (as well as my savings) to get to a point where I now have a great team, a number of reliable and well-trained seamstresses, as well as suppliers for sustainable materials.

So far we only produced a small amount. Now we are ready to take ono to the next level. We need your help to turn the dream of a ‘new normal’ into a shared reality.

Back us. Invest through us in a new ethical approach of doing business. And be one of the first to receive one of our awe-inspiring bags.


(cor compassion / wallet & cor love / shoulderbag)


What makes us different?

A unique, highly sustainable material combination

We’re not the first ones to use cork for bags. What not many people know is that the cork layer is only 0.2 mm thick and is glued onto a backing material. Mostly on polyester, plastic and sometimes on regular cotton (which get’s treated with loads of chemicals). The cork is sustainable, but not the material combination. This wasn’t good enough for us. 

Therefore we decided to make it better:

  • A sustainable backing material 

    We use organically certified tencel®, an incredibly strong and functional fibre made from wood pulp of mostly eucalyptus trees. Even the dye used for our tencel® is organically certified.  (more details below)
  • Water based glue
    To combine the tencel® and cork we use water-based glue as it creates the least possible impact on the environment. 
  •  Natural colour

    To dye cork with a good quality result usually requires strong chemicals. The less cork is processed, the more sustainable and environmentally friendly its use becomes. Therefore we chose to go with its natural colour.

  • Only natural materials 

    We didn’t want to stop at the outside material. We decided to use eco-friendly materials to create our bags like organic bamboo and organic cotton, both naturally dyed. And for our buttons we chose reclaimed teak. 



(cor life/laptop sleeve  & cor intuition/yogabag)


Human-friendly and fair 

We trained individual women to work from home to produce our products and support their own small business while being with their family and children. If needed, we bought sewing machines. The women paid these back with a part of their earning. They are free to do with them as they please. Additionally, we started working with smaller local workshops to support existing local businesses. 

  • Local production. 

    We’re based in Indonesia. We support local producers in Indonesia.
  • Family-friendly working hours.

    Our manufacturers are free to work when it’s best for them.
  • Fair payment

    For their work we pay our manufacturers fair wages far above the regional standards.
  • Independence & Empowerment

    We provide training and manufacturing tools. We don’t tie our workers down. They are free to use our loaned sewing machines for their own purposes. 



Awe-inspiring perks


Risks & Challenges

We've done our learning, and now we're ready to take ono to the next level. We've chosen flexible funding because, regardless of the outcome, we've got the set up and are ready to produce. 

The funding amount will simply determine the number of bags we can produce. And we certainly hope for the best to achieve our goal!


Please help us spread the word!

The cheapest and easiest way to contribute: Simply share our campaign. Tell your friends about it and share it on Facebook and Twitter.

(cor joy/waist & shoulder bag)


Thank you very much!

– Bernadette, Nadine & the ono team

(cor unity/unisex bag)
To learn more about the products, please also visit our website.

Please help us spread the word! The cheapest and easiest way to contribute: Simply share our campaign. Tell your friends about it and share it on Facebook and Twitter.

(cor joy/waist & shoulder bag)


Thank you very much!

– Bernadette, Nadine & the ono team


(cor unity/unisex bag)

To learn more about the products, please also visit our website.

story:
About The Project

Hiya indiegogo-ers! We are WOODIES, and we make iphone skins for the 4 and 4s out of laser cut veneers. We work with a really awesome team of artists and designers to make your iphone beautiful and unique.

The wood we use is a walnut, which adds a touch of natural warmth to the design of the iphone, without adding any bulk. There is a 3M adhesive backing on the skin that will form a semi-permanent bond on your iphone. This can be removed later with no residue.

We are located in Los Angeles, California, and we do all of the work ourselves. No outsourcing to China! We believe that there are massive problems with having to make a million units of a product just to reach "scale". We believe in small business, and local craftmanship, and so should you!

Why we need to raise $15,000

We're trying to get our very own laser cutter in order to produce these quickly and efficiently (laser cutters are EXPENSIVE), and at a reduced cost to buyers, so our goal is 15,000, but if we don't make that goal, we'll still be able to make and ship all of your skins :)

We've done a lot of research and found that our best bet is going to be a Hurricane Lasers 100W "Andrew" laser cutter, which runs $11,395 + Shipping, as well as an air purifier ($1,595). We'll be spending the rest on walnut veneer, and shipping for your rewards.

Also, we want to hear from you! We're accepting submissions for designs, and if your design is chosen, you will be able to receive a percentage of each case with your design on it. We want to support artists, and support small, agile, and innovative business. 

Custom Designs

Once the fundraising has ended, we'll send out detailed instructions to those who ordered custom skins on what the best format to send us artwork, logos, or designs. The process will be relatively painless. You will be able to format your artwork in photoshop or gimp (which is free and open source).

Shipping

Shipping is free in the USA.  International shipping is $10.

Please help us spread the word and make sure we get funded!

http://www.getwoodies.com

http://www.facebook.com/getwoodies

We are located in Los Angeles, California, and we do all of the work ourselves. No outsourcing to China! We believe that there are massive problems with having to make a million units of a product just to reach "scale". We believe in small business, and local craftmanship, and so should you!

Why we need to raise $15,000
We're trying to get our very own laser cutter in order to produce these quickly and efficiently (laser cutters are EXPENSIVE), and at a reduced cost to buyers, so our goal is 15,000, but if we don't make that goal, we'll still be able to make and ship all of your skins :)
We've done a lot of research and found that our best bet is going to be a Hurricane Lasers 100W "Andrew" laser cutter, which runs $11,395 + Shipping, as well as an air purifier ($1,595). We'll be spending the rest on walnut veneer, and shipping for your rewards.

Also, we want to hear from you! We're accepting submissions for designs, and if your design is chosen, you will be able to receive a percentage of each case with your design on it. We want to support artists, and support small, agile, and innovative business. 

Custom Designs
Once the fundraising has ended, we'll send out detailed instructions to those who ordered custom skins on what the best format to send us artwork, logos, or designs. The process will be relatively painless. You will be able to format your artwork in photoshop or gimp (which is free and open source).
Shipping
Shipping is free in the USA.  International shipping is $10.
Please help us spread the word and make sure we get funded!
http://www.getwoodies.com
http://www.facebook.com/getwoodies

story:
MEET MELT THE ICE


 In 2013, MELT THE ICE was a one man business. The founder of MELT THE ICE was studying apparel design at the university last year when she happened to watch a video of the blind and of the blind's life. This was something she had never thought before and it motivated her to set up the MELT THE ICE company.

 Until last year, she merely sold bags and did common things such as contributing and donating to the blind which is what most social enterprises do. It was quite easy to help the blind by this sort of financial aid. However, what was truly important was that they dream of their future on their own and overcome the challenges they face throughout their lives. Despite its importance, this spirit has been neglected by government and the majority of social enterprises. However, we point out that MELT THE ICE is not like those other enterprises. We proudly declare that "MELT THE ICE can motivate the blind with this spirit!".

 Moreover, I who write for Indiegogo's campaign also bought one of her bags. I vividly remember when the founder of MELT THE ICE and I met to receive my bag. She told me about MELT THE ICE's brand story and handed me the one and only existing bag in the world. At that time, It was my first time to hear about the blind, but afterwards, everytime I carry MELT THE ICE's bag, I think of the blind. This is why I am currently working for this organization.

 Now, What I will introduce through Indiegogo will be different from the previous work of MELT THE ICE. We are attempting to add a new value. This time it will not just a bag for contribution and donation, but it will include the blind's stories and also something invisible to the bare eye. It is time to tell warm tales that will melt the world.


BAGS WITH AN INVISIBLE CHARM!


1, Our bag include stories of the blind

 This is one of bags we made. However, as it may seem like just a bag, it is not so. The bag itself includes the stories of the blind. MELT THE ICE puts someone's dream and hope into the bag.


"MELT THE ICE, the first page - By Kyoung Sik Kim"


 He lost his sight when he was eleven, not because of a heredity effect, but because of an unexpected accident. When he was in his mother's belly, his mother took a drug for personal reasons. Unfortunately, it was the wrong drug and it caused side effects to the baby. As a result, he was born with several disabilities and they affected him ever since his birth and the year he turned eleven, he lost his sight completely.

 To overcome his disabilities, he tried to do whatever he could; he engrossed in making money, so he could afford to get a surgery. In spite of his effort, his disease was immedicable. He was in great sorrow and he was deeply troubled. His daily life was miserable. Nevertheless, this is how he talks about his life:

" I have went through many hardships. On such occasions, I eventually overcame my hardships thanks to two principles: One is to humbly conform to God and the other is to believe that there is nothing that  I cannot overcome. Thus, my life can be described by two words : " HUMILITY, and CHALLENGE".


 His life philosophy is greatly shown in his works of pictures and poems. Though he is not able to see, he can write poems and take pictures with the eye of his mind. He began to take pictures in 2011 and the quantity of his works exceeds 10,000 already. He just really enjoys taking pictures. He also published quite a few poetical books.


Below, there are some of his works.

 He wants to have an exhibition of his works. He wants to share his works pictured by his inner eyes and heart to his audience. Additionally, MELT THE ICE will help KIM's display throughout this campaign.


 He has constantly tried to break people's prejudice on the blind; that the blind cannot do artistic activities whatsoever. Whether with or without MELT THE ICE, he will continue to do so.



2. The bags have braille on them

 We use braille when crafting the bags. This word means "CHALLENGE". This word indicates the life of this bag's main character, Kyoung Sik Kim. We send you his whole story by using braille.


3. Limited edition

 Because each person has his or her own unique life story, we design a bag only once. There are no two identical bags. In other words, KIM's bag will never again be reproduced.


4. Awesome Quality


Size 


Fabric : We use crack sealing fabric. This fabric changes daily life scratches into natural chicness. So don't worry about the scratches!


Subsidiary materials : Thread, a hand strap, lining, pocket fabric, zipper, and even everything that is easily negligible, you name it! We have it all carefully considered. We promise to use the best, and only the best materials.


User experience design :

Inside the bag - two pockets : a card pocket, and an extra pocket

Outside the bag - three pockets

 A long hand strap makes it more convenient for you to carry the bag over your shoulder. 


Made by master craftsman : 

For more than 40 years, she has made thousands of bags.


Details

"BROWN"



"BLACK"


"GRAY"



HOW THE MELT THE ICE WORKS!

What is CCC?!

 The "CCC" is a key value of MELT THE ICE. MELT THE ICE will give the blind chance to challenge their lives, and afterward, He or she will be changed in his/her own life.


FAQ


1. When will I be able to receive my bag?

 As soon as you take part in the campaign, our manufacturing partners will start producing your MELT THE ICE bag. It may take more than a week to make the bag. We will then send you your bag. We will provide continuous updates about our production schedule both during and after the campaign.

2. Why is there a $20 shipment fee?

 Due to the fact that our company is located in South Korea, an international delivery fee is necessary. We feel sincerely sorry about this requirement.            However, If you  live in South Korea and you are willing to buy more than two bags by the same address, contact me via e-mail : drjump101@gmail.com                           I will give you a refund of this extra fee. 
 
3. I would like to know further details on the works of "MELT THE ICE".

 That is awesome! If you want to find out more about us, check us out through our Facebook page! Search for "Melt the ice". It is quick and easy as ever.

4. If I have any other questions, how can I contact you?

 You can either send me e-mail (drjump101@gmail.com), or send me a facebook message. Our page name is "Melt the ice". We are available 24/7!

THANK YOU! MELT THE ICE WANTS YOU!
